"It's a job," Kate shrugged, loosing some of the southern twang she had talked with previously, an inflection of speech for the image of Lone Star Tavern. "I worked at the owner's previous eatery, kinda preferred the old shop more. But this helps out a lot with my tuition. You at a local campus?"

"East City U," Reagan admitted.

"Get out!" Kate said, some amusement entering her voice. "Small world, that's where I go too. Let me get ya a flyer."

Reagan seethed as Ixchel grinned happily, munching on a hot gooey cheese stick. Kate returned with the hiring flyer.

"Previous waitress experience is great but not required," Kate said. "Honestly, I think they'll take anyone with a pulse. But if it's money you want, a pretty thing like you could expect some fine tips around here."

"Really?" Good money and attention piqued Reagan's interests, her tone shifting as she seriously considered the job.

"With what I'm banking, yeah," Kate said, preening as she brushed off her shoulder. "Let me get y'all's order."

Eying the chubby waitress, Reagan considered her on the weighty end of a conventional beauty. Nothing close to a mega-hottie like herself, although Kate's tits did demand attention. Reagan glanced through the flyer.

"$18 per hour starting wage for part time? $22 starting full time!"

"That's decently higher than minimum wage, wow," Ixchel said.

"Plus tips." The gears began to turn in Reagan's mind. "People usually give, what, five bucks when they tip? That's...that's..."

Ixchel decided to throw her a bone. "Assuming you worked three shifts a week and almost doubled your wage in tips," the programmer did a quick mental calculation. "$2,150 - $2,200 a month."

"No way!" Reagan gasped.

"That's assuming you get consistent tips. And before taxes, obviously, lots of assumptions."

"Have you met me? I put the ASS in assumptions!" Reagan was proud of her pert, juicy, perfectly round buttocks that attracted a lot of turned heads.

Ixchel wasn't going to touch that one, as she noticed Kate returning with their food. "See what a different perspective does to the idea of coming here? Because my Korean culinary sensibilities can get behind any place with good barbecue!"

Sizzling hot off the grill was Reagan's garlic burger and Ixchel's smoked brisket. The scents sent the pair's mouths to water. Once it was cool enough to eat Reagan took a big bite of her burger. She moaned in ecstasy at its rich, melt in the mouth flavor.

Her attitude having 180'd about the temp job, Reagan swallowed her food. "Hell, sign me up now!"


"Hey, welcome to Lone Star Tavern! Let me get ya'll some drinks!"

Reagan had to admit, her rear made the waitress uniform look damn good!

As one of Lone Star Tavern's newest hires, Reagan would strut her stuff in cowgirl getup. The typical outfit consisted of a plaid, short sleeved top tied close to the navel. A wide hat, daisy dukes and cowboy boots. Reagan could accessorize a small bit, having toned hose and sully makeup to complement her red hair and bodacious, wicked bod.

Hell, her first day had her screw up two orders and spill a tray of drinks, yet she was still making killer tips!

The table of three chiseled guys was right up Reagan's alley. A prime bounty for tips given how she caught them eying her booty. Yeah, her new job was actually a job, more work than anything Reagan had put in all semester. She still didn't have a handle on the register system, there were so many codes to learn, and busing tables was an absolute chore! Still, she had taken a similar mindset to Kate on the overall Lone Star Tavern job experience. A major portion of it may suck but the tips and attention made up for it.

However, waitressing off of her good looks was not going to be all Reagan thought it would be...
1241.title: The Part Time Hustle

choices: Reagan would be approached by the boss, seems like she's getting a promotion!
Reagan ends up bringing Kate to the Townhouse, to see the other roommates...
Reagan ends up having to drive a drunk Audrey and Nat home...
Reagan's last customer of the night starts flirting with her.
12413.content:
Getting a job at the Lone Star Tavern would quickly spread around 8422 Fordham Avenue very quickly on Reagan's end. Upon realizing the older twin's new job as waitress and finding out about the family discount that comes from her job, the five would quickly make the dive bar a favorite eating spot.

Thankfully for Reagan, Ixchel and Uma were actually pretty nice for the Lone Star Tavern, and while Phoebe was a bit troubling due to their similar looks, Reagan would try finding some pink hair dye to change her hair so she wouldn't be confused with her sister at the tavern.

As for her last roommate, Audrey however...

"Mmm... this is so amazing Audrey, you were right taking me here!"

"Yeah, I admit I was a bit surprised about Reagan getting a job here Nat, but this is such an amazing place to eat... I may ask Reagan to bring some food from here back home every day..."

Ever since the two had met, both Audrey and her new lover Nat have been hanging out at various restaurants throughout the city, enjoying the food as well as each other. Reagan didn't really like to see this sort of love, but once they started eating here, they never stopped, coming back every day much to the older twin's chagrin.

Noticing the two feeding each other mozzarella sticks and in particular noticing Audrey's growing potbelly and hips, Reagan would sigh as she looked at them, hands on her hips as she talked in a southern twang. "Ok, you've enjoyed your appetizers long enough sis, what do you want for your entree..."

"Oh, sorry Reagan... uh, give us a extra large plate of spaghetti with marinara sauce and meatballs. We're sharing it, so just bring one big plate."

"Ooh!" Nat would quickly pipe up. "Add extra cheese too!"

"Oh yes, please put extra cheese on top of the sauce too, preferably mozzarella cheese. And bring back another order of cheese sticks as well. And refill our wines when you do bring that back as well..."

"Fine, I'll be back with your meal, give me 30 minutes..."

Walking back to the kitchen and giving the order to the back, Reagan would eventually take a short break, sitting down to eat some garlic bread with Kate. As she sat down and looked at herself, she would see an extra bit of belly on her body, but with her behind having become more plump for the few weeks she had been on the job she barely noticed it.

Looking at Kate, Reagan would hand her a piece of garlic bread. "So, you plan on doing anything after your shift is over Kate?"

"Not really..." Kate would quickly take a big bite between words, taking her time to chew on her piece of bread and enjoying the succulent taste. "I got nothing much to do after I get home, so I am pretty much up for anything. Why you ask?"

"Eh, was just gonna ask if you wanted to come with me to hang out at my house when your done? We could enjoy some music, watch some comedies, you know... all that."

"Hmm... I'll think about it."

Smiling as she would finish off her piece of garlic bread, Reagan would get back to work, her vitality restored as she would bring out and serve entree after entree to various people. As she did this, her new happiness would bring her quite possibly the biggest amount of tips she had gotten so far, making her very happy as she counted it up bit by bit.

As she would deliver the big spaghetti meal to Audrey however, she'd quickly sink down as the older sister would simply give Reagan only the required amount of money to pay, with no tip. Feeling a bit angry at her, Reagan would want to yell at her, but she would hold it back, since she had to keep up an appearance for work lest she get fired.

Eventually, as the end of the work day came...
12413.title: Lovers at Lone Star...

choices: After dropping off Nat, Reagan snoops around her apartment.
Once Audrey is home, Reagan leaves a prank for her when she wakes up.
Some time later, Nat offers Reagan a job at her night club.
Constant meals from Lone Star Tavern make the roommates plump up.
124133.content:
Reagan was tasked with changing out syrup packs in the soda machine. Well, that hadn't been her original job, but she could only take so much of her older sister and her mysterious girlfriend. After their southern spaghetti was used in a horrendous recreation of that "Lady & the Tramp" scene Reagan begged Kate to switch tables with her.

"I guess," Kate had said, "but then you're going to change the soda machine for me."

Reagan cursed under her breath as she had only been show how to do this once. Large, 5-gallon bags of flavored syrup needed to be hooked up to tubes that fed into the soda dispenser, the intake nozzles on each hose were different for the various brands. Some did a simple twist on, some had to be slotted into place, others were more esoteric. Reagan had particular trouble with the middle category, bent over to deal with a stubborn change of mix on the bottom rack of the soda mixes.

As Reagan had eaten well since having her employee's discount at Lone Star Tavern, her ever plumping ass could flex its fuller shape as she struggled changing the soda syrup. With every grunt and tussle with the hose, her juicy, wobbly bottom shimmied and shook within her tight daisy dukes. A favorite activity of Reagan's in foreplay but now present during her frustrations with the soda machine.

"Hey, Reagan?" Kate called from the hall.

"What??" Reagan whined.

"It's about your sister and her friend," Kate explained. "They started ordering drinks from the bar and soon hit their limit."

"Oh gawd!" revulsed by Kate's announcement, Reagan stood up, flushed, brushing aside her pink-tipped red locks out of her face as she followed Kate to see the carnage.

Having ordered every Italian item off the Texas inspired menu, some brisket sliders, and four strong mixed cocktails apiece with an emptied bottle of tequila to boot, Audrey and her lover Natalie were snuggled up against each other on the same side of the booth, sleepy and delirious.

"Oh my gawd!" Reagan put a hand over her mouth, disgusted, watching her bloated sister and bloated sister's girlfriend breathe heavily, some extra skin peaking out under the hems of their shirts. Natalie, or Nat, had a very rubenesque build with tanned, tattooed skin and dark brown hair, a contrast to Audrey's bushy blonde locks, glasses and fussy state of dress over an engorged stomach.

"Yeah, they're not going to be able to drive of their own volition," Kate stated.

"Stupid Audrey!" Reagan cursed. "Stupid sudden lesbian lover!"

"Who is this Nat, again? Kate asked.

"I don't really know," said Reagan, who intently didn't wanna know more than she already did. "Uma said she and they were all roommates in college, or whatever. Damn hell if I knew that included 'experimenting!' " What Nat did for a living and how she had gotten back into Audrey's life Reagan had remained selectively oblivious to by choice.

Kate chuckled. "I guess you can never tell. Here, you should probably get them home. I'll cover the rest of your shift."

Reagan's only saving grace from this pit of familial shame was that it was drawing to the late hours the Lone Star Tavern was open. Being a relatively new establishment, the grill & bar had yet to gain a devoted night crowd, so the tavern was near empty. Still, Reagan considered this whole arrangement to suck eggs. It would be one thing if she only had to contend with her older sister dating. She'd seen Audrey try and strike out on trying to having a social life. Frumpy women like her sister, Reagan determined, were destined for the dudders, losers and schlubby types lucky to catch the eye of any woman, compared to the promiscuous twin's hot and sexy love life.

But not only did Audrey land herself a woman, an orientation that didn't mesh with Reagan's world-view, their frequent dates at Lone Star Tavern had led to ordering more and more food for each other to eat as their main act of love, with Reagan forced to wait on them. Reagan hated every minute of it, unable to fathom her older sister having such a wild and unusual side of her otherwise boring life. She couldn't even remember the last time Audrey drank in public before she started going out with Nat.

"Sis!" Reagan poked Audrey in the shoulder. "Hey sis! Wake up! You've been hitting the sauce too hard."

Audrey's speech was slurred, her breath a miasma of booze and cheese. "Five minutes more, donkey canna water melon..."

"Go sloosshhh" Nat chimed in, trailing off.

"They're out cold," Reagan whined, increasingly embarrassed. She looked to Kate with pleading eyes. "Help me drag them to the car?"

"Suppose we'll have to," Kate said, resigned.

"C'mon Audrey," Reagan pulled at the arm of her big sister. Who had been stuffing herself bigger, holy crap! Reagan had to tense every fiber of muscle in her body to lift this fatty!

"*oof*!!" The wind was knocked out of Reagan as she ended up supporting Audrey's full weight. Her drunk sister's limbs moved on reflex, uncoordinated lumps of jelly, as Reagan staggered to remain upright.

"Throw her arm over your back," Kate coached, "and lift from her core." The husky waitress had wrangled an equally unconscious Nat, rather effectively with surprising brawn backing up her plump breasts. This must not have been her first drunk hauling situation.

Very protractedly, the two Lone Star Tavern waitresses made their way outside with the drunk ladies. "Shit!" Reagan yelled. "Where's the car? Didn't Audrey drive?!"

"Maybe Nat did," Kate suggested, propping up Audrey's apparent date. "How about you check her pockets?"

"You brought this on yourself, sis," Reagan left Audrey slumped over some other car, catching her breath as she eyed Nat's form, looking for a purse or wallet.

"Oh come on!" Reagan roared, the night of embarrassment unending. She was forced to frisk Nat's body, feeling around each bulge of her voluptuous curves trying to find her keys. Finally, they dropped to the pavement with a metallic clump. Reagan picked them up and found the key fob.

An alarm beeped off as the lights flashed from Nat's car several spaces around. Kate whistled. "Oooh, Mercedes. The girl has class."

"Shut up," Reagan retorted, pawing out another piece of identification from Nat's body. "Finally, some ID." That was Nat's address sorted out. Reagan supposed she would have to get Nat dropped off first then cart are drunk Audrey home. She and Kate dumped the unconscious pair in the back seat of the Mercedes.

"So what's the plan?" Kate asked.

"I'll have to get Chel to pick me up after offloading Nat," Reagan said as she dialed her cousin on her cell. Yet another stupid complication. "C'mon, pick up!"

Ixchel answered on the fifth ring. "Reagan, what's going on? You're interrupting something important."

"Audrey and her dumb girlfriend are pass out drunk at the tavern!" Reagan yelled. "I need you to pick up me and Aud once I get Nat to her place."

"Holy--" Ixchel started, before recovering. "Well, in payment for bailing you out you better have a chicken fried steak ready for me when I save your sorry butt."

"How the hell am I the one at fault in this situation??!"

"Chicken fried steak or no wheels," Ixchel replied flatly.

Reagan grumbled. "Fine." She hung up the phone. Damn, her roommates could be annoying sometimes.

"All good?" Kate asked, her tone indicating she was ready to wash her hands of this mess.

"Yeah, although crummy Chel wants a chicken fried steak when she comes with the car."

Kate snorted. "Your household is good for business. In a bad way."

"Tell me about it," Reagan said, getting herself set into Nat's Mercedes. She had to contort herself into a driving position, unfamiliar with how the car operated. Gawd, her sister was going to taste her wrath when she was sober.
124133.title: Disenfranchised Driver

choices: Audrey ends up discovering her rising weight, and begins dieting!
Audrey realizes her weight... but finds herself and Nat both attracted to it.
Audrey discovers the stimulant, and decides to give Reagan just desserts!
Audrey's increased eating rubs off on everyone else, who start getting bigger.
1241332.content:
Dropping Natalie back home, Reagan would wait with Audrey, who at the time was passed out completely, while waiting for Ixchel to pick the two up. Still a bit angry at both the embarrasment as well as being forced to carry her own sister, the pink-tipped redhead was already trying to think of ways to get revenge.

Eventually though, after a bit of waiting, Ixchel would arrive, and after Reagan would help in dropping Audrey into the back, she would give the mixed woman her chicken steak.

"Ah, thank you for the steak Reagan! You know just what I love..."

"Let's just go home now... it's already getting dark out and I just want to sleep..."

After a bit of driving, the three would eventually get home, and as Reagan would eventually help Audrey into bed, she would let the blonde fatty fall asleep once more, before walking to the door out. However, as she brought her hand to the door, she would get a brilliant idea.

"Hmm... she really does seem hungry all the time when she's not at work... maybe if I amplify that at home I can convince her to try dieting so she'll stop coming to work?"

Leaving the door open, Reagan would leave the house for a bit, before returning with a bottle of appetite stimulants. She had no idea if it would even work, but this was her best shot at getting revenge, and as she would pour the liquid contents of the stimulants down her sister's throat, she would make sure from time to time that she wouldn't wake up, by stopping at certain points.

Once she had emptied half of the tiny bottle down Audrey's throat, Reagan would leave her sister's room, and wait for the morning to come...

"Ugh... my head hurts, and I'm absolutely starving... why isn't anything filling me?"

Waking up to see her Uma and Phoebe already out, Reagan would watch as Ixchel would frantically work the stove, cooking the eldest roommate a bunch of pancakes and eggs in a attempt to try filling her up. Smiling to see that her plan had somewhat worked, Reagan would sit down and grab a plate herself, and begin talking with the two while smugly smiling.

"So Ixchel, I forgot to ask this last night but how was your day yesterday?"

"Oh, it was pretty good. I joined a public cooking class to try improving my cuisine, you can see how well that's doing..."

"More pancakes please..." Audrey would slowly push her empty plate forward as Ixchel would quickly refill it with a few more pancakes.

"Yeah, I do have to say these pancakes are pretty good... are these chocolate chips AND cinnammon within them? That's pretty impressive!"

"It's not that hard Reagan. You just gotta cook it evenly all throughout. Hey, maybe if I can teach you a bit you could get a promotion to chef at that tavern and we can get a even big-"

"No thanks, already happy with the tips I get. Thanks for the offer though..."

Finishing her plate, Reagan would take her time and place her now empty plate in the sink, cleaning it while she would continue watching Audrey eat more and more. After about a hour of preparation though, the pink-tipped woman would fit into her daisy dukes and leave for the Lone Star Tavern, for another full day of working with Kate and the rest of the wait staff to make sure that the tavern would stay successful.

Over the course of the next two weeks though, after she did get off work she would wait for Audrey to get off work, before pouring a bit more of the appetite stimulant into her body, so that she would end up being hungrier and hungrier every morning. She was not sure what sort of side effects that her older sister would have, but she didn't really care as the goal was to try discouraging her from pigging herself at the Lone Star Tavern.

After the end of this two week period however, Reagan would stop using the appetite stimulant on her sister, and let Audrey's own appetite and thoughts determine what would happen next...
1241332.title: Slow, Slow Revenge...

choices: A stimulated Reagan ends up sneaking food on her next Lone Star shift.
Reagan has packed on several pounds before she realizes she's been had.
It turns out Phoebe is also prone to chunking up while waitressing.
Audrey tries to curb her appetite, yet is still encouraged by her friend Nat.
12413323.content:
"C'mon, Aud, didn't you want to make it to Phoebe's first day?" Uma knocked on the bedroom door from out in the hall.

"Ngggh...!" Audrey huffed. "Just give me a minute."

The oldest Durant sister was experiencing the strange opposing sensations of her clothes getting tight while her stomach screamed for food in the mornings. Her trousers now bit into her pudgy belly, refusing to keep buttoned. Audrey, forever a big-boned apple shape in her adult life, didn't consider herself to have the stomach and thighs to pull off a skirt. Even if her old college flame Natalie Greenway would be the type to encourage that kind of style change, it was still a bit too provocative for the otherwise moderate Audrey.

Old flame...Audrey hadn't really considered that she had feelings for Nat back when she lived on the dorm with her and Uma. Nat had been plying them with food in college owing to her culinary aspirations. Now as adults, Audrey had reconnected with Nat when the latter had established herself as a club manager. What began as both shooting the breeze off the clock, using the excuse of Reagan's recent job at the Lone Star Tavern, had rekindled a passion behind that relationship that made Audrey reconsider that she might be open to dating more than just guys.

"I'm going to have to insist we cut back on the eating and drinking," Audrey sighed, the consideration of her wardrobe woes a jab of practicality into new discoveries about her sexual orientation. At almost a month into dating Nat, the last few weeks frequently at Lone Star Tavern, saw Audrey chunking up considerably. Her stomach constantly looked bloated and her hips and arms acquired some extra jiggle. These dates and indulgences were to blame, no doubt, although Audrey didn't recall this kind of hangover behavior the last time she'd been a frequent drinker back in college.

"You alright, blondie?" Her past and present roommate Uma asked. The black athlete could tell that the question was no, hands in the pockets of her hoodie as she eyeballed Audrey's choice of outfit. The Seattle print shirt and yoga pants weren't Audrey's largest clothing and she was looked squeezed within them.

"How far is it to the diner again?" Audrey asked.

"Like a fifteen minute drive?"

More groans echoed from Audrey's stomach. "I can't wait that long." Before they started out, Audrey insisted on making herself a triple-decker peanut butter and jam sandwich to eat on the drive to Phoebe's new part-time job.

Inspired by Reagan's relative success at waitressing, Phoebe had also gotten a part time job, encouraged by Audrey and the rest of the townhouse. Thankfully for her twin's sanity it wasn't at Lone Star. Phoebe had been taken by the retro chic of a throwback 50s style diner, much like the mom and pop ones the Durant sisters went to since they were girls. Checkerboard Diner carried on that malt shop & restaurant tradition, with its red and black checkerboard patterned walls, neon lit interior and mini-jukeboxes at each table, complete with the patterned overalls or poodle skirts on the waitstaff with paper hats.

"Hey girls!" Decked out in a pink and white skirt with an apron, red hair tied in twin ponytails, Phoebe cocked her hip as she waved down the others as they entered. "I mean, ladies who I probably don't know or live with, can I get you a table?" she winked.

"Honestly, Phoebe, I don't think your manager will care that much," Ixchel said. Audrey, Ixchel & Uma had decided to get breakfast to support Phoebe. Reagan didn't want to get involved given how much embarrassment having her twin frequent her job usually entailed. Although she laughed to herself with a private joke when Audrey brought it up, whatever that was about.

"What can I get ya, hun?" Phoebe said after sitting the others down at a booth.

"I'll take the chocolate chip pancakes," Audrey immediately began, "with a denver omelet. And an order of bacon. Actually, is it too early to order a burger?"

"Nope!" Phoebe jotted the order, eager to please her big sister. "I'm told people come in here all the time for morning burgers."

"Also get me cheddar cheeseburger," Audrey continued, "with a side of onion rings and ranch dip. And I might as well have you put in a strawberry milkshake too. What are you girls having?"

Ixchel and Uma stared at Audrey, concerned. "Uh, maybe a chance to look over the menu?" the athletic slacker replied.

"The bananas foster french toast for me, I guess?" Ixchel said, making a hurried decision.

"Yeah, sure, I'll try the chicken strips and waffle," Uma added, shooting Audrey a glare.

"Oh and sis, could you maybe see about getting our orders filled quick?" Audrey added, betrayed by another stomach gurgle. Phoebe happily nodded and walked off.

"Okay, Aud, whats going on?" Ixchel asked. "I've never seen you order this much at breakfast until recently."

"And you had that triple PB&J before we got here," Uma added.

Feeling guilty despite her hunger, Audrey nervously squeezed her love handles. "I don't know. I'm just starving the mornings after I've been out with Nat."

Uma arched an eyebrow. "I know grease helps with the hangover but since when does a night of drinking leave you starved the next day?"

"I don't know," Audrey shrugged. "I haven't been drinking this much since college, either. I should tell Nat we should cut back."

"This isn't sounding like normal behavior..." Ixchel murmured to herself, puzzling over her cousin's increase in appetite.


"Ooof!" Audrey stepped gingerly back into the townhouse after they all made it back from breakfast, clutching at a bloated gut. "Well, at least we can say the diner has good food."

"Yeah, not that Phoebe is that good taking orders," Ixchel said sourly, carrying leftovers. Audrey's omelette had been entered as ham & swiss instead of denver, Uma had received the chicken strip basket and a waffle, with Chel getting plain french toast and a banana split. And Audrey had insisted they still eat the accidental orders while their actual food was recooked. As in, she had taken several bites of what was offered on the table until her roommates staged an intervention when she kept eating while looking pained.

"How can you be that hungry after a night out," Uma demanded, trying to get to the bottom of the affair. "You even remember what you do when you get home?"

"I dunno," Audrey said, needing to stretch out on the couch to lessen the tension in her stomach. "Reagan's been helping me back home after her shifts a lot. I should probably thank her." The acid reflux from her stomach trying to turn over her dense, multi-plate breakfast pained her horribly. "Do we have antacids in the kitchen."

"Sure, I'll look," Uma said, digging through drawers. She was about to close the garbage can after throwing away the antacid wrapper when she noticed something odd. "What gives?"

"What is it?" Chel asked, tending to Audrey.

Uma brought out a spent bottle with the antacid. "I've been looking for these. My appetite stimulants from when I used to do a power protein binge before a workout."

"That is a strong dosage," Chel said, reading the bottle.

"I would only take one," Uma said, "I told Reagan that when I tried to get her to work out with me...wait..."

"And she's been driving me home," Audrey said, all three coming to the same conclusion. "Or offers me water when I head to bed. Has she been drugging me?!"

"That would explain a sudden appetite shift," Chel said. "Should we bust her?"

"Hang on," Audrey said, pausing from another stomach pang. "Let me see that bottle. I got a better idea."


"Geez, Audrey, I told you I didn't want to come here on my off day!" Reagan complained.

"We went to support Phoebe on the breakfast shift, You should support her too."

"I'm not even that hungry," Reagan said. Her mind drifted to just how big Audrey had been getting since she had been feeding her the appetite stimulants when she slept. Twice in one day to see Phoebe at her diner job was just pathetic.

"Then let's just have a shake," Audrey said, eager to literally give Reagan a taste of her own medicine. None of this was prescription.

Two milkshakes were ordered, mint for Reagan and caramel for Audrey, who encouraged Phoebe to get a "new job selfie" with her twin so Audrey had a chance to mix ground appetite stimulate into Reagan's shake. An annoyed Reagan sat down none the wiser. "Ugh!"

"What do you think of the shake?"

Reagan had a taste. Then more. "This is pretty good. Hey, Phoebe, get me another one of these."

After two shakes: "Whoa, is that a baked cookie sundae! I'll have that if it's as good as the shakes."

After the sundae. "Screw it, get me the brownie."

After the brownie."*urp* These are great but I need something substantial. How about a banana split?"

"Whatever you want Reagan," Audrey smiled, having nursed a coke after her shake in the time Reagan chain ordered dessert. Turnabout was fair play at this point, as playing on Reagan's sweet tooth led to a show of her trying to fill herself with ice cream as she didn't notice she was under the effects of the same appetite stimulants.
12413323.title: A Dish Best Served Cold: Banana Splits

choices: Her modeling career was starting to take off.
Phoebe tries out this awesome recipe she found. Failing at it, rather.
She’s been getting pampered and spoiled lately. A bit too spoiled.
There’s a sorority on campus Phoebe is applying for.
As a twin she often gets confused for her sister Reagan.
13.content:
Phoebe Durant lived a charmed life.

It was the most polite way of putting things because she wasn’t getting by on brains alone. The perky, bubbly redhead often made stupid decisions or didn’t think of the consequences whenever she did anything.

She was hot. The twins’ phenotype graced them with limber, sultry booty wide bodies post puberty. For Phoebe, her plump little rump had brought all the boys to the yard. Not that the townhouse had a big yard. The lyrical analogy was lost on Phoebe. Although she did feel like having a milkshake.

Phoebe was grateful for her family and friends. Her twin sister Reagan was cool if mean sometimes. Her big sister Audrey took care of everything. Cousin Ixchel was so smart. And Uma was fun to hang out with. And they all lived in the townhouse to help Phoebe. Because life was hard, you know? The airheaded Durant twin had never contemplated life if she was forced to fend for herself.

Subconsciously, she had wrapped everyone around her finger without realizing it. Being the younger twin by two seconds she was the baby of the family. She could still pass for cute when the situation called for it, her maturity not all there.

And even if the nightmare occurred that her family kicked her out of the townhouse Phoebe was so popular. She had a lot of friends at university and she was starting her modeling career. People found Phoebe attractive and most found her sweet if doltish personality endearing. She’d had plenty of suitors and boyfriends although Phoebe often had to be rescued from one-sided and jerks for lovers. It didn’t help that Phoebe would crush after every handsome hunk she laid eyes on.

Phoebe may not be the brightest bulb off the shelf but she was kind, friendly and genuine. Even her sisters couldn’t stay mad at her for too long. Call it karma, or fate or just ridiculously luck but a lot of things in life went Phoebe’s way without her barely having to lift a finger.

For Phoebe, every week had bright sunshiney days.
13.title: Phoebe Durant

choices: They need her to lose weight.
They need her to gain weight.
They want her to act in a food commercial.
An acting scout offers an unbelievable yet sketchy offer.
131.content:
Phoebe hadn’t been modeling for long but already she was starting to feel like a professional.

She hadn’t originally intended to be a model. Like many things in life she had stumbled ass-backwards (perky little ass backwards) into what had become a lucrative gig.

It started back in high school when Phoebe and her twin Reagan had been told they were rather photogenic by an off duty talent scout. Reagan had blown the offer off but Phoebe had wound up at the agency’s audition time unexpectedly. She had mistaken the scout’s card for a plumber’s office when asked to run an errand.

Phoebe had no clue what she was doing when first auditioning to be a model but her natural good looks and killer bod had taken her far. Mind you, as a diamond in the rough it had taken a whole lot of polishing to make Phoebe into a viable model.

Her pay packet came from each shoot, so Phoebe started part time as was encouraged to continue with university as she got her feet wet. The girl needed acting classes to help improve her expressions. Otherwise her starting looks were spunky and a weird half-sultry half-sleepy look whenever she was asked to be sexy.

The fledgling model was starting to get some more acclaim now that she had joined an agency called Premantis. It took a month’s worth of corrections to get Phoebe to remember that the ‘s’ was silent.

Whenever Phoebe was on a shoot she had a lot of fun. A team did her hair and makeup and a gofer got her mineral water whenever she was thirsty. As she learned the lingo of the biz she was told that the gofer had nothing to do with rodents. She got to try on new clothes, playing dress up being one of Phoebe’s favorites as a kid, such as when she and Reagan were in matching outfits.

Her managers were Clive Tiemens and Fiore Leoni, both were responsible for setting up the photo shoots and selecting the right model for the job.Clive’s head was mainly on the business and photography while Fiore got to know the models personally.

It was right before the shoot’s briefing that Phoebe was pulled aside for an important conversation. She didn’t realize it at the time but her modeling career was about to change drastically.
131.title: The Fledgling Model

choices: Leggings, basic to go to a photo shoot
Booty shorts, meeting a guy for breakfast
Joggers, a day of relaxing ahead
133.content:
Speaking of bright sunshiney days...
The early morning sun splashed through the gaps between wooden blind slats and kissed the sleeping Phoebe warmly on her face. The redhead writhed under the covers for a moment before stretching her arms over her head and unleashed a yawn into her well decorated room.
Finally, whilst rubbing the sleep from her eyes, Phoebe properly arose from her slumber, tossing the floral quilt to one side and swinging her legs over the edge of her queen sized bed. With her slender fingers grasping the edge of her soft mattress whilst her toes scrunched into her thick fluffy rug, Phoebe swiftly pushed herself up and walked across her room to prepare for the day.

Whilst she wandered, Phoebe couldn't help but notice herself in her full length mirror which sat in one corner. Detouring from her projected journey, the redhead turned to face her mirror and gave herself a good looking over. Dressed in little more than a strappy vest top and a pair of skimpy pants, Phoebe liked what she saw. Prominent as ever, the bottom heaviness she shared with her sister Reagan dominated her figure looking pert as ever with a faint bite mark from her panties visible against the cheeks. Perched between her long thighs and equally wide hips, Phoebe gave her hips a little wiggle causing her bulbous bum to wobble slightly which always amused the young redhead.
At this point, however, Phoebe noticed another small wobble on her body. Peeking out slightly from under her vest top was a slither of tummy. This in itself wasn't irregular, she had found with years of practice that showing a little stomach drew the guys in no end, but this particular morning made it difficult to use the word 'little' to describe her midriff.

By no means was Phoebe fat, quite the opposite, but weeks and weeks of enjoying her spoilt existence had caused some...growth. Curious, Phoebe grasped the hem of her top and lifted it to just under her unsupported boobs. With her entire middle exposed it was clear to see her very shapely hips rounding out and then turning back into her thin waist, the curves of which were framing a slight curve of puppy fat which was radiating out from her belly button giving her a soft middle.
Phoebe prodded at her not quite flat stomach, feeling the softness give way under her finger. The sensation tickled slightly, invoking a smile before Phoebe caught herself and whipped her vest top back down, leaving a slither of stomach exposed still, although this time not as voluntary as it used to be.

Meh, Phoebe internally shrugged, I'm still hot as hell.
The thought provoked another smile, more prominent this time before suddenly remembering her usual morning social engagements.
Swiping her phone from her bedside table, Phoebe skipped back to her mirror and posed for her morning selfie, hand on hip, bum pushed back to embellish her most prominent feature and a gentle pout enhancing her lips.
Happy with the picture, Phoebe plastered the caption 'morning world' across the photo before hitting send, delivering it into the Snapchat universe to her many friends and followers.

Content with her morning routine, Phoebe turned swiftly on her heels, bum jiggling as per as she trotted swiftly to her wardrobe throwing the doors open to pick her outfit for the day. As a model, Phoebe owned enough clothes to fill a shop which presented a whole other problem; what should she wear?
133.title: She’s been getting pampered and spoiled latel...

choices: Gaming with Ixchel down in the den and plenty of Korean snacks.
Audrey keeps her well feed as only Phoebe can stand her cooking.
Uma invites Phoebe out to a wild party.
1333.content:
It was Friday and Friday was Phoebe's cheat day. She had no scheduled classes and no shoots so Friday was like an extra day tacked onto the weekend for her. Phoebe hadn't made any major plans so she changed into something more comfortable: a pair of grey joggers and a coral print zip up hoodie. The weather was turning a tad chilly so Phoebe wanted to stay warm.

Although Phoebe was oblivious to the routine that had graced some pudge around her middle, how she lived on her days was very telling as to how she became lazy and spoilt.

The grey joggers were once meant to be athletic wear, gotten at discount after an early photo shoot for sportswear and Phoebe had loved how it made her bubbly rear pop out just right. She'd gone jogging with Uma a few times but couldn't keep up with the ex-athlete's pace so her sweats were downgraded to spud wear.

Just as soon as Phoebe had gotten dressed she was out of her clothes again as she made her way downstairs. Her big sister Audrey emerged from a steamy bathroom, half dried in her moist morning clothes trying to deal with her unruly hair. "Oh, Phoebe," Audrey squinted without her glasses. "I've left a bubble bath if you want. Better to use the water twice before it's wasted."

"Aw, thanks!" Phoebe relished the idea, unlike the other women of the house who would be more discouraged by sharing bathwater. Phoebe liked it when she dipped in a toe. Still warm and plenty sudsy. The bath oils and scented candle on the sink mixed an aroma of lavender and vanilla.

Phoebe stripped down, slender but soft around her juicy rear and budding tummy, flinging her clothes indiscriminately before she realized the door was half open. "Oops!" She had to force the door shut before she descended into the warm bath. Even for being twice used bathwater it was inviting. It needed a bit of a warm up, so Phoebe added some water which also frothed up a second round of bubbles, which was her favorite part. Toes wiggling like an eager kid, Phoebe spent most of the time playing with the bubbles then actually washing. The bath oils did a wonder for her skin and any aching muscles she might have had from sleeping in a rough position.

After spending far too long in the bath Phoebe finally got up, a little pruney but no worse for wear. She found a towel to cover her and began to redo her hair with the hair dryer before there was a knock on the door.

"Phoebe?" came the muffled voice of her cousin, Ixchel.

Unabashed from her lack of modesty, Phoebe opened the door. "Hi! What's up?"

Ixchel tried to avert her gaze. While Phoebe had covered her chest with the towel the angle of the cloth was leaving her bum scandalously short. "U-um, Audrey asked me to help with laundry, and she said you had been wearing this so..." Ixchel returned Phoebe's clothes, which she had accidentally crammed out the door with Audrey's laundry after undressing for her bath.

"Thank you!!" Phoebe cradled the freshly laundered joggers to her face. Just out of the dryer, nice and cozy. The action caused Phoebe's towel to become undone so Ixchel hurriedly left Phoebe the rest of her clothes and shut the door, dark skin turning crimson about her round face.

Toasty dried clothes where the best! Phoebe crooned as she got dressed for the second time that day, feeling the warmth transfer across her body. She left the bathroom with an extra perk in her step, making her way down to the kitchenette.

"Hey sis," Audrey said, "breakfast is ready."

"Score!" Phoebe marveled. "Chocolate chip pancakes! And those little weenie sausages. Those are like my favorites."

Her twin Reagan scoffed at the breakfast nook. "Gawd, you're like a seven year old."

"Hush," Audrey said. "At least someone appreciates my cooking."

Phoebe was given a stack of three pancakes and four sausages. Reagan and Uma, who had also sat at the breakfast nook, had half eaten plates. Truthfully, the pancakes were nothing to write home about. Only the chocolate chips made them salvageable, the pancakes were half burnt yet undone in the center. Phoebe was the only one to look past these flaws, either because she was hungry or had no account for taste.

She took a forkful. "Yummy!" She added butter and syrup, almost staining her recently washed clothes.

Uma took another bite of her pancakes, staring off into space as she chewed with her mouth open. "Yeah, I can't finish these. Sorry Audrey, maybe don't let them cook so long next time."

"Let's see you make the pancakes, Uma."

"I'm not having pancakes two days in a row," Uma tilted her plate Phoebe's direction. "Here, you can finish the rest of mine."

"Awesome!" Phoebe said.

"Yeah," Reagan also unloaded some food, "I can't stand these mealy sausages."

Three more sausages were added to Phoebe's plate. She ate it all with gusto. Honestly, the other girls didn't know what they were missing. Phoebe enjoyed a good breakfast with Audrey as the other two vacated the kitchenette. By the time the toasty feeling had left her clothes Phoebe had the warmth of a full tummy as she went to the living room to stretch out on the couch with her last few weenie sausages.

It was such cushy living that had caused Phoebe to gain a bit of weight, although she had brushed it off. She'd had her caloric intake for the day at breakfast yet the day was barely half over.

What else did Phoebe do on her extra long weekend?
1333.title: Lounge Living

choices: Phoebe settles into the partying spirit
Skip to the morning, the hangover and the boy in the bed
13333.content:
“Hey, wake up sleepy head!”
Uma’s voice cut through Phoebe’s peaceful sleep, rising her from her slumber with a jump.
Not realising how long she had been asleep, damn Audrey and her comfort food, Phoebe swept cascading locks of red from her face answering her eyes cleared, drawing Uma into focus standing over her.
“Oh, hey Uma” chirped Phoebe, stretching slightly to expel her tiredness.
Rolling her eyes, Uma forcibly lifted Phoebe’s feet from the sofa and slid her own athletic backside onto the plush cushion, laying the redhead’s feet over her lap.
Not one for dithering or beating around the bush, Uma launched straight into her reason for disturbing Phoebe.

“Seeing as you’ve slept away most of the day do you fancy coming to a party tonight?” asked Uma, staring intently at the redhead indicating her lack of patience.

“Totally!” squealed Phoebe, practically bouncing off the sofa as she spoke. She loved parties, she adored the attention her rocking bod scored her and she hadn’t partied in AAAAAAAGES.

“Ok, well it’s with some of mine and Audrey’s college friends so you’ve got to be cool” Uma sternly pointed out, folding her arms as she did “I’m not spending all night babysitting so don’t get too drunk”

“You know me Uma, I don’t get THAT drunk” smiled Phoebe as she farted out of the room, making a racket as she tore up the stairs to get changed.

“Yeah...” muttered the athlete “that’s what I’m afraid of”

***************

“Phoebe! Are you ready yet?” Uma bellowed up the stairs, growing characteristically impatient with the younger redhead.

“Nearly” cried Phoebe as she trotted out of her room, making a final adjustment to her outfit.
Not that there was much of an outfit to adjust.
For this particular outing, Phoebe had opted for a tight backless red shirt tucked into some daisy dukes that accented her natural assets along with some small strappy heeled shoes to give her a slight height boost.
She’d also curled her hair to give it volume and painted her curvy lips a dark red, Jessica rabbit style.

“I’m ready!” shouted the redhead as she stood at the top of the stairs.

Just as she started down the stairs, Audrey appeared at the bottom alongside Uma who was dressed equally scandalously in full length jeans and a short crop top displaying her toned stomach.

“Jesus Uma, what is she wearing?” whispered Audrey, not wanting to offend her baby sister.

“God only knows” Uma whispered back, stunned at the young woman approaching them.

“Ready to go then?” cooed Phoebe, completely ignorant of the stir she was causing with her outfit.

“If you are, it’s kind of cold out there” said Uma in an attempt to get Phoebe to put some more clothes on.

“Really? I’m fine!” smiled the redhead as she skipped past her friend and sister and made for the door, each bulging arse cheek jostling and fighting to escape her shorts.

Audibly sighing, Uma followed after her, grabbing the swinging front door to stop it hitting the wall.
“Try to keep her out of trouble please?” called Audrey, practically pleading with a worried expression on her face.
Back peddling on her previous refusal of babysitting of respect to Audrey, Uma reassuringly smiled at her friend “I’ll do my best Aud, cya later”
“Bye” muttered Audrey to the closed door, biting her nails as she spoke.

****************

“Oh my god, this is amazing!” shouted Phoebe over the drone of the music as the two townhouse girls entered the party.
“Well this is how grown up girls party Phoebs, try not to get lost ok? Your sister was freaking out and I’ve got to look after...” Uma started before realising she was talking to no one “...you...for God’s sake” cussed the athlete as she caught a glimpse of Phoebe’s pert little arse shimmying through the crowds.

Almost instinctively, Phoebe found the bar and immediately found herself overwhelmed with the choices.
Spirits, cocktails, plain beer...what was a girl to do.
“Hey there freshers, you lost?” a female voice floated over Phoebe’s shoulder causing her to twirl around to confront the voice.
“Erm...” Phoebe didn’t know what to say to the woman stood behind her, donned in a skintight dress with her shoulders and thighs emblazoned with tattoos the owner of the voice gave off a rather imposing character.
“Hey, that’s Audrey’s sister!” called another voice, sparking a smile on the tattooed woman’s lips.
“No way! Reagan or Phoebe?” asked the first voice, placing her hands on her wide hips and squeezing slightly into a layer of pudge around her middle.
Still faltering, Phoebe froze like a deer in the headlights before feeling a firm hand on her shoulder

“Leave it out Nat, she’s only a young un” Uma replied on behalf of Phoebe as she took place by the redheads side.
Breathing an internal sigh of relief, Phoebe relaxed and felt confident to stand her full height against the woman apparently called Nat.

“Hey Uma, no beef here, just getting to know Audrey’s sister who I’m guessing is Phoebe from your defense” Nat smiled coyly as if impressing herself with her insider knowledge “speaking of, Audrey here tonight or she still playing mummy?”

“She had to pass tonight so just me” responded Uma, gently squeezing Phoebe’s shoulder as she spoke.

“Shame” mused Nat to herself “well I guess I’ll catch you later” she remarked as she turned on her heels with a distinct wobble betraying her plump body.

“I thought this party was your friends? She didn’t seem so nice” mused Phoebe quietly, shaken by the experience. That kind of intimidating nature wasn’t on her radar usually and it always knocked the little optimists confidence when confronted with it.
“Well not all girls are nice Phoebs” muttered Uma through gritted teeth “lets get you a drink and chill for a bit”

“Sounds good” smiled Phoebe, turning back to the bar “erm...”
“I’ll get you something Phoebs” said Uma, picking up on the redheads nerves and rolling her eyes
13333.title: Uma invites Phoebe out to a wild party.

choices: Phoebe finds out more about Uma and Audrey from their old friends.
The two find plenty to eat and drink at the party.
The music has got Phoebe hooked, but can she dance?
Phoebe still finds herself intimidated by Uma's college friends, especially Nat.
133331.content:
"Here," Uma said, thrusting an ordered drink Phoebe's direction. "Try a Dark & Stormy. Perfect for after hours or party atmosphere and you can't go too wrong with rum."

Phoebe took the drink, staring at the amber liquid on the rocks with a lime. "But the weather wasn't that bad today."

Uma sighed. "It's the name of the drink Phebs. You like ginger ale so this is kinda close."

The drink loosened up Phoebe as early as her first sip, as her eyes grew wide and excited. "This is tasty! Thanks Uma, what are you drinking?"

"Blue Bull." Uma snapped her fingers at the bartender. "Hey buddy, give me the rest of the can." Uma smashed the dregs of the energy drink that made up her cocktail.

"Uma?" As the pair made their way from the bar they were approached by a tall, bearded man with a well built physique. "Yo babe, how you've been?"

"Bruce!" Uma slugged the guy on a tan arm and then pulled him into a hug. "It's been ages, man, had to come when I heard you'd be here."

Phoebe had first been startled and then dumbstruck with a budding crush the moment 'Bruce' had appeared. In lieu of saying anything she had pounded most of her drink. Maybe a bit too hard as the alcohol began coursing through her veins and the drink gave her some hiccups. "Sorry *hic* who is Bruce?"

Bruce had a beefy arm spun around Uma's shoulder. "We played mixed doubles and other coed sports in college. You look sorta familiar, have I met you before?"

"She's Audrey's sister, Bruce," Uma said.

"Odd Aud's sis! Man, short of the hair color that's some resemblance for Audrey back in the day."

"Odd Aud!!!" Phoebe, having never heard such a nickname for her older sister but it was perfect. She startled chortling so hard her laugh was punctuated with even more hiccups. Bruce and Uma laughed too, although not as long as Phoebe.

"You okay Phoebe," Uma asked, her duties as chaperone slapping her in the face.

"Stay still a sec," Bruce rolled up a sleeve, steadying Phoebe with a firm hand. He gave her one forceful slap in the back. "Sorry babe did that hurt?"

"Oooff!" Phoebe's back stung a moment but as her breathing returned to normal she realized her hiccups were gone. "Hey, thanks, how'd you do that?"

"Just a little system shock. I've gotten into sport massage and usually a well placed jolt can sort out some muscle spasms." Bruce grinned sheepishly, a contrast to his tough first impression. "You two check out the spread yet? Nat's not one to slouch on vittles."

"We're on our way," Uma said, bewildering Phoebe even further.

"Catch you girls there I have to hit the can," Bruce made his exit, oblivious to the stares from the increasingly buzzed redhead.

Uma was all too familiar with Phoebe's tendency to fawn after guys like the latest hot fad. "Tone it down girl, or you're really going to be disappointed."

"Huh?" Phoebe tried to dodge the question by returning the drink to her lips.

"I saw your goo-goo eyes checking out Bruce's chiseled physique. I'm just warning you he might not swing that way."

"Who's swinging, Uma? Don't tell me you did ballroom dance in college too."

"Not that kinda swing," Uma sighed, Phoebe could be such a ditz. She dragged the younger housemate by the wrist so they could find a somewhat quieter corner. "I mean he's gay," Uma half whispered.

"Aw, really?" Phoebe pouted.

"Well," Uma paused, "he might be bi? I'm not sure when the last time he dated a woman was..." Uma cut short her next comment, about how most of their friends had experimented in college, realizing that she was talking to the college aged housemate.

"So your friends are Bruce and Nat?" Phoebe asked.

"Yeah," Uma explained. She gestured to the crowd gathered in the music pumping atmosphere. "I mean, this is Nat's place. She owns the club."

"Really?!" Phoebe hadn't expected that the plump, tight dressed tattooed woman would be the one running this party. "So how come you and Audrey know someone like that?"

"We all lived on the same floor, Phebs. Except Bruce, obviously. Thought I might have heard Sheryl recognize you but she's probably at the DJ booth now. She was a DJ on our college radio station." Uma looked sideways at Phoebe. 'Well, not you obviously. I invited Regan to a hookup last summer but she mostly brushed everyone off.

Uma scratched her bare midriff. "That enough background for you now? Let's order up some grub, the apps are killer here and I skipped dinner."

"Ok," Phoebe said, starting to feel her party groove coming back on.
133331.title: Catching Up

choices: Phoebe discovers that sometimes, too much is too much.
The party rages on an Phoebe makes a fool of herself.
The morning after, Uma and Phoebe are paying for a night of partying.
Phoebe's indulgences start catching up with her, especially below the waist.
1333312.content:
Away from the crowded dance floor and the main points of traffic in the club, Uma and Phoebe were able to find a curved booth where they could rest their feet and look over the menus. The club focused on small plates and appetizers. Even though there were only two sides to the squat menu there was quite a bit of variety.

"You weren't kidding!" Phoebe exclaimed, amazed by some of the choices. "Fried tacos! Cajun shrimp! Garlic cheese curds!"

"Yeah," Uma tapped a finger on one entry. "The wings are pretty kickin' too. I wanna try the spicy-sweet curry glaze."

Even as all these options presented themselves, a niggling doubt decided to tickle the back of Phoebe's brain. "But, aren't these kind of expensive? They don't even list change, just the whole dollar amount."

"Quit worrying, kid," Uma said slyly. "I've caught the funds covered." Audrey, on the other hand, might get steamed when she saw the credit card bill but that would be next month.

"What're thinking of getting, ladies?" Bruce came back from the bathroom, slipping into on the side next to Phoebe. Whether he was bent that way or not, Bruce was a hunk of a man that Phoebe couldn't help but ogle. Uma gave her a swift pinch in the side when she noticed, causing the redhead to yelp and bounce on her wide tuckus.

"S-S-Sorry," Phoebe said, feeling embarrassed. "It all looks so good, I don't know what to get."

Bruce hadn't noticed Phoebe fawning over him. "I've had the fried green beans here before. The edamame is nicely seasoned too."

"Eda-what?" Phoebe had no clue what he said.

"Edamame," Bruce pointed on the menu. "Soybeans. You can take the pod up to your mouth and pinch out the beans with your fingers. The lightest thing on the menu."

"So here's where you all ended up." Nat strode over in her clingy dress, tattoos undulating at the shoulders as she rested her arms on the table.

Phoebe shrunk in the middle of the booth, still kind of intimidated by the plump club owner.

"Yeah Nat," Bruce greeted. "Looking to get some chow. How about some edamame so Phoebe can try?"

"And the curry wings," Uma added. "I'm famished. What you getting Phebs?"

"Ummmm...." she looked down to the menu as if clinging to a raft for dear life out on the open sea. "These, uh, stuffed mushroom things, I guess."

"I'll fast-track those in the kitchen for you," Nat gave a faint smile. "Anything for old friends plus one. Also, you see my man Murray around, he'll get you any drink you want. On the house."

"Score!" Uma thrust her fists out in a cheer. Nat strode off, plump frame shimmying.

Phoebe was starting to reassess her roommate's former college friend. Maybe she wasn't too bad. While they waited on the small plates the three talked about music and times from the past. Phoebe thought her own college life could be pretty wild (well, wild for her, her twin Reagan could be an utter hellion) but the stories Uma and Bruce were trading about their co-ed life were amazing. Especially because it painted a side of her older sister Audrey she had never seen before.

"And then," Bruce continued midway through a tale, "when we were moving the paint cans for Aud's art project, we didn't realize there was a punctured hole in the bottom, so there were these criss cross lines all over the quad. Looked like a crop circle."

Phoebe was trying to keep up with everything she had heard up until now and snorted out a chuckle.

"And it turns out there was this little clique of Satan worshipers at the college, so the faculty thought they had done it. They even got blamed for the broken golf cart."

"Hoo hoo," Uma let out a long laugh. "But's its still not that funny, Bruce. The locker rooms stunk like garbage for weeks after all the pipes backed up.

Before Bruce could reply Nat and a server were there with the app orders and a refill of the beer pitcher. Phoebe looked confused at the fourth plate. "Did we order those? Because that looks amazing."

"Trying out something new," Nat explained. "Waffle fries as nachos, only as a baked potato. My treat." The fries were decked with melted cheese, bacon bits, chives, sour cream and seasoning.

Between the wings, edamame, stuffed mushrooms and loaded fry 'nachos' there was enough for the three adults to eat. Bruce kept himself to respectable portions. Phoebe and Uma, however, were so tipsy from the booze and enamored with the food that they couldn't stop eating.

"OMG this tastes amazing," Phoebe said, having had most of the fries after three mushrooms. "But I had really wanted to try those garlic cheese curds after reading them."

"What the hey," Uma threw caution to the wind. "We're here to enjoy ourselves and Nat's treating us well. We'll get another order. I also want to kick things up in the spicy factor, Cajun shrimp and the jalapeño poppers!"

"Wow," Bruce was both impressed and bewildered. "Didn't know you girls could eat that much."

Phoebe grinned in a half drunk stupor. Besides the excellent taste, she'd been putting away the appetizers to have her mouth occupied whenever she felt awkward talking around Uma's college friends. Yet Phoebe and Uma put a solid dent in the second round of apps. And the third round when it was just the two of them, Bruce excusing himself to chat up another college friend, the DJ named Sheryl.

The food and the drinks flowed freely at Uma and Phoebe's table, each round bigger than the last. So much that by the time they were done, they had almost eaten out the menu.

"*Hooof*" Uma exhaled deeply. Her crop top left her food baby on full display, covering the last of her abs. "Damn. That was so tasty but I'm so full."

"Mmmm," Phoebe had been eating well lately and the good living and good eats all blurred together in her overstimulated mind as she stretched, oblivious to her appearance. While her backless shirt hadn't been cut as small as Uma's top she had her own roll of pudge sticking out. And she had needed to unbutton her daisy dukes, as her rump and engorged belly left little room in the tiny shorts.

Frankly, it was a surprise that neither one was comatose at this point.
1333312.title: Eat, Drink & Merry

choices: Phoebe is replaced by her understudy and is devestated
Phoebe is offered a different role
13333124.content:
Life for young Phoebe was, quite frankly, a ball at the moment.

Having managed to negotiate the night out with Uma relatively well, and by that its meant without obvious embarrassment, Phoebe managed to come out of her shell quite some.
This proved to be quite the fortunate development as, initially led by Uma herself but quickly turned into sincere requests from Phoebe, the pair became semi regular's at Nat's place.
Despite her initial skepticism towards some of Uma and Audrey's college mates, they all turned out to be pretty decent people.

Bruce wasn't there often but he was always good fun whenever he was, not to mention to die for eye candy, particularly when the alcohol had been flowing and he always seemed to have an eye out for Phoebe. Not in the sense of fancying her, he was DEFINITELY gay she found out, more of a brotherly compassion.
Then there was the elusive Sheryl. Nat's in house DJ was rarely free to talk but, after a rather awkward exchange with her thinking that Phoebe was Reagan, her and Phoebe soon interacted as often as she was available. It did help that she played most of Phoebe's favourite music all the time.
Then, of course, to complete the trio of regulars was Nat herself. The thick figured club owner still set Phoebe on edge for some reason but she was nice enough AND she provided food for the girls so she was alright in Phoebe's niave little eyes.

All in all, Phoebe and Uma were having a great time, going out together, getting drunk and eating some absolutely amazing food.
Of course, these moments being so enjoyable really made it suck when the reality hit home.

***************

All through the house there was silence, well, apart from the echoing groans and grunts of discomfort echoing from Phoebe's room.

*knock knock* "You ok in there Phebe's?" asked Ixchel rather sheepishly, not wanting to provoke an outburst from her cousin
*URGH* "No, Chel, I'm not...*groan*...ok!" called out Phoebe between grunts "Aud's shrunk my *grunt* god damn *URGH* jeans!"
"Oh no" moaned Ixchel, tentatively putting a hand on her cousin's door handle "you want a hand in there?"

Without waiting for permission, Ixchel turned the handle and managed to open the door a crack before having the division bounce back against here, likely caused by a pillow being thrown at it from the other side.

"NO!" screeched Phoebe "I'll fix it, leave me alone!"

"Oh...ok then" mumbled Ixchel before heading down the stairs with a slow trudge "Jeez, try and help some people"

With her cheeks burning red from exertion, Phoebe clung desperately onto the waistband of her skinny jeans, taking deep breaths before engaging in another attempt to pull the denim up into place.

All seemed to go well initially, the blue material encasing her calves, knees and tightening slightly around her thighs before slowing drastically to reveal the problem with their fit.
"Oh come on!" huffed the red head, continuing to pull harder as she tried to overcome the issue.

Of course, what she couldn't see was that her genetically gifted backside was proving to be the problem.
After a period of intense indulgence combined with her sedentary lifestyle, Phoebe had grown quite noticeably around her rear, to the point now that her jeans were unable to cover any more than a third of the bulbous buttocks.
Hours of sitting and consuming empty calories, both in liquid and food form, had had quite the expansive effect on Phoebe's naturally tight rear which now looked like a pair of oversized marshmallows squeezing out of her jeans. The poor things were so overtaxed that a line of pudge was overflowing the waistband giving her what could only be referred to as a 'double butt cheek' on each side.

Screaming out in dispair, Phoebe threw herself backwards onto her bed and cradled her face in her hands as her jeans slackly slid back down to her knees as she reflected on the past few days. In her heart of hearts, Phoebe knew that Audrey had nothing to do with her jeans not fitting, but she was too mad to think rationally like that.
If she had been in a position to think sensibly though, she would have realised that her rear wasn't the only part of her effected by her gluttony of late.

Alongside her booty swell, her hips had also taken on a layer of padding previously unaccounted for and on top of her hips sat the startings of a slight muffin top.

Still silently groaning to herself as she kicked of her jeans completely, Phoebe found herself staring at her clock and was presented with a whole different problem.

"Oh shoot! I've got to get to work!"

Throwing herself from her bed, nearly tripping over the bothersome jeans, Phoebe desperately looked for anything she could use as an alternative, finally stumbling across a stretchy ruffled skirt.
It would have to do.
Throwing the skirt up her legs and feeling it constrict slightly around her backside, Phoebe sighed audibly but accepted it actually went up and made for the door, bowling down the stairs and slamming the front door behind her.

Upon hearing the door slam, rather sleepily, Uma trudged out from her room wearing nothing more than a tattered basketball vest and some panties.
Staring at the front door, the athlete lazily scratched the side of her stomach which was looking far less toned than usual and slightly more rounded before rolling her eyes and going back in her room whilst muttering something about house mates and slamming doors.

***************

"Oh god, I'm sorry I'm late!" shouted Phoebe as she burst through the door to the studio where she was currently working with the crew.
"Don't worry honey, just get yourself to wardrobe and we'll see you in 10" called the director back across to her.

Grateful that filming hadn't fully started, Phoebe trotted swiftly towards her dressing room to get changed for the day.
Had she been in another frame of mind and more aware of the situation, the bottom heavy red head might have actually enjoyed the amount of wobbling that her backside was currently doing under its own momentum as she walked.

**10 minutes later**

"Is Phoebe ready yet or not?" shouted the director from his chair, looking around for any evidence of the red headed star of the show.
"She's not come out of her dressing room yet" muttered a nearby stage hand, expecting a rollicking from the director who was notoriously short fused when it came to punctuality.
Although Phoebe was no angel when it came to time management there was a long standing thing that she got away with a lot of things by being pretty and flirty.
Today was not one of those days though

All too similar to a few shout hours ago, Phoebe's distinct groans and moans could be heard through the closed door of the dressing room.

This time, with less patience however, head of wardrobe and makeup let herself into the room.
"You sound like you're struggling there sweetie, you ok?" offered Mary Jane, as she looked over the situation before her, trying to take it all in.
"I'm fine...*URGH*...thank...you!" groaned the actress as she fought to pull her tights up which were protesting like her jeans.

However, unlike the restrictive denim, the tights finally gave way and hugged her hips tightly as the smooth material slid over her engorged rear.
With a sigh of relief, Phoebe composed herself before taking a step forward to exit the room.
The one step was all it took.

A loud tear could be heard throughout the studio as the poor, thinly stretched tights encasing Phoebe's lower half gave up and split wide open allowing her newly developing rear assets to surge forth through the gap.
Perfectly aware of what had just happened, Phoebe flushed crimson red immediately before squatting down on the floor and bursting into tears.
Unfortunately for her, the squatting motion caused the tights to rip even further, only stopping when they hit the stretched waistband around her hips.
13333124.title: Phoebe's indulgences start catching up with...

choices: Reagan, who's getting jealous about the size of Phoebe's rear.
Audrey, who tries to encourage Phoebe to diet with her.
Uma, suggesting more of the same partying, and the spiral continues.
Ixhel, who tries to offer Phoebe a different outlook of her situation.
133331241.content:
"It was so humiliating!!" sobbed Phoebe.

There was no need to turn on the soap operas or reality trash on the TV at 8422 Fordham Avenue, as Phoebe had brought plenty of drama with her when she was relieved from work.

Usually one to cuddle in her pillows and sob hysterically for days whenever she was down in the dumps from a lost boyfriend or the like, Phoebe's developing appetite had led her down the more calorific intensive approach as she had cleared the freezer of its ice cream pints. She had them arranged around her at the breakfast nook. Even though it was these kinds of habits that had led her to her current predicament.

To drown out her sorrows in ice cream, Phoebe had dressed down to little more than her night clothes and a bathrobe. The sash was tied loose so Phoebe's growing pudge and bulbous backside were easily visible.

"I was going to be a star!!" cried Phoebe as she spooned candy bar crunch into her mouth. "They had scouted my agency and said I had just the right look."

In looks, Phoebe was a knockout. For acting...well, a lot could be done with editing. All through initial rehearsals it was shown that Phoebe needed those acting classes at college but fostering talent was less expensive than dealing with more credible actress's demands. Still, she had been partnered with an understudy, Michelle, both to improve her acting during training and as a back up in case Phoebe was ever disposed. While her chemistry with the other stars wasn't as great (as the part required being boy crazy, which Phoebe could do in her sleep) she had more of an acting background and could uncannily nail Phoebe's look after plenty of makeup.

What nobody had expected, nor had Phoebe fully come to terms with, was their aspiring lead porking-up! It had been pandemonium after Phoebe's tights had split on set. She was bawling her eyes out, staffers were trying to assist her and make her look decent, shooting that day was postponed until the afternoon. As for the director, who had gotten by with Phoebe's flirty tendencies, he couldn't deny that Phoebe's ass looked damn fine even as it was fat! But the wardrobe malfunction was the last scrape of the proverbial iceberg. Phoebe's stomach and thighs had also taken their share of weight and that didn't match the vision of the character for the TV show.

So the waterworks were renewed afresh when Phoebe had to be told she was being replaced.

"I can't believe them!!" She licked a heaping spoonful of mint chip. "They said I no longer 'got it.' I thought I was just 'getting it!' You know?"

Phoebe had been pouring her heart out unwarranted to any of her roommate's time as she continued her spiel and pity ice cream party. Mint chip joined the growing pile of emptied candy bar crunch, rainbow sorbet, dulce le duce, and banana's foster cartons.

"Not really?" came the reply, as her reluctant listener passed over the tissue box as Phoebe blew her nose for the umpteenth time.

Was it Reagan, Audrey, Uma or Ixchel listening to Phoebe's woes?
133331241.title: Sorrows and Ice Cream

choices: Phoebe keeps eating her feelings with consequences
Reagan's jealousy manifests unexpectedly
1333312411.content:
"I mean, you weren't that great anyway?" interjected the ever blunt Reagan, bemused at her twin's evident heart break over the job she was useless at.

"I can't believe you'd say that Reagan!" whined Phoebe as she tore the lid from a tub of toffee apple pie before plunging her spoon into the creamy contents, a task made easier by the more liquid consistency granted to the ice cream over time of been left out of the freezer.

"Oh come off it Phebes, you knew thats why they got Michelle in" pressed Reagan, tussling her cascading hair slightly as she brushed her fingers through it "plus, as far as what your 'agency' said, keep eating like that and the only look you'll have is that of a pig" mused the redhead, quietly but not quite enough.

"Screw you Reagan" mumbled Phoebe through a mouthful of fruity ice cream, her spoon already reloading, waiting for the space to open up between her cold sticky lips. A girl in her emotional state had no time for clean eating and, as such, wore a rather uncharacteristic smear of cream around her mouth.

Reagan chuckled at her sisters attempt at anger before continuing, oh so supportively.
"Hey, if you haven't noticed my leggings are still in tact" mused Reagan with a pointed smile before hopping to her feet and turning her back to Phoebe "see?"
Although she was been an arse about it, Phoebe couldn't help but agree that her sister was right.
Before her stood the pert cheeks of Reagan's backside, wiggling slightly as the twin swayed her hips teasingly, and, although tightly stretched, the material encasing the bulging assets was indeed intact, clear as day from beneath the baggy t-shirt Reagan had bunched up to expose her backside along with a slither of her back.

Phoebe sighed heavily before proceeding with her crusade against any and everything dairy in the house, quickly finding herself at the bottom of the tub.
Peering over her shoulder, Reagan couldn't help but smile, far too pleased with her self exhibition to pass comment on Phoebe's continued binging.

"Well this is just rubbish" complained Phoebe, tossing the empty carton aside and pulling her robe slightly tighter around herself for warmth

"It's not THAT bad Phebes" comforted Reagan with a smidgen of sincerity behind her words as she sat down with a gentle thump of her butt spreading slightly on her seat "last I heard some guys LIKE girls with HUGE arses"

"It's not THAT big Reagan" defended Phoebe, throwing her spoon at her unsuspecting twin, leaving a sizeable red mark up her arm to go along with the resonating smacking sound from impact

"Ow, bitch" spat Reagan, clutching at her arm whilst Phoebe giggled into her hand, amused by the effect of her outburst "you can get me some chocolate for that, assuming you haven't eating it all, elephant arse"

"Ohhhh chocolate" cooed Phoebe with a twinkle in her eye, almost oblivious of the demand as she sprung to her feet and strutted towards the poor unsuspecting cupboards.

Still clutching her arm and muttering many a profanity under her breath, Reagan just glanced up at her sister as she walked away and found herself surprised at what she saw.
'Woah' muttered the twin under her breath as she watched Phoebe's bloated rear jiggle away from its perch at the nook.
Now, Reagan wasn't stupid and was well aware of the fact that Phoebe had been making like a birthday balloon over the past few weeks but she hadn't truly noticed the extent of the expansion and...quite the expansion it was.

As a naturally bottom heavy duet, the twins were no strangers to ample rears and tight bottom wear but Reagan was suddenly aware that, for the first time in forever, Phoebe was now the more bottom heavy twin.
Even confined within her fluffy bathrobe, Phoebe's wobbling cheeks could be clearly seen fighting for dominance over a thicker silhouette than either twin previously possessed.
The increase in size became even more apparent as Phoebe took to her tiptoes to reach a shelf whilst her robe hung off her shelf like behind, displaying the impressive rear bulge.

Content with her acquisitions, Phoebe turned tail and headed back to her seat alongside her sister.
As she walked, hands laden with treats aplenty, Reagan couldn't help but notice the extent of the damage to her sister's front.
Robe now open at the front, a clear view of Phoebe's bloated stomach could be seen, albeit not improved with her still continuing binge, but it was obvious that the girl had put on weight around her middle.

Sure, her hips were flaring slightly more which only accented her plumpening rear, but her usually tight and trim stomach was straining her bed top beyond its capacity.
Quite literally.
A gentle curve was protruding from her shirt, now sitting higher than the redhead usually cared to wear them now residing just south of her belly button, as the fabric was pulled taut over a considerably more chubby abdominal region than the twin had previously sported.
'Well at least she's getting fat all over' mused Reagan to herself whilst a niggle worked at the back of her mind 'the size of her ass really boils my piss though'

"Here you go" chirped Phoebe, breaking Reagan from her thought as a chocolate bar dropped in front of her
"Thanks" muttered Reagan, peeling the wrapper off as she continued to fume about Phoebe's developing assets
Phoebe just smiled at her as she took a sizeable bite from a much larger bar than the one she had given to her sister

"Woah, what's with the size of that?" cried Reagan, nearly launching herself out of her seat with her outburst
"I'm still sad" retorted Phoebe after swallowing her mouthful, a delicate smear of chocolate adorning her lips alongside the ice cream as the not so elegant airhead returned to her chocolate

'That bitch is deliberately making her ass bigger than mine!' Reagan thought angrily as she bit into her chocolate

"You ok Reagan?" asked Phoebe, genuine concern flooding her face as she spoke
"Oh yeah, fine" mumbled her twin, rather assertively biting into the bar in her hand
"Good, you know you can talk to me about anything, you've helped me so much today" smiled the ditzy twin
"Oh I bet" growled Reagan, but luckily her passive aggressiveness was lost on the innocent recipient who was too busy stuffing her face
1333312411.title: Green-eyed twin sis

choices: Phoebe goes out with Tiana to blow off steam.
Phoebe goes to see her agent.
Phoebe resigns herself to finding a job.
How is the jealous-bitten Reagan?
13333124111.content:
"I'm going to school!" shouted Phoebe to noone in particularly as she opened the front door, shouldering her bag.

Despite all expectations, the conversation between Phoebe and her twin had actually helped the aspiring actress. It had taken the best part of a week to get her out of her pyjamas and she was still obliviously putting food away like she'd never eaten before but she was on the up now and getting back into her routine.

Despite her ditzy tendencies, Phoebe did actually enjoy going to college.
All her friends were there and, of course, it gave her chance to act which, in her own words, was 'all she lived for'.
That did ignore her fact she also 'lived for' guys but that was besides the point.

Stepping out onto the townhouse steps, Phoebe felt a gentle pull on the front door as she was about to close it and instinctively let go.

"Hey sweetie, mind if I walk with you?" asked Audrey as she slid through the door before it closed her in.

"Sure!" smiled Phoebe, missing Audrey hip checking the doorframe on her way out. Had it been Reagan an undoubtedly scathing comment would have been passed.
