Between their different schedules and social circles, the two sisters rarely got the opportunity to socialise together, even less so without the accompanying audience of the rest of the household, so the morning walk proved pleasant and showed the evident friendship between sisters.
Audrey just wished she didn't have to make things awkward with her little sister.

"So you got many classes today Phebes?" asked Audrey, biting her lip cautiously as she knew where the conversation had to go.

"Nope, just the one but then I'm meeting up with some friends, haven't seen them in ages!" replied Phoebe, smiling ear to ear as she spoke.

"That's nice" quietly returned Audrey, taking a deep breath before continuing "Look, we all know you've had a hard time after loosing that role a couple of weeks back but..."

Phoebe stopped in the middle of the street, resulting in a disgruntled business man walking into the back of her that the oblivious redhead had not even been aware of.

"Yeah, and it's still hard now Aud, it really sucks" the younger Durant insisted with tears starting to well in her eyes

'Damn it' thought Audrey 'better get it over with now'
"It's just that, the house could really do with some extra money coming in and I wondered if you'd be able to find a job to help."

Audrey was never one for confrontation and her mother hen tendencies were desperately trying to fight to the front so she could comfort her emotional sister but she had to resist.

"Maybe" shrugged Phoebe, flicking her hair back whilst staring dejectedly at the pavement "I just need to get a new role and I need all my spare time to do that"

"You've got your agent though for that" said Audrey, a little more heavy handed than she may have intended

"I guess" murmured the redhead as she slowly started to walk again, suggesting Audrey had got away with her slight bite

"So you'll try?" asked the Durant matriach, putting a hand on Phoebe's shoulder as they resumed walking

Phoebe just nodded, sniffing rather forcefully to hold her tears back

"Great" smiled Audrey, pulling Phoebe into a proper hug now "plus, now you're back to college you'll be able to use your meal card a bit rather than the kitchen which will help"
Big mistake

"Oh screw you Audrey" screamed Phoebe, tossing her sisters arm off her shoulders "you're just as bad as that stupid film company, why does only Reagan get me!"
And with that outburst, Phoebe stormed off in front of her sister making a beeline for college.

"Oy vey" muttered Audrey, watching her sister marching away from her.
The blonde hadn't meant anything by it but it was hard to deny the young redhead did make a sizable dint in the weekly food budget.
Phoebe may have actually had grounds to be upset, mind, were it not for the sheer amount of movement from her ever increasing rear end as she stormed off, jiggling with every step.

**********

Phoebe's acting class was quite interesting today, they were dealing with physical interactions, stage fights and the likes. Luckily Phoebe was pissed so it worked in her favour, that is, until she actually slapped her partner.

"Ok, I think that's enough for today" called the tutor on the back of the echoing slap, stepping between the two girls.

"Oh my god, sorry Lizzy" offered Phoebe, hands clasped over her mouth

"Don't worry about it" smiled Lizzy, patting her on the shoulder whilst nursing her cheek "just warn me next time"

Phoebe smiled with a small giggle as she went to grab her things and trotted out of the door.
Adjusting her bag strap and sliding a shoe back onto her foot, Phoebe stopped in her tracks as a rather menacing voice came from behind her

"And where do you think you're going missy?"

Scared, Phoebe slowly turned round to see who the voice had come from and immediately dropped her bag, flinging herself backwards with a loud squeal.

"Oh my god, you guys! I've missed you so much!" squawked the redhead as she hugged the two people behind her

**********

Without hesitation, the three amigos headed to the university food court, grabbed themselves some food and found a table away in one corner.
Ever the social butterfly, Phoebe was never without any number of friends, but the two sat opposite her were definitely her best and closest.

Tiana was Latina, the same age as Phoebe and was studying dance. The two had come across each other during an intersubject coalition project in their first year involving their respective studies and had never looked back since.
Ever since, the two had become near inseparable, often leading the charge on nights out and class projects alike.
In slight contrast to the redhead, Tiana had become quite the curvaceous chick as a result of their partying and sported quite the thick figure, largely in an hourglass shape. Unlike a good deal of college girls though, Tiana drove straight into that skid and adored her body, not unlike her parade of one night stands.

Alongside the wild party girl, there was Ryan who, for lack of a better words, was nothing like Phoebe at all.
The quiet guy studied English Lit or something boring like that and rarely ever made his presence known at parties. On the contrary, he was more often than not the stand by 'designated driver' or 'overnight stop over'.
As such, Phoebe and Ryan's friendship had largely blossomed around a toilet bowl, him holding her hair back as she puked up many a litre of cheap booze.
All the same, he was sweet and Phoebe wouldn't have him anywhere else than by her side.

"...and then, they fired me for splitting my costume!" announced Phoebe to her friends, punctuating the sentence with a tirade of fries passing her lips.
Tiana and Ryan cautiously glanced at each other at this announcement. Upon reuniting with Phoebe, it had not gone amiss that she was...more shapely than the last time they saw her.

"Let's be honest though girl, not to diss you, but you keep eating fries like that your ass is gonna be bigger than mine" interjected Tiana, idly stirring her milkshake as she spoke.

"Pfft" spat Phoebe as she took a large bite of burger "I wish my ass was as big as yours, T"

Now, it's important to note that Phoebe's oblivious nature granted her a great deal of respect for Tiana's outlook on her size even if irony made her easily offended at her own bottomly girth.

"I'm not kidding girl, butt check!" declared Tiana, standing from her seat and turning tail to Ryan.
Not one to shy away from messing around, Phoebe rolled her eyes, scarfed down another handful of fries and joined her friend.
As the two girls squeezed together, hip to hip with arms laced around each others hips, Ryan couldn't help but feel bemused at his current position. He loved Phoebe and Tiana no end but they certainly knew how to tease his quiet nature.

"So?" called the girls, glancing over their adjoined shoulders "whats the verdict?"
Brought from his thoughts, Ryan played the part, leaning back in his seat and holding his chin in a thoughtful pose, one which brought a giggle from the two women.
On the left stood Phoebe, daisy dukes and leggings encasing her definitely increased rear whilst, on the right, stood Tiana also wearing leggings albeit considerably more stretched than Phoebe's. It went without saying that the Hispanic bombshell was in possession of the larger assets.

"Well at this particular moment its fair to say that Tiana is definitely still the superior size by quite a margin..."
"Thanks babe" winked Tiana through the middle of Ryan's sentence
"...but Phebes is definitely on the rise" summarised Ryan "I mean, those dukes look tight man"
"Aww really?" groaned Phoebe, stroking her backside to test the tightness of the denim "I only got these last week"
"Sorry Phebes, definitely tight" conceded Ryan as the two girls returned to their seats

Not one to linger, Phoebe continued to moan about the other problem plaguing her happy existence.
"Audrey wants me to get a job as well, apparently I eat too much at home" grumbled Phoebe, working her way through her burger.
Again, unsure of how to proceed, Tiana and Ryan looked at each other before replying.
"You got any ideas? No acting jobs coming up?" asked Ryan
"Nothing, I need to see my agent" mused Phoebe, wiping her hands of grease.
"Anyway" Tiana butted in again "more importantly, when are you and me partying again? Sounds like you need a blow out hon"

Phoebe couldn't help but agree, she had been stressed and Tiana always knew how to cheer her up.

So many decisions for such a ditzy girl to make...
13333124111.title: More eating, more problems

choices: Reagan and Uma go to the buffet to make their plans.
Neither of the women find working out to be what they expect.
While Reagan has her gaining plan, Phoebe continues with bad habits.
Cut to a month later, as we see the results of the roommates' machinations.
13333124112.content:
While Phoebe had lifted herself out of her funk after talking with her twin (and eating plenty of ice cream) Reagan got into her own funk. For the life of her, she couldn't approach a world where Phoebe had the bigger rear of the two. Yes, she was plumping up like a damn turkey but that wobbly, bootylicious rear brought instant envy in Reagan's eyes.

Reagan had always considered herself the 'hotter' of the two twins. She was the older by two seconds and the first to blossom in late middle school, don't let anyone else tell you otherwise. So she was caught on the blindside that while Phoebe was gaining weight, a proportionate amount of it went to the twin's shared best asset.

And now Phoebe's ass eclipsed her own! Reagan couldn't let that stand, nor could she eat her chocolate bar in a dignified manner as she demolished it in large bites. After a second chocolate bar she went into her toaster pastry stash, not even popping them in the toaster, as she ate frosted raspberry and cookies and cream packets plain.

Clearly, both girls had the phenotype to put most of their weight in their rears. So all Reagan would have to go is start eating as much as Phoebe (or rather, more than Phoebe) and her booty would swell out more than her younger twin's in no time. All Reagan would have to do is make sure she didn't gain weight anyplace else which would tone down her hotness.

With a box of mixed pastries in hand, Reagan went to the one other resident of the townhouse that could help her in her mission.


"Wait, you want to work out with me?" Uma scratched her shoulder, confused.

The ex-athlete’s confusion was twofold as Reagan had never taken up her offer of gym days in the past. The fiery redhead considered her good looks a gift of genetics and thus didn’t consider the need to work-out. Plus, going to the gym left her smelly and sweaty, something Reagan didn’t like.

Also, Uma was currently not the star reference of personal fitness anymore as she had gone to seed. She had been partying and chowing down at the same places as Phoebe but the black hedonistic athlete wore her weight very differently. Her abs were mostly covered by a fine layer of pudge from a growing gut. Her thighs had thickened out and her rear had filled out, although Uma never had the silhouette of the twins. The other half of her recent gain had settled around her upper body. Her shoulders and arms had rounded out, becoming less toned, and her chest looked to have accumulated more fat than her sports bras had ever been used to.

It didn’t help that Uma had been spending most of her time between parties lounging about the townhouse, wearing little more than team jerseys and her panties. Reagan had just woken her up from a ‘power nap.’

“Yeah,” Reagan spoke between mouthfuls of cramming toaster pastries down her mouth, confusing Uma all the more. “Like, you’ve been telling me about all the health benefits before, and you know tons about body shaping.” The glutes were the biggest muscle on the body, weren’t they? Reagan just needed to enhance that muscle and keep her fat stores centered there to have a spectacular ass to put her fattened twin to shame!

“Geez Reagan, I’m surprised you want to but I’m not really available…” Uma couldn’t think of a decent excuse to explain away her laziness. Her natural talent for sports had been hampered by her lack of dedication before, as Uma had fallen into another destructive spiral.

“Come on, I really need your help!” Reagan munched. “You know the important parts of a workout, Uma, nobody else here understands fitness the way you do. Tell you what, let’s have lunch and make gym plans over that. I’ll take you to Brass Tops, my treat.”

Reagan had Uma hook, link and sinker as the black roommate reflexively licked her lips at the mention of Brass Tops. 8422 Fordham Avenue was adjacent to a developing dining and shopping hub and Brass Tops was one of the best. It was a buffet that offered plenty of ritzy options for its price like prime rib and crab legs. It was one of Uma’s favorite places it eat. And Reagan liked that it was all you could eat, as she looked to be putting that to the test on the quest for more booty filling calories.

The temptation of Brass Tops nearly brought Uma into the mindset of training with Reagan. Her mind held out for one last condition. “Okay, but I’ve got one last request.”

“Name it,” Reagan replied.

“Ya got pumpkin spice tarts in there?” Uma asked with a devilish grin.

She caught Reagan mid-bite, her cheeks filled with crumbs and fillings as she scowled darkly. “Fine,” Reagan spat out. She hated the loss of calories for her warped plan to gain in her butt and the loss of the most treasured tarts in her secret stash.

“Thanks Reagan!” Uma also popped open the pumpkin spice without toasting.
13333124112.title: A Mission Downunder

choices: Reagan and Uma celebrate their first ‘successful’ outing
Back at the gym and some time has passed
133331241122.content:
And so a plan was made.
Over an extremely decedent meal at Brass Tops Reagan and Uma came to an agreement whereby the two would work out together at least twice a week.
There was also talk of making Brass Tops a regular thing, you know, to treat themselves and balance out the exercise appropriately, although that was here nor there at this point.

Now, Reagan was getting changed ready for her first gym session and she was pleased.
Wearing nothing more than a sports bra and full length sports leggings, the flaming haired twin was checking herself out in her bedroom mirror and the view was good.

“Mhmph you sexy bitch, Phoebe can’t handle this” commentated Reagan as she looked herself up and down, turning to examine all her tightly packed curves one bulge at a time.
Glancing over her shoulder, arse facing her mirror squarely, Reagan couldn’t help but chew her lip slightly in admiration of her most abundant asset, giving the bulging left half a healthy slap just to watch it wobble within its stretchy confines.

Lost in thought, Reagan was wrenched back to reality by the cloying shouts of Uma from the hallway.

“You ready Reagan?” shouted her guide and mentor for the day.

Reagan groaned before straightening up with her hands on her hips before issuing a curt nod to her reflection.
“Time to but that pig in her place” muttered Reagan in regards to her twin.

************

“Oh god!” groaned Reagan as her feet pounded against the treadmill she was on, vast patches of sweat darkening the natural grey and pink of her outfit.
Panting desperately for breath with her entire body aching as she mindlessly continued, Reagan wanted nothing more than to stop the punishment she was forcing herself through.

‘God damn Phoebe, forcing me to teach her a lesson!’ thought Reagan, gritting her teeth as sweat poured down her face as locks of fiery hair clung to her burning cheeks.
As she cursed her sister, Reagan thought the moment would never end until suddenly it did with a crashing halt involving ribs into the treadmill control panel.

Reeling with a whole new ache in her stomach, Reagan shot a look at Uma who had activated the emergency stop on the machine.
“What the hell was that for?!” barked Reagan, cradling her middle whilst angrily brushing her hair out of her face, albeit ineffectively as most of her hair stayed plastered to her face over her eyes and mouth.

Watching her housemates sharp breaths blow her hair in and out, Uma couldn’t help but laugh.
“Alright Red, you lasted...3 minutes before sounding ready to die so I offered a bit of mercy” retorted Uma simply as she took a deep chug from her protein shake.

Contorting her face quite viciously to display her disgust, Reagan threw her hands up and then slapping her shapely thighs.
“Well it’s 3 minutes more than you’ve done tubby!” spat Reagan, going straight for the jugular as she often did.

“Hey!” defended Uma, nervously sipping her shake “I’m bulking for optimum muscle gain”

“Yeah right” muttered Reagan, folding her arms whilst glaring at her housemate “well you’re my trainer so tell me what to do”

“Ok, ok” started Uma, much more calmly this time “how about we try the rowing machines?”

“Yeah whatever” grunted Reagan as she stepped off the treadmill, veering violently as both feet hit the solid floor
Uma snorted behind her, having frequently seen gym patrons stagger off treadmills often.
“Shut up” grunted Reagan as she wiggled towards the rowing machines.

************

“This...is worse...than the treadmill!” shouted Reagan between pulls of the rower, glaring angrily at the still stood and inactive Uma at the foot of the machine
The sadist in Uma was apparently present as all she did was laugh at the younger girls suffering as she drained the last of her shake.
“Oh screw you” hissed the redhead as she continued to yank on the handlebar as Uma continued to chortle.

With sweat pouring off her brow and what felt like her entire body drenched, Reagan caught a glimpse of two guys behind her in the mirror on exercise bikes who were far from subtly staring at her sizable rear arcing in the saddle of the rowing machine.
Never one to shy away from pleasing guys, Reagan managed to dig deeper and continue the show that was been so well received from behind her.
Noticing her increase in effort, the two guys openly perked up, one even catching Reagan’s eye with a wink in the mirror.

**************

Much like all things though, Reagan’s little show came to a crashing halt as her lacking fitness caught up with her and she pulled herself up from the infernal machine, breathing heavily as she did.

“Finished?” asked Uma with a sly grin.

Unable to speak, Reagan simply nodded whilst gulping in air, wiping sweat from her forehead as she staggered towards the door.

Laughing once again, Uma followed after her progeny as they passed the two gentlemen that had been ogling Reagan.
“You’ll be seeing more of her boys” declared Uma with a wry grin, teasingly slapping one of them on the back as she passed.

Marginally aware of Uma’s comment, Reagan couldn’t help but smile to herself
‘Damn right there’ll be more’ mused the redhead, a fraction more spring returning to her step as she limped out of the gym doors, still panting heavily.
133331241122.title: Run, Reagan, Run!

choices: Reagan binges and exercises, although the results aren’t to her liking.
Reagan draws a lot of attention at the gym, not just because of her booty.
Gym membership and eating out soon leave Reagan and Uma without much money.
Meanwhile, Phoebe’s friends take notice about how much she’s been gaining.
1333312411221.content:
“I call dibs,” Reagan gasped as she stumbled into the townhouse, “on the shower.”

“You know, we could have just gone at the gym,” Uma replied.

“Ew,” Reagan gagged. While she liked to show off her curves she didn’t want to be seen showering in such a sorry state after their first workout.

“Suit yourself,” Uma said, her stomach full of protein shake but still betraying a rumble at the thought of their ‘victory’ meal at Brass Tops. Even if she had been working out Uma wouldn’t want to go there in her gym clothes. Although she found her natural musk to be a primal sort of attraction, so unlike Reagan all she would do would be to change clothes.

Much to Reagan’s dismay, the shower sounded occupied when she got to the bathroom. “What the frick?” She pounded on the door. “Hey! You finished up in there?”

The shower turned off. Then after a minute, Reagan saw her own face shrouded by steam and towels.

“Oh hi Reagan,” said Phoebe. “Back so soon?”

Reagan cringed. “Well, you have to work your way up when going to the gym.” The sight of her twin wearing nothing but towels filled her with further determination on her body shaping scheme. Phoebe’s hips and rear challenged the knot she had made with the towel tied around her lower half. Reagan could note every inch of blubber and chunky love handles settled on her plumping twin’s middle. Water dripping from the bulge of her budding potbelly. Even her breasts looked a mite bigger.

Gawd, how much does she really eat? Reagan thought to herself. It didn't matter. Once Reagan could increase her calories and workouts she’d have as large of a rear and still look hot, while her twin turned into a blimp.

“It’s all yours,” Phoebe offered, pulling Reagan out of her thoughts, as she tightened the knot on the towel. The tension was needed as her wobbling, jiggling backside threaded to squirm it’s way out of the cover providing Phoebe her modesty.

“Keep to the plan, keep to the plan,” Reagan muttered to herself as she stripped to get ready for her shower. Although when she turned on the shower she gave out a shrill cry at the chill. “Damnit Phoebe!!” Her twin had used up all the hot water.


“I can’t believe her,” Reagan was still miffed by the lack of hot water even as she and Uma entered Brass Tops. She had changed into a maroon long sleeved shirt that left her shoulders bare and a pair of leaf patterned leggings. Subconsciously she had chose clothing with a lot of give.

“Just what’s got you so worked up about Phoebe?” Uma asked, still trying to sort out Reagan’s motivations. The ex-athlete was in casual club wear, with an indigo shirt and ripped jeans. She was fully clothed although a definite bulge could be seen about her midriff as she started getting chubby.

Reagan just fumed in silent reply.

“Oh look,” Uma was distracted by the menu as they approached the customer counter at Brass Tops. “It’s Barbecue day! Score!!”

Brass Tops was aptly named as the buffet lines and serving trays were brass, as the restaurant used other earthy, neutral tones to compliment the decor. Signature entrees would be traded out over the course of the week. When barbecue was featured it included dry rub pork ribs, smoked sausage, beef brisket, baked chicken and some of the best sides you could pick for these dishes, like coleslaw, baked beans and for Uma’s favorite collard greens that put her own mother’s to shame!

Since dining at Brass Tops earlier in the week Reagan and Uma refamilarized themselves with the layout of the buffet. There was the salad line, the condiment line, the entree line, the sides line, the seafood line, the grill station, and the dessert bar.

Both ladies hit the lines as soon as they paid for the table. Uma sat down first, with a plate loaded with ribs, cornbread, greens, fried okra and a chicken drumstick. She had grabbed a Pepsi to drink. She happily forked into the greens and munched on the drumstick as Reagan took considerably longer up at the lines.

The reason soon became apart as Reagan sat down three plates! The first was a salad of spring greens and broccoli loaded with thick creamy ranch, bacon bits, and shredded cheeses. The second had ribs, smoked sausage and fish sticks with tarter sauce, with macaroni on the side. The third was a hodgepodge of baked beans, rice, beef taquitos, oven baked chips, green bean casserole, cheddar biscuits and orange jello.

“Damn girl!” Uma said. “Trying for everything at once?”

“I’m tired and sore,” Reagan complained. “So I didn’t want to go up again.” Besides her workout fatigue, Reagan was also in calorie loading mode and didn’t want to lose any potential gain she could direct towards her ass on her journey to beat Phoebe with the better booty.

“Whatever you say,” Uma shrugged, returning to her drumstick. “At least when I go up next I can get freshly made food.”

For the next fifteen minutes the two young women ate in silence, obsessed with their food. Uma’s appetite had been growing alongside Phoebe’s with their frequent clubbing, as she remained oblivious to how she had enabled both Phoebe’s gain and Reagan’s crazed ambition.

The younger roommate was finding that, much like exercising, she might have bitten off more than she could chew with this ‘over-eating and workout’ diet to reclaim the lost title of the bigger Durant twin ass. Reagan had only started overeating and once she had finished her salad plate the other two mocked her. Each was still half full even as her stomach started feeling tight. While Uma was up for her second helping Reagan took the reprieve to lean back in their booth, face twisted in agony as she struggled to consume everything she felt she needed to catch back up with Phoebe.

“Throwing in the towel, Red?” Uma teased, with a repeat plate of her first only she had traded the drumstick for a petite steak off the grill. While Uma was eating more she ate for indulgent comfort and wasn’t aiming to stuff herself silly.

At the mention of towel Reagan thought back to catching Phoebe coming out of the shower. Her towel clad twin had left little to the imagination of how much she had gained weight. Yes, her thighs were meaty and her belly had too much wobble ... but that zatfig ass!!

“No way,” Reagan pushed out a second wind, stabbing at her smoked sausage with a fork and following that up with rice. Her stubbornness rallied against the pain she was feeling in her stomach as she wanted to prove Uma wrong, making more progress towards her plates.

Uma ended up with dinner and a show as she laughed inwardly watching Reagan proceed to chow down like a woman possessed. She quickly threw together a brownie sundae up at the dessert bar to not miss the laborious meal Reagan pushed herself through.

After they had been dining there for about an hour Uma’s spoon rattled in her empty sundae bowl. “Man girl, that was some good eating.” She scratched her stomach, pleasantly stuffed, grinning as she took in the discomfort on Reagan’s face. The redhead had sat shock still for over five minutes after she had completed the Herculean effort of demolishing her three loaded plates.

“You didn’t want dessert Red?”

“*hurgh*” Reagan did want the calories to soak into her ass but her overtaxed stomach had blocked out any future thoughts of food in her brain.

“Keep this up and we may have to work out three or more times a week,” Uma commented with some self-realization.

“Fine and dandy,” Reagan replied, mentally tracking herself through booty-popping exercises as she fought against the urge to fall asleep.
1333312411221.title: Showing Some Brass

choices: More food and less gym makes Reagan a big girl.
Phoebe really HAS been getting big!
'Nervous' and 'Crude' continue to take an interest in Reagan.
Uma’s weight suffers at the hands of both twins.
13333124112212.content:
URRRRRP!
It wasn’t a particularly loud burp, didn’t even make Reagan’s top 10, but it was enough to warrant a comment from the girl on the redhead’s left.

“Urgh, pig” grumbled the sweaty blonde as she dismounted from the step machine, stretching slightly as she did before strutting off to another item of torture.

“She’s just jealous” mumbled Reagan to herself as she also dismounted her machine before quickly hunching over to catch her breath.

In hindsight, Uma’s suggestion of hitting such an extensive breakfast buffet before going to the gym probably wasn’t the best of ideas but Reagan was too lost in the, to her, simple equation of calorie loading and exercise.

Certainly, her common sense didn’t extend far enough to inform the fiery haired girl that dumping three mounded plates of greasy breakfast meats and syrupy pastries into her stomach was recipe for such reactions as had repulsed her gym neighbour not a few moments before.

As Reagan found her lungs filling with oxygen again and the sound of blood pumping in her ears receded, the young gym goer latched onto the sound of two guys voices saying things she was all too fond of.

“Hey, you see red over there?” whispered one voice to his friend

“Dayum boy, I would wear that ass all day long” whispered the other voice, albeit rather crudely.

Touched by the attention, Reagan bit her lip teasingly before turning on her heels to face her compliment givers.

“You boys should see the front if you like the back so much” teased Reagan, hands on her hips as she spoke.

Although smiling as she turned, the two guys now facing Reagan soon changed their looks to those of less interest.
“Maybe you should turn back round red and we can just look at the ass again, ok?” retorted the cruder guy with a mocking twirl of his finger.

Now, despite her well made plan fuelled by jealousy aimed at Phoebe, Reagan was experiencing some side effects at this point aside from random burps.
Clad in her usual gym leggings and sports bra, a thin hoodie had also joined the ensemble, covering her shoulders and arms.
The hoodie also had the added bonus of concealing her slightly meatier hips and chubbier sides from behind.
Front facing, however, all these extra features were on show along with the chubby curve of Reagan’s blossoming tummy.

Usually a perfectly flat specimen of attractiveness for male suitor aplenty, Reagan was sporting a delicate layer of puppy fat that had softened her middle completely, both visibly and to the touch.
Thousands of empty calories had softened the redhead’s figure far beyond what she had intended for in her quest for ass domination but, whilst her sister remained ahead in the derrière department, Reagan could not stop.

Partly due to the tightness of her leggings but also contributed to by her softened midriff, Reagan’s tummy was verging on bulging ever so slightly over the confines of her waistband.
The whole effect was capped by the delicate punctuation of said middle by her characteristically deep belly button that had seen many a guy take many a shot from it as Reagan laid on a table, lapping the attention up.

“Pfft, I ain’t interested in you anyway” scoffed Reagan as she turned again, grabbing a disposable towel and wiping her forehead as she left.

“Oh yeah, that’s what we want chunker!” shouted Mr Crude after Reagan as her ass wobbled like a plate of jelly restricted in her leggings.

************

‘Chunker!’ fumed Reagan in her head as she angrily tore into a extra large twin twix she’d conned a much sweeter guy into buying her from the vending machine ‘doesn’t he know you have to bulk before losing weight?! That’s what Uma said anyway’
Not that Uma was even at the gym, she’d disappeared after making a pig of herself at breakfast.

‘Maybe he has a point though’ pondered Reagan as she glanced down at her stomach, idly stroking the bulging curve with her thin fingers.
Lost in thought as she slowly caressed her tummy, gentle shivers radiating from her touch, provoking a small smile from her shapely lips as she did.

‘Pull yourself together Reagan, if he thinks you’re fat thank god Phoebe was it at the gym’
The bitchy comment did make Reagan smirk, Phoebe was seriously chubbing up lately.
If only her god damn ass would stop growing then this feud could end with Reagan back as queen of the rear.

“Well well, look who it is” called an all too familiar voice

“Urgh” groaned Reagan under her breath as she swallowed the last of her twix as the rowdy guys from inside the gym walked towards her.

“Little chunker stopped off at the vending machine huh?” teased the crude guy, irony hitting Reagan as she noticed a kitkat chunky in his hand

“Hey, you liked my ass so much I figured I’d contribute a little extra for when you got out” plainly stated Reagan with a shrug of her still slender shoulders, licking her lips rather seductively.

The crude guy chuckled with an understanding nod and a glance to his friend.

“You know what red, you take this” he said as he tossed the kitkat towards Reagan with a wry grin and a wink “and you give me a call when you lose some weight”

“You’re probably not worth my time but I can always appreciate a peanut butter kitkat” purred Reagan, tearing the wrapper clean off and taking a large, slow bite accompanied by a soft throaty moan.

“Oh if only you were skinny” mused Mr Crude, passing Reagan on his way to the door.

Able to care less given his stinking attitude, Reagan set about the kitkat with gusto before realising she still had company from a rather more nervous voice

“Sorry about him, he’s a bit of a...” started the other member of the pair

“He’s a dick” bluntly put Reagan as the last of the kitkat joined the twix

“Yeah...sorry” continued Mr Nervous “if it makes you feel any better then I think you’re really pretty”

“Oh I know I am” purred Reagan again, crossing her legs as she rested on her seat “come here shy boy”

Cautiously, the young guy walked towards her before finding himself swept off his feet and locked lips with the seated redhead.
Almost as soon as it started though, it was over and the guy stumbled back tentatively in shock.

“Don’t think anything of it” asserted Reagan with a stern look “just a reminder to your friend that being a prick won’t get him anywhere”

All the quiet guy could do was nod before starting to walk off, only to walk into Reagan’s outstretched arm
“I’ll take the chocolate bar though as payment” declared Reagan, clenching her fist in a beckoning manner.
Still lost for words, a second kick at was placed in Reagan’s hand before the deliverer scuttled off back to his brash mouthed friend as the redhead smiled to herself.

“You still got it girl” mused Reagan to herself as she tore into her second kitkat with gusto.
13333124112212.title: No such thing as bad attention

choices: Pre-ordered pizza is a success and Phoebe reaps the rewards
Nat has a job opportunity for her favourite patron
Audrey spends more time with Phoebe out of concern
Reagan faces a new challenge in the battle of the butts.
133331241122122.content:
For all of her twin's efforts in the name of superior rears, Phoebe was considerably less forth coming.

Following her ejection from work and the subsequent conversation with Reagan, Phoebe had actually managed to find peace with the situation.
"Sure, I might have been replaced but that just means the role wasn't right for me" she would tell anyone who asked, usually whilst downing one of many drinks or between bites of whatever food item the redhead was ploughing through at that particular moment.

And here lay the true coping mechanisms employed by Phoebe.

Unsurprisingly, the little ice cream binge that had taken place whilst Reagan 'comforted' Phoebe had not been the last nor were her gluts limited to ice cream which, combined with Uma's terrible partying influences, had led to Phoebe's greatly improved mood regarding the situation.
It did not take long for such indulgences to continue to greatly improve her figure either.

************

"Urgh...shut up..." groaned Phoebe in the direction of her blaring phone alarm as she lazily slapped her phone to silence the infernal noise.
With peace now radiating through her sun dappled bedroom, Phoebe smiled as she rolled onto her back allowing her eyes to slowly flutter open.

"Phew, last night was crazy" mumbled the redhead as she wriggled and stretched within the confines of her covers, limbs all over the place much like her hair after not showering following a sweaty night of partying.
As her smile widened slightly as vague wavering memories of the night before came back to her in drabs, her lips were torn apart more violently by a sudden belch.
Giggling to herself at the sudden 'interruption', Phoebe covered her mouth as the faint tastes of alcohol and grease tickled her tongue playfully.

"Yeah, last night was good" purred the redhead as she hunkered down deeper into her covers for comfort, swiping her phone up to inspect her digital memories of the night.

As time slowly meandered around Phoebe as she scrolled through countless pictures and videos whilst replying to messages, a sudden call from downstairs caught her attention.

"Phoebe!" came Audrey's voice up the stairs "someone's at the door for you!"

This announcement confused the young redhead as she lay in her bed still.
Noone had said they were coming to see her today so who could this be...

And then the smell hit her

"Mhm, pizza" purred Phoebe as she almost hypnotically slid to the edge of her bed, dangling her legs out to allow her to stand.
Then, rather daintily, she sprung from her bed and to her feet.
And then, from her planted position, her body just carried on jiggling.

True, the skimpy and revealing nature of her pyjamas probably wasn't helping the situation but it was impossible to deny that Phoebe was becoming positively plump.

In all fairness to her, Phoebe's face had remained relatively thin and she was as radiantly beautiful as ever but the rest of her figure was without doubt bigger in some way or another.
As a naturally shapely girl, Phoebe's assets had taken a fair proportion of her new weight.
Her thighs and hips were noticeably thicker whilst her rounder breasts were bulging out of the top of her now too small bra giving her an impressive display of cleavage.
Without surprise, her arse had remained dominant by quite a margin and, still forming two perfectly smooth and rounded domes behind her, had proven to bulge beyond the extents of most single chairs.

Most surprising based on her past though was the now visible belly that had formed more recently.
Typically pale for her hair colour, the soft pudge spilling out from under her vest top sat heavily on top of her waistband and wobbled gently with every step that she took.
Although she didn't often expose her growing stomach, Phoebe did not always have the luxury of choice as her rapidly increasing size had led her to outgrow a lot of her clothes in some capacity or another.
As such, her growing midriff got more airtime than the former skinny redhead may have liked, although her current experience showed that guys were rarely put off by it, much to her own enjoyment.

"Phoebe!" shouted Audrey again, obviously adamant to have her sister deal with the door.

"I'm coming!" cried back Phoebe as she threw her door open and skipped toward the stairs.
The motion of skipping was enough to set her growing body off jiggling again but, much to her own surprise, Phoebe found she didn't hate the feeling as much as she may have even led herself to believe at one point.
The way the young Durant twin saw it, she could eat what she wanted, STILL get all the attention she wanted and she was still fricking hot.
What did it matter if she got a bit chubby?

***********

"Finally, didn't think you were going to come" mused Audrey with her arms folded in her mum stance

"Yeah yeah, well I'm here now" smiled Phoebe, oblivious as ever

"Good because I'm not paying for all this pizza Phebes" announced Audrey as she pulled the door open again to reveal a young guy holding three pizza boxes "why did you even order this much? It's barely even lunch time"

"Honestly, I don't remember..." frowned Phoebe, this particular moment proving to be a blank

"If I may" interjected the guy on the steps "the young lady ordered these last night, asked us to drop some food off for 'a very hungover babe as soon as you open', gave us this address"

Phoebe awkwardly looked around before the penny finally dropped.

"Oh my god, I did do that!" announced the redhead with glee, bouncing gently on her toes.

"And might I say for everyone at my shop, this is a very clever idea and we're looking into offering pre-ordering as a service" smiled the young man at the door

"You should totally do that!" outburst Phoebe "I would totally order from you guys all the time!"

The guy laughed as he passed the pizza boxes through the door to Phoebe
"Well consider these a commission for your idea, on the house"

"Sweet!" shouted Phoebe, fist bumping with her free hand

"Well you just give us a call when you need any more pizzas" called the delivery man as he walked away, throwing Phoebe a wink as he did.

"Oh I will" purred Phoebe, leaning forward slightly to give him a view before throwing her own wink in return.

*************

"Can you believe this Aud? Free pizza for drunk ordering some for the next day!" cried out Phoebe as she heavily dropped herself onto the sofa before popping the lid on the first pizza

"Oh yeah, great win" mused Audrey, not entirely committed to the conversation as other things crossed her mind.

"I know right" continued Phoebe as she hungrily bit into a large slice cradled between both hands.

Audrey nervously chewed her lip as she mulled through her thoughts before finally biting the bullet instead.

"Look Phoebe, I love you and I just wanted to check that you're ok after the whole job thing?"

"Oh yeah, I'm fine" smiled Phoebe, melted cheese all around her lips which she promptly licked off

"Ok...you just seem to not be as focused on acting since and I'm worried about you gaining weight" continued Audrey, concerned she'd stretched too far

Phoebe paused her eating for a moment, slowly swallowing her mouthful as she looked at her big sister.
Audrey could feel herself sweating as she braced herself for her sister's response.
She really didn't want to upset Phoebe and she was concerned that if this went badly there was no way she could talk to Reagan about the fact that SHE was piling on the pounds as well.
As this thought burnt away in Audrey's mind she nearly missed the fact that Phoebe practically inhaled her slice of pizza before diving into another one.

"Oh Audrey, it's fine, I actually kinda like it and all the guys seem to like it too so I can't really complain" replied Phoebe with a smile as she idly rubbed her exposed stomach.

"Well as long as you're sure" returned Audrey, feeling like she wasn't out of the woods yet.

"Besides" started Phoebe again "it's only a few pounds, you can worry if I stop being able to walk"

Audrey knew her sister was hopefully joking but it was always hard to tell with the ditz of the clan.

"If it's all the same to you Phebes, I'll worry a little bit before then" asserted Audrey to clarify her point.

Phoebe simply nodded before holding out the open pizza box.

"You want a slice Aud?" offered the younger twin with the box at full stretch

Audrey hesitated.
"S...Sure, thanks" replied Audrey as she peeled a slice away from the others, taking a tentative bite.

"See, you're helping me already" smiled Phoebe with a joke in her eye as she continued to binge.

Audrey laughed nervously as she worked through her slice, looking her sister up and down.

'Must keep an eye on this one' Audrey noted in her head, motherly tendencies striking up instantly.
133331241122122.title: Plumped Up Party Animal

choices: Audrey loses track of time lounging the afternoon away, impacting dinner plans.
As Audrey spends more time with Phoebe, her weight suffers as a result.
While Phoebe is ok with her weight gain, it soon causes her problems elsewhere.
Phoebe ends up leading to Reagan, Uma and Audrey gaining weight as well.
1333312411221223.content:
Audrey may have bitten off more than she could chew in trying to help Phoebe. (Hah!!)

Her youngest sister, accounting for the seconds difference in the twins, had been wayward of late. Especially for Phoebe. While Audrey wasn't as sure of her modeling or acting before it had been a lucrative job the youngest Durant sister had taken to, without too much of an impact on her studies.

Yet there was no denying that Phoebe had put on quite the amount of weight in a short amount of time. Was that really from partying with Uma once or twice a week?

In actuality, Uma and Phoebe were out most nights a week, downplaying just how much they spent partying. Audrey had been plenty stressed with work and other matters that she had yet to get to the bottom of the situation. All she could see was the aftermath, as in the rounding bottom of Phoebe. The weight flourished in the lower regions of the pear shaped redhead. And Reagan was starting to pork up too, for reasons Audrey hadn't been able to fathom.

So after those initial prying questions Audrey felt the need to talk over with Phoebe some more. Get a better understanding of how her sister was feeling. Which ended up being over an impromptu lunch, as after the first slice Phoebe offered Audrey some more. While their was the very behavior Audrey was hoping to curtail, she felt that if she was too hard too soon on Phoebe that it would trigger one of the twin's infamous meltdowns.

"Gee, Aud, it's been great hanging out with you!" Phoebe said after she had scarfed down her last slice of pizza.

"Think nothing of it," Audrey moaned. "Ooof!" Audrey may have been plus size for most of her life but she rarely ate this much in one sitting. Of the three pizzas Phoebe had been given Audrey had ended up consuming most of one and a bit. Only by partaking in the pizza with Phoebe did Audrey get more insight into her sister's mindset. She didn't sound depressed or distraught, a little unfocused if anything, but there was nothing too troubling about her behavior outside of the weight gain.

Yet Audrey's middle was feeling the immediate drawbacks of Phoebe's new tendency to indulge. To relieve some of the pressure of her full tum Audrey had to unbutton her slacks. Her stomach gurgled occasionally as the density of the food being disgusted was trying to send Audrey off to sleep.

As for Phoebe, her recent overeating had conditioned her digestive track to take on this much food. Getting through almost two whole pizzas wasn't a sweat for her, compared to Audrey. She was contentedly sated, although still peckish if the right craving were to grab her attention. Her growing midriff bulged out further, heavy with food, as Phoebe subconsciously rubbed it to relieve some gas.

"Hey, The Shoal is on!" Phoebe noted the time. "That's your favorite, isn't it Aud?"

Audrey didn't protest the TV being turned on. In the wake to reality shows like 'Jersey Shore' countless imitators of various waterfront hotspots had formed, the Shoal being one of them. It didn't take much to entertain Phoebe or Audrey, who enjoyed watching trashy TV together.

"Holy cow," Audrey observed the TV. "Did you see how much purple and bronze she has in that bedroom?"

"Yeah, oh my gosh!" Phoebe replied.

Lulled into the glamour of people trying to live beyond their means and struggling to digest the pizza, Audrey lost her focus of time. She didn't know when, exactly, the sounds of crunching had started until she looked over to where Phoebe had returned to the couch with a bag of pretzel nuggets.

"You want some Audrey?" Phoebe happily munched, offering the bag. "Pinto and cheese flavor."

"Uggh, I've had too much already."

"Really? Aww," Phoebe shrugged, scooping another handful of the filled pretzel bites into her mouth.

Now this was the area of most concern Audrey had about Phoebe, her increased snacking as the obvious source of her weight gain. If Audrey hadn't already been comfortable on the couch, lost in her favorite genre of television, and fighting off a food coma, she would have sensibly put her foot down on the matter. Currently, however, Audrey had none of the willpower and mixed signals from her food addled mind. Bonding over her sister with pizza had felt like the two were getting closer again and as an older sister she did want to care for Phoebe's wellbeing. After all, hadn't she started eating the pizza to 'help' Phoebe in some fashion?

"Don't go eating all of those," Audrey rescinded, plucking the bag from Phoebe's hands. "I got those on the last grocery run." Slowly, she put a few pretzel nuggets in her mouth and chewed.

"These really make you thirsty," Audrey said, again missing that Phoebe had gone around to the kitchenette before returning to the couch.

"Iced tea?" Phoebe offered, cracking open two Lipton bottles.

"Thanks Phoebe," Audrey took the drink, as she started to slide down the slippery slope of minding her own snacking. While Phoebe tended to overdo meals around her partying, Audrey took to the increased consumption through grazing, leading to both having excess calories over some noontime bonding as sisters.
1333312411221223.title: Reconnection and Lunch

choices: All four girls keep gaining to varying effect
Reagan finds more enjoyment than she bargained for with food and sex
Phoebe’s continued growth draws some unexpected attention
Pudgy Ixchel finds confusion at suddenly being the smallest woman of the bunch.
13333124112212234.content:
“Come on Uma, it’s party time!” shouted Phoebe through her housemates door, excitement bubbling through the redhead beyond her control.

“I’m coming Phoebe, jeez” grumbled Uma from behind the door.
She loved Phoebe to bits and loved how crazy she was for parties, but Uma couldn’t help but feel they were partying just a little too much.

For one thing, even with all of Nat’s freebies and drinks bought for them, all this partying was costing a fortune that the two girls did not have.
Although the money was pivotal in it all, Uma also couldn’t help but feel a little peeved about the beer belly she now sported.

A fitness nut like Uma could work that extra weight off in no time, Uma was sure of that, but she rarely seemed to have the time. Between partying into the early hours with Phoebe, binging and not going to the gym with Reagan and then sleeping most of the former athletes time was accounted for.

As she looked at herself in the mirror, Uma grabbed her hefty stomach in both hands, watching as fat oozed between her fingers as angry stretch marks garnished her hips.

“Hurry up Uma!” squealed Phoebe again, banging impatiently on the door.

“I’m coming!” shouted Uma back as she swiftly whipped her shirt down to cover as much of her gut as possible before opening the door.

Well, at least Uma wasn’t the only one looking less than thin these days.

***********

Although Uma wasn’t the only one looking a cheeseburger bigger than thin and, truthfully, was the smaller of the pair, Phoebe felt considerably differently about her weight situation.
An opinion that was less modestly displayed in her outfit choice.

Whilst Uma awkwardly tried to cover herself and her expanding chub, Phoebe well and truly steered into the skid of her growing frame.

Wearing a pair of overly stretched tights, the redhead’s hips and rear dominated her figure, so much so the external bulge of said rear was visible when looking at her face on, only to lead in to her closely pressed thighs.
Fat continued to be squeezed out over the top of her leggings as well, forming meaty love handles either side above her hips.
These thick rolls then tapered into the blossoming belly taking up the redhead’s middle which curved and hung over her waistband slightly in one smooth pale surface, where it lay exposed, unable to be contained by her shirt.
Higher still, her boobs hadn’t been left out in her gorging whilst her arms also sported a fine layer of fat to thicken them.

“Come on, I’m hungry!” demanded Phoebe before grabbing hold of Uma’s hand and dragging her towards the front door.

‘Oh boy’ thought the former athlete as she mentally prepared herself for what was to come.

**************

“Keep the food coming Nat, I’m a hungry girl tonight!” shouted Phoebe across the bar, having caught a glimpse of the full figured club owner.

Nat couldn’t help but smirk before throwing a thumbs up towards the young Durant, disappearing into the kitchen as she did.

“You wanna slow it down a bit Phebes? You’ve nearly eaten through the entire menu tonight” protested Uma before being silenced.

“I know, tonight’s the night it happens!” replied Phoebe, necking a full pint of beer in her stride before staggering from her stool towards Uma.

“We must commemorate this moment, Snapchat picture!” shouted Phoebe, wrapping her arm around Uma as she spoke.

“Oh I don’t know Phoebe, I’m not looking so great...”

“Don’t be silly, just do what I do!” cheered Phoebe as she stuck her bulging rear out in a sexy pose.

Uma reluctantly struck a semi pose for the photo, holding in a deep rooted sigh as she did.

“And...send!” cooed Phoebe as she hammered away on her phone.

“What?! Let me see first” cried Uma as she reached for Phoebe’s phone

“Oopsie, too late” smiles Phoebe with an innocent look “you looked great Um’s, when would I ever lead you astray?”

“Well actually...” started Uma as Nat wobbled towards them

“Here you go ladies, enjoy” purred the ever attentive hostess, pinching Phoebe’s hip as she strode past “glad to see you enjoy the food Phebes”

“Oh do I!” retorted Phoebe as she grabbed a hand of whatever deep fried treats Nat had just laid down.

Nat could only smile again as she walked off, remembering how shy and...thin that girl used to be.

************

Reagan grunted, throwing the bed covers from over her head as her phone chimed it’s warning of an inbound Snapchat message.

“What the...oh that bitch!” spat Reagan as the picture of Phoebe with Uma lit up her phone screen, huge arse taking up most of the shot.

“What’s going on?” ushered a much quieter voice from Reagan’s side

“My twin and her enormous fucking arse” spat Reagan again, angrily watching the photo disappear again.

“Don’t worry, your arse is the best” returned the guys voice again, leaning against Reagan to spoon her own not inconsequential behind.

“Ohh pfft” mocked Reagan, throwing her legs out of bed and making a beeline for her door in nothing but her black lacy underwear.

“Where are you going?” called Reagan’s latest conquest, sitting slightly up right as he spoke, not that the enraged Durant twin responded.

Before long however, she did return.

“Make yourself useful” called Reagan as she dumped a box on the bed where she had once lay before teasingly stroking her new friend rather erotically.

“Woah ok, let me just...” but Reagan cut him off before he could finish, depositing her impressive weight into his lap, huge rear first.

“Just shut up and feed me this” demanded Reagan as she started to gently grind against the trapped guy, dragging the box towards him to reveal a decadent looking chocolate cake.

“You want me to...feed you the...whole thing?” questioned the gentleman, starting to wonder why he let the thick figured redhead lure him in at the start of the night.

“Yep” plainly put Reagan as she continued to grind, her bloated belly and boobs jiggling with each movement as her arse swelled back and forth as her weight shifted.

“If you’re sure...” muttered the guy, reaching into the box and reaching a piece of cake to Reagan’s lips.

“Oh I’m sure” replied Reagan, hungrily tearing into the cake, Phoebe’s engorged arse all she could think of.

***********

Audrey had to recompose herself after what had just happened.

First, she’d received a message from Phoebe looking FAR too exhibitionist for a big sister to appreciate and, not to mention, larger than she recalled.

THEN Reagan had torn through the kitchen and grabbed an entire cake in her underwear, looking not much thinner than her twin at this point, even if she was slightly larger in the belly and boob department.

‘What am I going to do with those girls?’ thought Audrey as she scooped a handful of chocolate coated pretzels from the bag in her lap.

‘Hmmm, nothing tonight, there’s still two episodes of The Shoal’ thought the blonde as she allowed the pretzel bag to slide off her shapely thighs whilst reaching for a tube of Pringles.

Despite her mature tendencies, Audrey was undeniably susceptible to things and, having spent more time keeping tabs on Phoebe, had managed to find herself in a precarious position of continuous subconscious snacking.

Luckily for her though, trashy TV covered a multitude of sins and, more importantly, covered for the fact that her extra large ‘Thanksgiving and Christmas at grandma’s’ sweatpants were relenting to a heavy laden belly pressing against the waistband of the soft stretchy fabric.
13333124112212234.title: The girl that fattened them all

133331241122122344.content:
"There!" Ixchel exhaled deeply, the relief of a multi-week project completion leaving her system.

While Ixchel didn't always partake of the same activities as her roommates, even the multiracial geek wasn't this asocial. She'd been holed up in the townhouse office on an important, extensive project for the med-tech company she worked at. For the past several weeks most of her time had been consumed by the project, she'd had to recode it from scratch twice!

Finally she could put this to rest. She could relax and have fun with her friends again. She had to cut back on the streaming severely and she only saw the other residents of the townhouse at brief times. Crossing to the bathroom or kitchenette, or such, rarely a chance to say more than a few words. What with the night schedule of those going clubbing, gym workouts and multiple work or college stints, usually everyone else had been out as the bronze skinned Ixchel worked from home.

The relief and cramped office air was causing her to perspire. She lifted a thin long sleeved lavender shirt from her indigo dress, looking for sweat patches and finding her tummy was more pudgy then she remembered.

"Great," Ixchel said sourly. All the stress of her job looked to have caused her to gain five or so pounds, long nights of using cheap food for nourishment as she sat at her workstation. The irony of her medical-tech career was not lost on Ixchel as she had never been a skinny-minnie, a trait she shared with Audrey from losing the genetic lottery. She bit her lip as she checked out her profile in her computer's camera. In a few weeks she'd have to be present at the launch of the new application she'd coded, public appearances being a rare time she had to leave the house.

Would her business attire even fit her anymore? Ixchel's geek physique had the attributes of a plush teddy bear, both in size and color. She tended to be round all over, especially her front and chest, with her hips rounding out like her tummy. She tested for a double chin, her cheeks wide as she had a full moon face.

"Whatever," she banished her weight woes from her mind, eager to hang out with her roommates again. She'd missed doing anything of note with them over her sequestered coding project. Surely one of them could lift her spirits.


Ixchel couldn't believe what she was seeing.

Immediately exiting her office space, Ixchel had almost collided with another tenant. "What the frick?"

"Sorry," Ixchel apologized, readjusting her glasses. "I'm sorry...Reagan??" The loudmouthed twin looked entirely different from what Ixchel remembered.

"Geesus, Chel," Reagan chided, cocking her rear to one side and putting a hand to her hip. "I thought you'd fallen off the face of the earth."

"Yeah..." Ixchel mouthed. "It was the project...at work-" She didn't mean to stare but she couldn't help but look at just how much weight Reagan had been piling on. The flat fronted wide hipped twin had become a bulging pear. A lacey thong could be seen digging into her weighty hips and stomach, a lower belly almost reaching Ixchel's own. But the formerly fit redhead looked to weigh more than Ixchel now, those bulging hips continuing back to her fully padded rear. Sure, the twins had always been big reared since puberty but that butt was getting large! Reagan's breasts were fuller than Ixchel remembered as well, only she hadn't bothered to up her cup size or skimpy tops, making Ixchel sympathetic of her own perky mammaries.

"What's with you?" Reagan asked, given Ixchel's dumbstruck expression.

Ixchel tried to downplay her disbelief. "Nothing! How are you? I know I haven't been present much in..." Seriously, how much weight had she been able to gain in almost two months?

Reagan snorted. "Well, Uma's bailed on me for our gym sessions, so I don't know what I'm doing half the time I'm there."

Unknowing of Reagan's twisted sibling jealousy, Ixchel could only comprehend that statement with what she could presently observe. "Well, keep at it? I'm going to see how everyone else is doing." Ixchel excused herself awkwardly, trying not to insinuate too much given Reagan's acrid personality, and trying to fathom what was going on.

Uma bailed on gym sessions? Sure, the athlete lounged about whenever she had expended the energy but she was still pretty buff, right? Out of curiosity Ixchel wandered to the upper level of the townhouse. It's not likely everyone was up in their rooms, right?

"*Yyyaaawwwwwnn*" a massive sigh of sleepiness came with the stretching of a protruding black belly out of Uma's door, along with the rest of Uma. Ixchel's eyes grew wide behind her glasses. Uma had a gut! A belly that looked to be soaked with alcohol and fatty foods sat on her muscled thighs starting to attract cellulite. Uma had a pretty straight body shape before. This was the girl with ripped abs and a chiseled physique in her prime, wasn't it? Yet her newly accumulated fat was trying to find places to settle on the formerly fit frame, with the bloated belly getting the dark lines of stretch marks.

"Whoa, Ixchel," Uma noticed her, rising from the dead sleep after Phoebe had dragged her on a hefty club visit. Not only for their tab but the food. It had been fun getting the younger Durant twin into more parties but damn, this was too much like work and too hard on her waistline. The appearance of the quietest roommate got her out of her funk. "Whatcha been up to?"

"A lot of programming," Ixchel had been blindsided by Reagan's appearance but Uma's was unbelievable. Was this real? Had they signed Ixchel up to be punked in a reality prank show? Had she gone down the rabbit hole to another dimension? Uma's poorly abused stomach couldn't be real. right? Ixchel caught herself crossing, hand outstretched to give it a feel for confirmation, so she hastily grabbed her other arm.

"It feels like I haven't seen you girls in forever," Ixchel said, starting to feel fuzzy in the head.

"Heh," Uma, somewhat disgusted with herself, had an inkling of what Ixchel was reacting to. "You haven't seen nuthin' yet."

"What?"

Uma shrugged. "Doyah know if anyone was in the shower? I've got to get the smell of last night off of me."

"No, I hadn't noticed." Ixchel was growing more worried. Now Reagan and Uma were blimping up, what had she not seen yet? Alarmed by Uma's statement, Ixchel took the back stairs as she quickly moved through the townhouse, trying to spot the others.

Reaching the panty, she noticed the telltale profile of the blonde Audrey. While the cousins looked radically different they had somewhat similar plus size physiques. And Audrey was the most sensible of the bunch, surely she could explain...

The gasp caught in Ixchel's throat. While not much wider than Ixchel had recalled, Audrey was looking positively stuffed in the belly and bust department. Her stomach was notably pinched by clothes Ixchel recognized. She hadn't she Audrey this full since she had overdid it on the buffet put out by Ixchel's folks for her kid sister's quinceanera.

"Ixchel!" Audrey greeted warmly, oblivious to her cousin's mixture of confusion and concern. "Finally done with that big project?"

"Yeah, um, yes." Good lord, wasn't Audrey meaning to diet some time back? She looked like she was snacking nonstop!

"We should celebrate you finishing that project," Audrey mused. "Ooo. You still know that korean beef recipe with the veggies you do so well, right?"

"Of course," Ixchel said, beginning to see where this was going.

"That is so tasty. And perfect, the other girls would love it, I'm sure I can scrape together anything you might need."

"Oh...okay." Ixchel pressed against the wall to let Audrey pass. If the elder Durant, hell, if any of the ladies Ixchel had seen this late morning got too much bigger they'd have to awkwardly shuffle past each other in the townhome's tighter hallways.

Just what had caused all this? Ixchel was still puzzling over this mystery as she continued on to the commons of the ground floor. The sudden exclamation of her name roused her from these deep thoughts.

"Chell!! Ohmygawd give me a hug!"

Ixchel was caught in the headlights, a fuzzy animal about to be roadkill given the size of what was lumbering towards her. If she thought Reagan was getting fat, Phoebe was, was, FAT!

The younger twin sported similar plumped up curves to Reagan, only she was far more broad in the rear and wide for her stomach. Her weight mainly settled to her lower half, juicy love handles jiggling and butt quaking as she raced toward Ixchel with energy beguiling of her size. Her overstretched joggers were starting to roll downwards off her zaftig buns and thighs from the exertion.

Ixchel felt the wind knocked out of her at the impact of Phoebe's hug. Being squeezed so tightly, she was in the uncomfortable position of feeling with her entire body just how much Phoebe outweighed her at this point. Soft fat pressed into Ixchel, risking her breathing being cut off until Phoebe finally released her.

"I missed you so much, it's like I haven't seen you in ages!" Phoebe said excitedly.

"Likewise." Holy heck, if Ixchel didn't know any better Phoebe was posed to be the fattest woman of the house! Her stomach wasn't as large as some of the others but that overfilled ass of hers put a Kardashian to shame! Just what had happened in this house when Ixchel was caught up in work?

"You alright?" Phoebe asked, concerned that her favorite and only cousin didn't share her enthusiasm.

"It's nothing," Ixchel swallowed, "I guess I'm mainly tired and hungry from all my work. I've missed seeing you girls."

"Oh man, we should totally do something!" Although Phoebe soon jiggled off to the kitchen to grab her cousin some snacks, Ixchel's mouth hitting the floor again as she watched Phoebe's butt sway.

Ixchel sat down, feeling much smaller today.

1333312411221223442.content:
*RIIIIIIP*

"Awww man"

*POP*

"Damn it!"

*CREAK*

"Hnnngh!"

Ok, so it didn't happen LITERALLY at the same time, but over the course of one day, all five girls of 8422 Fordham Avenue found themselves in some form of a predicament regarding their clothes which, in turn, led to an emergency house meeting.

Huddled around the kitchen table sat the girls, looking around at their fellow housemates to determine what had gone wrong for them.

Following her prolonged work binge, Ixchel had found all of her clothes just a little too tight for comfort and after that day's events found herself unable to button her trousers and was left with an uncomfortable tightness around her shoulders when wearing any of her smart shirts.

As a result of her revitalised snacking addiction, Audrey was also struggling in an all-round sense, however, her natural plus-sized physique was proven most troublesome in the upstairs department. In particular, a rather sorry looking tshirt clung to the blonde's upper body, betraying every inch of her now bloated state whilst barely containing the lower hang of her growing tummy. A small release of pressure was gifted to her when the seam running up her side had popped slightly from the pressure but the overall effect was still a great deal of taut material which only served to draw attention to her suffering bras as well as her girth.

A mere shadow of her former sporty self, Uma was perched in little more than a obscenely small pair of latex shorts strangling her thighs sat underneath her prominent rounded belly that was currently hanging free of her old basketball vest.

Glowering quietly to herself was the ever fiery Reagan who, following a rather rambunctious hook up the night before, had finally conceded her bras were no longer fit for purpose, not to mention her softening stomach challenged every clothing limit she could throw at it. Her sorry state had left in in nothing more than a baggy hoodie (stolen from a different nightly conquest) so as to maintain her bloated chests' dignity.

And finally, to top off the group, there was Phoebe, the accidental architect of the problem at hand. Whether the younger twin was truly oblivious to her situation as a whole or was actually enjoying it was very hard to tell but, following today's mishap, Phoebe was no longer in possession of leg wear that could contain her enormous rear end. Her thighs were challenge enough for even the stretchiest of leggings but it had been her ever increasing rear that had seen the untimely demise of her last pair bottoms.

This particular occurrence had done nothing for Reagan's mood who spent a good deal of time staring at her twin's exposed bulging rear, a glimmer of satisfaction being offered in the form of Phoebe's growing belly sat atop her thighs and exposed up to the belly button under a poorly stretched vest top.

*********

"Ok, so we're all starting to struggle a little with clothing" started Audrey, a sentiment that was met by a quiet chorus of murmurs.

The blonde nodded her own agreement before carrying on.

"Well, things are tight as always financially with balancing this place so before we go out buying any new clothes is there any way we can share any hand-me-downs out?"

The girls glanced around the table again before the silence was broken by Uma.

"I appreciate your optimism here Aud, particularly given how you aren't normally all that optimistic, but I don't think that's gonna work"

Again, a quiet wave of agreeing murmurs rolled across the table.

"I mean, the twins WERE the smallest in the house so they can't hand anything up and I'd dare hazard a guess that nobody can
hand anything UP to Phoebe these days"

At the passing reference to them, Reagan simply refused to comment whilst Phoebe idly grinned at her housemates, failing to see the obvious problem been proposed by the former athlete.

Audrey sighed.
"You have a point Uma, but I don't see how we're going to be able to afford to clothe the entire house with a new wardrobe"

"I might be able to help there" piped up Ixchel, a look of conflict on her face as she spoke whilst biting her nails.

The other four girls looked across at their cousin/friend intently, completely intrigued at the possible solution being offered so easily.

"Well, as part of my last project I did get a pretty handsome down payment for the work and seeing as I've been on lock down to actually get the job done I've spent next to none of the money, aside from rent contributions" continued Ixchel, the look of conflict not subsiding in the slightest but a faint glimmer of knowingly joined it.

"Oh Chel, we couldn't possibly..." started Audrey, attempted to save her cousin's honour, before being bluntly cut off

"Oh my god Chel, thank you so much!" squeaked Phoebe, launching herself from her chair and burying Ixchel in a jiggling flabby hug of gratitude.

"Steady Pheebs, she can't help us if you suffocate her" warned Uma, scratching her protruding belly as she spoke.

"Oh...sorry" responded Phoebe awkwardly as she backed onto her seat again, Reagan groaning as she watched her twin's rear bulge out over the seat.

"Don't worry" nobbed Uma with a smile before returning to the matter at hand "are you sure you want to do that Chel? It'd be a really big favour to us all"

"Well I can either help out like this or we have to spend the rest of eternity staring at each other's nakedness" interjected Ixchel, pragmatism leading the way at this point.

"Sold" barked Reagan, breaking her silence as her willingness to look at her ballooning twin's exposed form dwindled completely.

"As long as you're sure Chel" smiled Audrey, giving her cousin something of a sideways hug, feeling slightly winded by the pressure she put on her own stomach by twisting.

"Yeah yeah" mused Ixchel as she hugged back awkwardly "you all owe me one though, ok?"

The rest of the girls all expressed their gratitude, albeit some more enthusiastically than others *cough Reagan cough* and the deal was made.

"Ok, so when are we going to actually do this?" asked Audrey, checking her watch as she did.

"Now" barked Reagan again, throwing herself up from the table and walking out to get her shoes as the tell tale sign of her unrestricted chest bounced within the confines of her hoodie.

"Slow down grump" shouted Uma after the redhead before looking to the remaining group "but seriously, can we go now?"

"I don't see why not" shrugged Audrey, looking to her cousin for support

Ixchel simply nodded before rising from the table to get ready.

"lets go then" smiled Audrey, quite pleased at the prospect of a much looser shirt.

**********

"Hey remember how we used to tease Audrey about being chubby?" asked Phoebe, looking at her twin as she spoke

"Hmmm" grunted Reagan, still visualising her sister's swollen rear

"Kinda funny that I barely fit in her fat pants now right?"

"Hmmm" grumbled Reagan again whilst fishing around under her hoodie to make some sort of comfort in the borrowed bra that Audrey had given her to protect her dignity as they roamed the mall for clothes.

"Hurry up you two, shops close in a couple of hours!" called Audrey from in front of the twins as they passed shop after shop.

"Coming mum!" shouted Phoebe before skipping after the other girls.

'Urgh, such a fat pig' thought Reagan as her twin bounced off ahead, the image of vast butt cheeks wobbling in tightly packed sweatpants seared into her mind at this point.

As Reagan continued to chunter to herself, she was blissfully unaware of another individual joining her at the back of the group.

"You ever gonna stop sulking today?" asked Uma, giving Reagan something of a playful nudge

"Not til I have clothes of my own that fit" spat Reagan, eyes staring forward.

"Well we're all in that boat so try lighten up yeah?" asserted Uma.

As arsey as Reagan was, Uma actually didn't mind her too much.
They'd bonded over many a 'carb load' and 'gym session' even if the reason Reagan had attempted to work out still eluded Uma no end.

"You look stupid by the way" murmured Reagan in reference to the former athlete's outfit of choice for the trip, of which the only addition to her previous get up being a rather large sports jacket that JUST covered her enough.

"Hey, this is all that would fit" defended Uma, puffing up her shoulders whilst holding her sports jacket down by the pockets to avoid exposing any of her rogue gut to the general public "besides, I'm not the one borrowing my sister's bra"

The remark caught Reagan off-guard.
It was true she was wearing a hand-me-down from her once much larger sister but it was kind of comfy and suited her quite well.
Who would have expected Audrey the straight laced Durant to have such a brightly coloured bra...

Refusing to be soft though, Reagan took to her usual smart arsed remarks.

"You have a sister?"

"Nope" smirked Uma, holding back a full laugh "still ain't wearing her bra though"

That remark actually made Reagan smile and relax slightly

"That's better, now lets go have some fun and actually be respectable human beings with clothes that fit" teased Uma, nudging the redhead again before taking off towards the multitude of clothes shops before them.
1333312411221223442.title: A lot can happen in one day
