13333124112212234422.content:
Maybe it was retail therapy enthused excitement or her usual idle nature, Phoebe had ended up separated from the rest of the group leading her to wander past the many clothing outlets unattended.

'Unattended' was usually a problem for the ditzy redhead but a deeply rooted focus seemed to have overtaken the youngest Durant.
With each jiggling step and wobble of a bulbous arse cheek straining her sister's former 'fat pants', Phoebe was completely fixated on one particular shop that she was slowly marching towards.
With great volumes of colour and bright neon signage adorning the front, one would have not been surprised to imagine Phoebe's target was one of the many eateries she had frequented as of late, particularly given how focused on the place she was, but it was indeed a clothes shop.

Feeling a draft of air conditioning wrap itself around her exposed arms, Phoebe smiled as she crossed the threshold under a pink fluorescent sign reading '+Size' before becoming completely lost in the scene playing out before her.

Although there didn't seem to any other customers in the shop, Phoebe was drawn by the racks of clothing lining the walls and scattered across the floor.
Now, ditzy nature aside, Phoebe wasn't stupid so, having seen the name of the shop and knowing how fashion trends tended to go, it came as a bit of a surprise to see so many 'normal' garments.

As the redhead meandered between racks of clothes she couldn't help but notice a few items of a skimpy nature and style and yet they were labelled much larger sizes than she was used to.
A quick examination of the clothes themselves showed they were indeed bigger than the ones she currently owned.

"Hey there honey, can I help you today?"

The voice behind Phoebe startled her as she was so engrossed in browsing clothes that she nearly screamed as she span round to see the speaker.
She did not expect the person stood before her.

Standing just a little shorter than Phoebe herself was Toni, or so her namebadge proclaimed, who was one of the largest women Phoebe had ever seen.
That doesn't say a huge amount about Toni per se as Phoebe used to believe Audrey was a huge woman but if ever a shop called '+Size' were to be stereotypical about the type of people it would hire then Toni certainly fit that image.

"Oh I'm just browsing" said Phoebe, offering a nervous smile as if she'd been caught shoplifting.

"Uh huh" Toni smiled back, folding her arms as she spoke "well not to make an assumption but I'd guess by the way those sweats are stretched over your butt I'd say you're looking for a bigger wardrobe?"

"I suppose you could say that" murmured Phoebe, feeling like she was being interrogated.

"Great!" cheered Toni, a motion that caused a quack of body fat to ripple through her rather spherical belly that led her figure "How about we get you sorted, shall we?"

The woman's enthusiasm immediately melted Phoebe's nerves as she put the garment back on its rack.

"Thanks, this is all kinda new to me, I used to be like really hot so not used to being so..." Phoebe started to monologue before a chubby finger was pressed against her lips.
Toni leaned closer to Phoebe who instinctively leaned in also
"You are smoking as is girl, I don't want to hear no thin girl nonsense in my store"

The round woman's sass was almost jarring, but Phoebe always responded well to a firm hand so it did the trick.

***********

"So what are we looking for today?" asked Toni, crossing her legs having perched herself in a large pink arm chair in one corner of the shop, an identical seat placed opposite which now housed Phoebe.

"Clothes I guess?" replied Phoebe, confused as to why it was such a mystery what she would want to buy in a clothes store.

"Oh honey, we are going to have such fun" laughed Toni, gently stroking Phoebe's knee "I mean what kind of clothes are you looking for today"

"Ohhhhhhhhhh, well I guess I need some party outfits and...oh, some pyjamas too!"
In true Phoebe style, she neglected to think of anything other than pleasure but it was a start even if 'work clothes' hadn't even crossed her overtaxed mind.

"Sounds lovely" purred Toni as she made some notes on a pad that had been balanced on the arm of her chair "any underwear today? That butt can not be holding itself these days"

Phoebe laughed to herself, so enamoured that this stranger was taking such an interest in her best feature
"Yeah, they are getting kind of tight"

"Wonderful, have you any pictures of yourself in your...previous wardrobe?" asked Toni, starting to get an idea of what style Phoebe was looking for.

"Oh yeah, sure" replied Phoebe, grabbing her phone from the exceedingly tight sweatpants pocket on her left hip "I like the revealing kind of things that lure the guys in, you know?"

"Oh I know what you mean" smiled Toni with a wink as she waited to see what Phoebe had to offer for inspiration.

"I guess this is the kind of thing I usually go for" said Phoebe as she showed her new personal shopper her phone whilst flicking through a few images.

"Uh huh...ok...yep..." mused Toni as she made more notes "you have a twin?"

The comment followed a picture with Phoebe posing with Reagan some time last year before their respective gains.

"Reagan? She's great, I'm surprised she's not here because her butt is huge these days too" smiled Phoebe.
Despite the damage she had caused over the past few weeks, it hadn't flown her by that Reagan had also been expanding at quite a pace.

"Interesting" mused Toni again, adjusting herself slightly in her chair "anyway, today is all about you so lets get some clothes shall we?"

"Yay" cheered Phoebe with a slight shoulder bounce that radiated through her upper body.

"I love your enthusiasm here...sorry, what was your name?"

"Phoebe" smiled the twin

"Phoebe, such a pretty name" responded Toni "I think we're going to do great things today"

**************

"Ok, I've got you a few things to try, some from your current style and some things more fresh so how about you just hop on through to the changing rooms and we'll see what we're working with" announced Toni, a slight loss of breath in her tone as she reappeared before Phoebe.

Phoebe could only squeal with excitement as she skipped off to the changing room to see what had been selected for it.
Although she had only known Toni for a short time, Phoebe was blown away with how well the shop assistant understood her sense of style.

Crop tops
Short shorts
Some dresses with the side panels cut out to show off her hips
AND the cutest (not to mention skimpiest) pyjama set you have ever seen.

As the redhead excitedly skipped into the changing room she thought she caught a glimpse of someone she knew coming into the store, more specifically, she thought she just saw Nat from her favourite bar walk in.
It didn't take long for her to forget that particular titbit though as she swaggered into the private room and closed the door behind her, ready to try on her new clothes.

*************

"How are you holding up in there Phoebe?" asked Toni through the door, gently rapping on the wood with her knuckles

"I'm doing ok, just struggling with the dress a little" replied Phoebe, gritting her teeth as she resumed trying to roll the thin material over her fuller hips, oblivious to the fact the zipper opening was cupping her bulging behind out back which was preventing the dress from sliding up.

"I can get a bigger size if you want?" offered Toni, hearing another sharp grunt followed by a shallow breath.

Shortly after the door whipped open to reveal Phoebe fully dressed in the offending item.
Said dress was red to match Phoebe's hair with a single cutout on each side whilst being relatively low cut to show off her swelling cleavage.
As Phoebe gave a twirl to showcase the item, it became very clear why she had struggled getting the thing over her rear.

Looking nearly as tight as her loaned sweatpants, the red material clung tightly across her cheeks, swaying slightly with every shift of blubber.
Returning to face Toni it also became clear how tightly the material clung to her front as well, with the front of the dress curving out with her swollen stomach with the cutouts giving a clear view of the delicate rolls of fat forming at her sides above her hips.

"Wow girl, you look good!" cheered Toni with a soft clap.

Phoebe could only bounce on her toes at the compliment before going back into the changing room.

"How about I start ringing all this up for you?" called Toni, turning slightly towards the till

"One of my friends has my money, can it wait?" responded Phoebe, remembering Ixchel had the money still

"What if I set you up with a credit account?" asked Toni, leaning back towards the closed door

"I can get one of those?" asked Phoebe, honestly not completely sure what a credit account was for a store

"Absolutely, I can sort it out whilst you change" purred Toni, turning tail again

"Sounds great, thanks a lot Toni" replied Phoebe, a large grin crossing her face as she spoke

"Not a problem honey" replied Toni as she sashayed to the till "don't forget those pants by the way!"
Phoebe looked around before finding a white plastic bag on the bench behind her, a selection of panties and bras packed into it.
"These are so cute!" murmured the redhead to herself as she slid the tight red material down her legs "this shop is awesome!"
13333124112212234422.title: Welcome to +Size, how may we help you?

choices: Nat proves to be quite the enabler for Phoebe outside of the club
Reagan gets desperate in the battle of the bums
Bad habits ingrained, the girls keep growing
Uma and Audrey try to warn Phoebe about spending too much time with Nat.
133331241122122344222.content:
"Jeez girl, how long does it take you to shop for clothes?"
A familiar sultry tone floated to Phoebe as she practically skipped out of +Size, arms laden with bags aplenty.

"Huh? Who was...oh my god, Nat?!" squealed Phoebe as she saw her favourite bar manager lent against one of the marble arches framing the door to +Size.

"The one and only" purred Nat as she stretched herself in a pose of exhibitionism.

As great as it was to see Nat, Phoebe was a little baffled.
She had never actually seen Nat away from the club and all those times she had either been too nervous to look at her properly or was too drunk to notice anything other than the things pouring into her own mouth.
And yet today, stood in the mall outside her new favourite clothes store, Phoebe got her first proper look at the woman who had been indulging her every partying whim for the past few weeks.

Most striking was that Nat was really quite pretty.
Although normally basking in the faint or flashing lights of her club, Nat was quite a sight in the daytime with her mid length hair tussled and gelled up into a quiffed fringe.
Piercing blue-grey eyes looked through generously made up lashes set within a cherubic, if not slightly rounded, face whilst a delicate silver ring punctuated a button nose set above curvy lips.

Aesthetically, Phoebe could only compare the bar manage to the darker girls from college with her black lace skirt and sleeveless band vest hugging her curves.
Although not having any predetermined expectations, Phoebe did not expect the otherwise professional woman to be dressed as she was.

Looks aside though and, as no real surprise to the redhead, Nat was still as plump as she looked on a night.
A closer look proved that Nat and Phoebe appeared to be quite similar in size at this point, albeit Nat was lagging slightly behind the younger girl and carried her weight much more evenly, resulting in her vest not quite covering her adequately enough around her middle.

"Hello, you in there Phoebe? Not being day drinking have you?" quizzed Nat with her hands on her hips, leaning slightly to take a closer look at the redhead's face.

"What? Oh no, I wouldn't do that..." Phoebe faltered, Nat was very 'mum-esque' outside of work it seemed.

The bar manager started to laugh though and relaxed her stance which instantly made Phoebe feel better.

"Oh relax Phebes, just messing with you" teased Nat with a light nudge to Phoebe's arm, smile beaming across her face "so you found +Size huh?"

"Yeah, its really cool in there" the redhead shuffled slightly on her feet, transitioning from daughter in trouble to awkward friend trying to impress.

"You bet, great for girls like us...if you know what I mean"
Nat punctuated that sentiment with a wink in lieu of the nudge.
"Where you off to now then? Looks like you got enough clothes to sink the Titanic there"

"I'm not actually sure, I think I've got to meet with Audrey and all them" answered Phoebe, glancing around to see if any of her housemates were around.

"Well I was about to hit the food court if you want to join me, you could always get your sister to meet you there" suggested Nat, one arm sliding around the youngest twin as she spoke.

Phoebe had to admit that that did sound like a good idea.
She hadn't eaten in hours which, considering her form as of late, was a crazy long time for her to go without food and she could feel the startings of a hunger to form in her belly.
Nat was apparently not oblivious to that fact.

"Woah, sounds like the captain has spoken there Phebes, gotta get some food in you quick" teased Nat again, starting to lead Phoebe away from the store front "don't worry, you've spent enough there, how about I make this my treat?"

Phoebe was always a sucker for free food and she had spent a lot in +Size, not that she understood her credit arrangement anymore now than when she signed for it
"Sounds great Nat, lead the way" smiled Phoebe, allowing herself to loosen up in order to be led.

"Great stuff" smiled the natural host as she took Phoebe's arm and headed for the food court.

Blissfully unnoticed by either of the girls, Uma had just turned the corner as Phoebe and Nat walked the other way around another corner.
As brief as the moment was, it gave Uma enough of a chance to see what had just happened and she didn't like it

"Ah shit" she muttered under her breath as she whipped her phone out to send an emergency text.

*************

Phoebe had been to the mall food court before, plenty of times actually, but now as a far more seasoned eater she could appreciate the place much more.

Around the edge of the court were a great number of eateries ranging from McDonalds and Taco Bell through to some smaller chain stores that included a delicious Chinese noodle place if Phoebe remembered rightly.
There was also a Baskin Robbins which, aside from being one of Phoebe's favourite places, served as the main dessert place for the entire court.

"Anything jumping out at you then Phebes?" called Nat over her tattooed shoulder as a distinct bounce rippled through her figure.

'Everything' was Phoebe's first thought but that seemed a little rude given that Nat had offered so kindly to pay for her food.

"Oh I don't know, theres so much to chose from" replied Phoebe, attention not entirely on the conversation.

"Well I've spent long enough serving you, how about I just get a few things and take it from there?" offered Nat as she glanced round the court herself.

Phoebe just nodded as she sidled around a table before sitting herself down, bulging rear threatening the extents of her chair as well as Audrey's borrowed sweats.
Nat didn't say anything else and just took off into the crowds, weaving with a great deal more dexterity then her figure would suggest.
Waiting patiently for her dinner host to return, Phoebe took in the vast array of smells wafting through the food court, all of which only made her hungrier than she already was.
Her bliss was interrupted briefly by the buzz of her phone jiggling against her thigh.

'Hey Pheobe, just checking you're ok? Uma saw you with Nat and don't want you getting out of your depth' read the message from Audrey.
Silly Audrey worrying so much, Nat was cool even if she did used to scare the young twin.
'Just having something to eat, see you later xxx' replied Phoebe before putting her phone away, and not a moment too soon as Nat had returned with a mountainous tray of food

"There you go Phebes, that'll keep you going for a while" chirped Nat as she placed the tray in front of Phoebe before depositing a not as full one before her own chair, sitting opposite the redhead as she did.
Phoebe could only look over the pile of food in awe as she took in all the things that had been brought for her.
Nat wasn't lying when she said she knew what Phoebe liked.

A foot-long sub crammed with meats and melted cheese crossed the tray diagonally, splitting the meal into two categories.
On one side sat tacos and fried chicken whilst the other corner of her tray nearly exclusively housed a large container of spicy Chinese noodles, just as Phoebe liked them, with a portion of prawn toast squeezed in beside it.

Phoebe's eyes and hardly subtle lip lick obviously tipped Nat off to her success.
"Well go on then, this is the longest I've ever seen food last in front of you" teased the bar manager as she took a Big Mac from her tray and took a large bite from it.
Phoebe didn't need any more of an invite then that.

************

"Phew, your appetite is insane Phebes" cooed Nat as she lent back in her chair, nudging her tray into the middle of the table whilst cradling her bloated middle.
Phoebe was too busy shoveling the last of her noodles straight into her mouth from the tub to respond to the comment which only made Nat smile more at the situation.

Moments later, Phoebe sat the empty noodle cartoon down to complete her emptied tray before letting loose a delicate burp whilst wiping her mouth clean with a napkin.

"Well you bested me there kiddo" mused Nat, heaving herself up in her seat again "you can finish that off if you want"
Nat had nodded to her tray which still had a slice of pizza, two tacos and half a burger sat on it.
Phoebe looked over the tray, considering the option whilst toying with how full she was.
It had to be said she was very full but she didn't want to let Nat waste money after treating her so well, not to mention Phoebe hadn't had a burger on her side of things.

"That'a girl" purred Nat as Phoebe swiped up her tray and started making her way through the remnants of Nat's meal.

"You gonna want any ice cream after that?" asked Nat, looking to stand from the table feeling rather confident in the response she would get.

Phoebe looked up from the pizza she was chewing on, licking sauce from her lips as she did and only offered a cute nod in response whilst swallowing.

"You got it" smiled Nat, giving the redhead finger guns as she hoisted herself from her seat and headed towards Baskin Robbins.

Had Phoebe being paying more attention she would have noticed that Nat's vest was struggling even more to contain her bloated stomach than before.
It had not missed Nat, however, that at some point during the meal Phoebe had rolled her borrowed sweatpants down to release her own bulging gut which now rested on her thick thighs and wobbled with each bite.
Despite her compromising situation, Phoebe felt great, not to mention that she was rather excited at the prospect of inbound ice cream, given her dominant sweet tooth.
133331241122122344222.title: Night manager out and about

choices: Both aided, Phoebe and Reagan start piling weight on
With the twins elsewhere Audrey, Ixchel and Uma can relax at home
Spending more time with Darryl, Reagan meets others that he indulges
Darryl pries into Reagan's motives, changing the tone of their 'business.'
1333312411221223442222.content:
'Urgh, why are you doing this Reagan?'
The thought crossed the redhead's mind as she rested against the exterior wall of McDonalds whilst looking over the carpark sprawling out before her, sliding the last sizeable bite of burger between her lips before scrunching the paper up and dumping it into the takeout bag on her left.
'Oh yeah, Phoebe...'
That damn twin of hers.
This whole situation had started because her greedy junior had gorged herself into a superior sized rear and now look at her.

Not unlike Phoebe, Reagan had been swelling noticeably in the past weeks but, unwilling to stand second best to her sister, Reagan had allowed herself to be blindsided.
She didn't mind so much that her chest had grown along with her rear and even quite enjoyed that she sported the largest cupsize in the house aside from Audrey.
Reagan certainly enjoyed that her ass was filling out by the pound and could live with the fact that her thighs thickened legs making her look even curvier.
What was much harder to swallow was her bulging middle, its pale softness escaping her short cut tops and resting on her thighs when she sat.

On the topic of swallowing though, Reagan did not find trouble in filling her face regularly, including now as she reached into the bag for another burger, so some would say she was reaping what she sowed.

Reality played little part in Reagan's world at the best of times though and, after a torturous couple of weeks of seeing her sister trapse in and out on food trips with her new friend 'Nat', her patience had well and truly run out.
In particular after seeing Phoebe split her leggings whilst untying her shoes and then skip upstairs without crying as she once had, Reagan had lost the plot and, with a near identical wobbling arse seared into her mind, she had contacted Darryl.

"Well if it isn't Reagan Durant" called a voice from within a particularly fancy BMW crawling past the front of the fast food outlet.

Reagan looked to have ignored the utterance clearly aimed at her, preferring to concentrate on finishing her burger.

"We could have got on a lot better if you'd been this hungry when we met" called Darryl, leaning out of the car window slightly as he took a good look over Reagan, still lent against the wall.

'Urgh, such a creep' thought Reagan, finishing her last burger before slowly strolling towards the car before her.
Darryl had been something of an unfortunate Tinder date that Reagan had picked up as a joke.
Claiming to be exceptionally wealthy and looking for a skinny girl to indulge her every whim with a not unappealing face to match seemed too good to be true and most likely a fake profile at best.
Naturally, Reagan swiped right expecting no reply.

Turns out though that Darryl was very much the real deal.
Money, looks and he didn't shy away from spoiling Reagan at dinner which worked to her advantage as she ordered lobster.
After dinner things went a little down hill though when he invited her back to his and he spent most of the night trying to push more food on her.
A couple of awkward hook ups later and an argument revolving around the outbursts of 'you're trying to make me fat' and 'duuuh' the two parted ways.

Having discovered Darryl's tendencies towards feederism and how keen he was on enacting that with a woman, Reagan ran for the hills but, not being one to maintain her phone properly, had never got rid of his number.
Madness ensuing and jealous fires roaring inside her, Reagan couldn't stop herself from contacting Darryl to ask for his 'assistance'.
Reagan really wasn't taking second best well.

Throwing the passenger side door open and dropping herself heavily into the leather bucket seat, Reagan found herself once again in the company of someone she hadn't even imagined she would remember, nevermind feel the need to ask for help from.

"You've not done bad on your own there Reagan" smirked Darryl as he got a closer look at the redhead, observing just how much of the seat her rear filled.

"Ok creepazoid, rule number one, this is purely business" stated Reagan sharply "we aren't getting back together, I'm taking advatange of your money and you get to watch"
Put in his place, Darryl simply nodded, allowing the redhead to continue
"Secondly, I'm the boss and I'm not just another one of your land whales, got that? Have as many of your girls round as you like, I'm just eating your food"

Darrly looked confused.
"So you're moving into my house?"

"Nope" Reagan glared before carrying on "rule number three, this is all on my terms so when I'm done we're done"

"May I ask a question?" asked Darryl, turning fully to face Reagan with an elbow on the steering wheel.

"As long as that wasn't it" jabbed Reagan, not meeting Darryl's gaze.

"Why now?"

"Huh?"

"You never even liked the idea of stuffing your face before, why now?" asked Darryl again, rather insistently.

Reagan thought about it for a moment, chewing her lip as she did getting a delicate hit of salt from the residue of fries left on the edge of her mouth.
"None of your business" she settled on defiantly.

Smirking again, Darryl kicked the car over before turning into the drive through just in front of them.

"Your choice but these things work better with a motive" he chimed, taking a moment to glance over the scrolling menus stradling the road.

Reagan rolled her eyes, taking to looking out of her own window as the heavy smell of grease and fries hit her nose.
Feeling her mouth start to fill with saliva, Reagan couldn't help but admit to herself that she enjoyed pigging out lately.
A naturally greedy woman, not unlike her twin, being given an excuse to indulge in everything she wanted did please the moody redhead more than she'd admit to anyone.

**************

"Here we are, Castle Darryl" chirped Darryl as the automatic gates slowly parted to a long winding drive, leading to the familiar house on the hill.
Reagan didn't particularly care though.
For one, she'd seen the place before and it didn't impress her then and two she was busy tearing fried chicken from the bone.
McDonalds had led to KFC which had then led to Krispy Kreme, all of which was dispersed around a phone call to an unfamiliar pizza place which had delivered to the gates they had just driven through.

Having discarded her jacket sometime after doughnuts and denting most of the food apart from the pizza, Reagan already showed signs of fullness with her stomach bulging further than when she started and a faint layer of sweat dappling her face and arms.
Stubborn as ever though, this didn't stop the redhead swallowing chicken before swiping up a 2l bottle of coke and downing a good portion of it.
The result saw Reagan belch forcefully before going back to it, brutally biting into a doughnut from her lap.

Darryl was impressed and, he had to admit, that he was turned on by his former flame's display but, as a gentleman, he simply unclipped her seatbelt for her and grabbed the freshly arrived pizza.
Autopilot kicked in at this point as her door swung open and Reagan meandered up the stairs and into the house, never skipping a beat to eat as she almost instinctively worked towards a living room she hardly remembered.
Fading memories aside though, Darryl didn't have to correct her path and simply laid the food he was carrying down before Reagan as she landed, still not halting her eating for anything.

Free from the car and restrictive seatbelts, Reagan's belly did look swollen for her efforts but, to her own touch, still felt plenty soft.
Her mind wandered to the first time her and Uma had gone to Brass Tops after hitting the gym and how she'd felt fit to burst after all she'd eaten there.
Now here she sat having eaten much more than that sitting and felt fine still, so much so that her continuous stuffing didn't break at all as she almost elegantly glided between food items.
Needless to say, she was a much larger girl than she had been then but the sentiment still stood as Reagan started to double stack slices of pizza before feeding them into her eager maw.

************

"oo...BUUUUURP...ph"
Reagan groaned as her lips tore apart to release the pressure resting in her stomach which she was gently rubbing between her hands.
With a wry smile, Darryl sauntered back into the room having left some time back and glanced over the woman before him stretched out on his sofa with feet barely touching the ground.

"Sounds like you're finally finished there" he smirked whilst sliding his hands into his jeans.

"No shit Sherlock" spat Reagan, snippy as ever even in her incapacitated state.

"Well I suppose you won't be wanting this cheesecake then" teased Darryl

"You ain't got cheesecake" mumbled Reagan, making the observation based on his empty hands.

"Oh yeah?" challenged the host before taking a couple of steps back and taking hold of a serving plate holding quite a sizeable cheesecake "What's this then?"

Reagan initially repulsed at the thought of eating more but soon the sweet combination of vanilla and chocolate filled her nostrils and she felt drawn in.
Darryl simply started to close the gap, bringing the large dessert closer to his guest which had the effect of luring Reagan into a slightly upright position, albeit restricted by the size and fullness of her stomach.

"How did you know I love cheesecake?" asked Reagan rather huskily

"You all love cheesecake Reags, all fat girls love the stuff" teased Darryl as he sat the plate into Reagan's lap who hungrily licked her lips.
1333312411221223442222.title: Desperate times, bigger measurements

choices: Reagan has finally earned her triumph in the Battle of the Butts!
Much to her twin's chagrin, Phoebe ends up wearing the shorts better.
The twins' increased size soon causes them issues in life and at home.
It turns out that Phoebe's and Reagan's enablers have their own connection.
13333124112212234422221.content:
For the ladies of 8422 Fordham Ave, when everybody had needed Ixchel to bail them out with an up-sized wardrobe last month, for a majority of the residents it had been a wakeup call. Audrey and Ixchel, both with the kinds of metabolisms that had left them chunky since middle school, had really tried to not outgrow their new clothes. Uma, finding dismay at what she had outgrown and the loss of her athletic drive, had tried to return to her body's prime by increased efforts at the gym. It would be far too expsenive to replace their wardrobe again and again if their weights increased.

Albeit these concerns didn't end up reducing the amount of snacking and extra portions had at the townhouse. What was saved in the clothing budget was put towards the increased appetites of Audrey, Ixchel and Uma. Enough that they weren't losing weight but, for now, their weight had plateaued.

The twins were a different story, as the redheaded youngsters of the townhouse surged forward on their weight gains at an alarming rate.

Arguably, at one point in time the twins had each been the skinniest members of the household, as their weight was only carried in their shapely rears. The pair of pear-shaped twins had shot up the relative sizes of all five roommates ranked smallest to biggest. Everyone had gained plenty of weight but the twins had gained the most. The possibility of them becoming the fattest residents of the townhouse was not a question of if, but when given the inevitability.

Phoebe's increasing appetite and Reagan's envious stuffing complex had been accelerated by their respective enablers. Nat, who had started giving Phoebe generous discounts at the club even when the young redhead was the only townhouse gal in attendance, also frequently invited Phoebe out for lunches on the days in-between club nights. With each meal, not only did Nat put her fair share of food away, most of what she ordered on her plate wound up on Phoebe's instead.

Reagan had her arrangements with Darryl, a short-term date with a history of catering to hungry, gaining females. Her crazed ambition was given calorific substance by Darryl's deep pockets and feeder expertise. Much as she insisted on keeping her own control and agency of this agreement, from the outside those that knew Darryl wouldn't be that wrong in thinking the older Durant twin was a prize new conquest.

Really, both of the twins were spending most of their time out of the townhouse with these compatriots. Their waistlines and bottom-heavy genes were taking a toil from having their appetites lavishly provided sustenance.

* * * *


Ixchel was mainly a computer gamer, and thus holed up with the games in her office one floor up in the townhouse when she had her free time, but every once in awhile she would pull out one of the consoles and commandeer the TV on the ground floor living room. Today she had gone very retro, having hooked up the classic Playstation for early polygonal gaming she remembered from her childhood.

Ixchel was every part the video game slogger with a pack of special flavored Dew and a bag of chips on standby. As aforementioned she had stymied her weight gain thus far, although her stomach was broader and her breasts plumper, another dozen or so pounds inching onto her frame.

"Oh my gosh!" Ixchel was startled out of some speed running practice when Phoebe emerged on the scene. "Is this that game with the monkeys?"

"Err, Apes, rather," Ixchel corrected. "The ones that have escaped, after all." She had to pause her game as it had become rare these last few weeks to actually see her youngest cousin at home.

And good lord, Phoebe had not slowed down the rate of her expansion in that time. It was hard to believe she had once been a model. Phoebe was poured into some overtaxed pajamas, apparently arisen from another late night of partying at Nat's club. Nightlife Ixchel was not as familiar with, but that wasn't what worried her. Phoebe was in full porker territory now.

Her floral patterned pajamas were stretched over a broad stomach and wide hips, the ties barely having any length to poke out the waist of the lounge pants. Ixchel had the sudden memory of when all the cousins/sisters had been in their single digit ages, one time during a sleep over at Ixchel's place when they had played around by wearing her older sister's clothes and stuffing pillows in those oversized shirts.

That was what Phoebe looked like now, like she had grafted a pillow to her middle, yet Ixchel could see that rather than unyielding foam of a pillow the faintest of flabby jiggles could be seen under Phoebe's plain shirt, snug to her engorged middle like a second skin. Her breasts were also approaching Ixchel's own enlarged sweater puppies, and the beginnings of a double chin filled out the redhead's face as well.

"Can I watch?" Phoebe asked, chipper as ever an oblivious to Ixchel's growing concerns. "You were always better at this game as I kid, I could never find those blasted apes!"

"Uh, sure," Ixchel bit her lip.

"Cool! Let me get us some more snacks!" Ixchel had to flinch back when Phoebe turned to retreat back into the kitchenette. That butt! That huge, plumped, just sagging butt that looked like it would need its own zip code soon. Its enormity stretched the seams on the pajama pants, compete with thighs that would require two or three hand-withs just to measure.

Much to Ixchel's chagrin, Phoebe had brought back a bevy of snacks. Two more bowls of chips, a package of creme filled cookies, and an ice pop for each of them. Rather, 4 ice pops that Phoebe was unwrapping to Ichel's single tangerine flavor. And if Ixchel hadn't comprehended the girth of Phoebe's lower half from sight alone, she got fully aware of it when Phoebe sat down. Uncomfortably so.

See, the townhouse furniture for the living room had to be compact. A small couch, a recliner, and the two-seater that Ixchel had been in when she set up her game. Phoebe planting her great big tuckus in the other seat brought Ixchel the realization that, holy crap, Phoebe's weighty hip was pressing up against her own. Hell, she took up more than just her side of the seat!

Ixchel lost all composure on trying to master a pathway for her ape catching platformer as Phoebe took up her attention, both from her fun-loving nature and complete disregard to addressing how big she was getting. Ixchel couldn't help but notice that Phoebe was plowing her way through most of the snacks.

Several minutes of putzing around a level at Phoebe's request for funny antics, they pair were interrupted by the slam of the front door. "Hey sis, I got something for ya."

Reagan, an equally rare sight as Phoebe these days, stomped into the room. Stomped was a good choice of words, as Ixchel was starting to feel claustrophobic once both twins were in the living room. It wasn't that odd to imagine that identical siblings were close to the same size and shape but for the Durant twins this was downright ridiculous.

Reagan had to unbelt her hip hugging jeans that were gang-pressed into hip-incarcerating jeans, her midriff billowing over the tight pinch of the material in the waist. How in the heck had Reagan gotten as big if not bigger than Phoebe? Ixchel didn't know about the depraved lengths Reagan's twisted ambitions had wrought her. The envious, conniving twin had just come home from a session of burning Darryl's wallet for food money, and the signs of Reagan's gorging where plain to see. Her skippy top had to maintain both an enlarged chest and a belly that was starting to form two rolls even with Reagan standing, in contrast to Pheobe's belly folding only when she sat down.

For Ixchel it was almost like staring at an optical illusion. She would have sworn Phoebe was the largest of the Durant sisters at this point, yet Reagan might have usurped that claim. As bottom heavy as they were the twins surprisingly wore their weight differently. Phoebe had more of her flaring profile broadening to chunky thighs and calorie soaked legs, while Reagan had developed quite the impressive bust and had her greedy gut stick out farther from her clothes.

"Oh hi Reagan," Phoebe greeted between mouthfuls of cookie bites. "Where have you been?"

"Shopping," Regan said, laden with store bags. After her disastrous first shopping trip to up her wardrobe, it didn't take long for Reagan to discover +Size as the store better suited for her newfound dimensions. "I actually found these really sleek pair of shorts so I got us a matching set. Want to try them on?"

"Really?" Phoebe was never one to turn down a gift but the motivation surprised her. "You want us to dress up the same? We haven't really done that since high school, when it fell out of fashion."

"Oh come on, Phebs," Reagan brushed aside the query, intent on settling this matter once and for all. All of her efforts to outclass Phoebe in the size of their ass had come to this moment, using a new pair of shorts to have the definitive example to see who's ass was more spectacular. "We haven't really hung out or done anything together, and I just wanted to get you a gift. Try them on."

"Alright," Phoebe grunted under her breath as she hoisted herself out of the seat. Reagan grinned wickedly, masking her calculated machination into a more genuine smile, as the thought of the bliss of regaining the sibling right of passage for having the bigger asset.

As Ixchel watched the two twins go off to try on their new outfits, she couldn't help but stare at their great big rears. Honestly, everyone in the townhouse had let themselves go but the twins had REALLY let themselves go! The two looked like walking bean bags.

Ixchel cracked open another soda, disturbed at the thought of how much further the expansion of Reagan and Phoebe would continue.
13333124112212234422221.title: Hip to Hip

choices: In celebration, Reagan returns to Darryl's house
Looking for comfort and counsel, Phoebe meets up with Nat
The battle has only just begun...
The fallout from Reagan's victory soon splits the townhouse in two.
133331241122122344222211.content:
In her excitement Reagan could have bound up the stairs at a vast rate of knots just to drag her sister up to bring about her humiliating victory.
Sadly for the eldest twin however, her bulging weight made bounding a near impossible task, particularly since she was currently nursing a great binge after being at Darryl's.
Reagan briefly glanced down at her ever growing midriff, catching sight of the escaping roll of belly fat bouncing against her thighs with each climbing step but, contrary to her character, Reagan was not disgusted.
She knew that the price was worth the effort of finally stripping Phoebe of her alpha sized rear.

Speaking of Phoebe, although not as large in the stomach region as her twin, Phoebe's inflated hips made each step lethargic at best as her pyjama pants creaked as she ascended the townhouse stairs slowly.
Having spent just as much time as Reagan pigging out at somebody elses expense, Phoebe was quite content with her body, especially given the adoration and positivity that Nat poured over her whilst indulging the redhead's vastly expanding appetite.

"Hurry up Phebes! I can't wait to see how cute we look in these shorts!" called Reagan from the top of the stairs as she forcefully swung her bedroom door open.
Unlike her twin, Reagan kept a much messier room.
With much too small clothes strewn around the place surrounding a barely covered bed, Reagan kicked her jeans off completely, giving a momentary sigh of relief as her hips could breath again.
The restrictive denim landed amongst a pile of discarded food wrappers that had frequented her room more since Darryl's arrival on the scene just as Phoebe entered the room and delicately pushed the door to.

"Wow Reagan, I've never seen you so excited about something" mused Phoebe as she glanced around her sister's room.

"It's just nice to be able to share something for a change" smiled Reagan with a sickly smear of mania as she grabbed the bag that contained the shorts "Here ya go sissy"

Phoebe barely reacted in time as the flying shorts came at her and, admittedly, her larger chest caught more of them than her hands.
Needless to say though, the upward movement was enough to pull her too small t-shirt just enough to expose more of her growing belly.
Clothes in hand though, Phoebe did not hesitate in stripping her bottom half ready to redress herself.

"Fuck me" muttered Reagan as she got a real eyeful of just how large Phoebe had gotten in the ass department as two huge wobbling cheeks rolled out of her pyjama pants.

"Huh?" asked Phoebe, looking over her shoulder whilst bent over as best as her middle would allow her.

1333312411221223442222114.content:
"Hey, Durant," Audrey's boss dropped off another case file at her desk. "When need this updated for the progress meeting this afternoon."

"Yes ma'am," Audrey stomached her sigh at the increased workload, as her cubicle space was stacked with files.

"Also, do you know who brought the doughnuts in the break-room?"

Audrey blanched. "Um, at the end of the month I usually think it's Denise?"

Her boss frowned. "Well, somebody needs to tell her to get a better selection. There's nothing but cherry bear-claws in there."

"Maybe it was all the bakery had?" Audrey joked, as she dutifully returned to her computer while opening the case file as her boss strode away. Biting her lip, she scooted one stack of forms to the side and grabbed a maple frosted doughnut from her secret stash.

What with the increased snacking habits of her townhouse roommates, Audrey was the definition of a stress eater given her heavy workload. The law office handled far too many cases than two partnered lawyers and three paralegals would conceivably be able to keep up with, most ending up on Audrey's plate.

In actuality, Denise had brought two boxes of doughnuts today, and Audrey had needed the nourishment to get through a work day. She told herself that the doughnuts had been for the whole office, that included her, and soon taking a pair become tacking four, then six, then Audrey felt she may as well sneak her own box to her desk as she deserved it, using a quiet, unobserved morning to pick her favorites from the office offerings.

Audrey was careful not to get powdered sugar on her work blouse, her plumped chest and middle beginning to put a strain on the buttons. Her hunger kept her mind placated, ignorant of the downsides that all these workplace treats would cause her to soon outgrow her business attire, and this was after a wardrobe upgrade.

Mid mouthful, her cell phone started ringing. Audrey hurriedly swallowed the doughnut, strugglingly to reach her phone in the shallow pockets of her slacks. While she didn't have the twin's outrageous bum her plus size physique had a more than meager butt, which put a strain on trying to grab something from her pockets as she sat down.

"Hello?" Audrey answered, the phone immediately filled with the sounds of sobbing. "Phoebe? Sweetie, I told you I can't take personal calls at work--" Audrey's nerves lead her to the next doughnut to nibble, chocolate with cinnamon frosting. "Huh? Slow down. Reagan did...what?"

* * * *


"What up, witches!" Reagan excitedly bound down to the den, where Uma was seated.

Seated was a questionable term for Uma, trying to fit her butt on the exercise bike she kept down here. Mid-workout, although thoroughly taxed compared to her previous physical prime, she regarded Reagan with annoyance. "Damnit, red, I'm busy."

"With what?" It was amusing that Reagan was oblivious to how she and Uma had waffled on their gym membership. Whereas Reagan had been futility exercising to keep her weight down whilst stuffing her face to match Phoebe's rear and Uma had gone less and less, both of them had changed their goals entirely, with Uma trying to downsize after she realized all the weight she had gained while Reagan, desperate for the biggest ass, had shunned the gym in favor of meeting Darryl.

"Seriously?" Uma noticed Reagan was wearing a pair of sleek black shorts she couldn't even close, letting her doughy middle pooch out over the waistband. Reagan should look in the mirror for how fat she was getting.

Reagan was so single-minded that she didn't catch the connotation. "Whatever. How about when you're done and clean up we go out to celebrate? Hit the party scene, I've got plenty to blow."

"Since when did you want to party the same places I do?" Uma questioned, as Reagan was often too prickly to others in a public setting. " 'Sides, I already went out with Phoebe last Sunday."

"Even though she's gone out every other night without you?" Reagan retorted with a bit of a snicker.

That caught Uma off guard. "Huh?"

Reagan grinned. "Phoebe's been spending a lot of time with your ol' college chum, Nat. They even meet up for lunch. You party at her place, you never noticed?"

"She...what?!" Uma stepped off the exercise bike. "I introduced them, that bitch! I warned Audrey about the two of them." Back when Phoebe had first discovered +Size, Uma had caught Uma and Nat coming out of there heading off to the food court. While Uma liked Nat as a friend, well enough, she knew from her college years what Nat could be like.

Before she started her nightclub, Nat was always getting the gang to go drinking and try out her recipes. She was as equally as big of a hedonist as Uma, only the black athlete had her sports to keep her figure trim when she was an undergraduate. And Uma had seen Nat sink her claws into her 'favorites' before. She had tried it with just about every girl in their dorm. And Audrey.

When Uma first brought Phoebe to Nat's place, she thought her presence would help curb Nat's tendencies. Hell, she had damn good food, which was part of how Uma had let herself go in the first place. Yet she had gotten so caught up in her own weight gain that she hadn't gone out as often when Phoebe wanted to party constantly. Thus she hadn't acted on the signs that Nat had turned Phoebe into one of her 'projects.'

Concern, fury, and some repressed jealously at never being such treatment from Nat all these years that she had known her, mixed in Uma's face. "How come Aud hasn't done anything about this?"

"Who's to say?" Since Reagan had learned of the parameters of Phoebe's social life, she was getting more and more ambitious at besting her twin in every way now that she had reclaimed her crown as booty queen. "What say we hit up Nat's place and give her a piece of our mind?"

Uma threw down her exercise towel. "Deal."

* * * *


"Phoebe, don't talk with your mouth full, just slow down and help me understand."

Audrey's youngest sister was in full on meltdown when she interrupted her workday. Her tears and blubbering couldn't be comprehended over the phone. Audrey had a cheap cell phone plan that didn't offer her many minutes and data each month, so she semi-frequently would hit her cap, plus the reception was horrible.

Audrey was sticking her neck out at the office taking her lunch break at this part of the day, given everything she had to do, but the only way she could think of getting Phoebe to calm down was taking them out to their favorite diner. It was one of those retro 50's malt shops that their parents had taken them to since they were kids. For the oldest and youngest of the Durant sisters, it was their favorite hangout that brought back a lot of childhood memories.

Plus, Audrey was hanging back to try and keep her blouse clean. Sitting in the opposite seat of the booth, Phoebe's face was runny with makeup, tears, and the six flavors of ice cream found in her ultimate banana split. "*sniff* Reagan was so mean!!!" She cried. "She said I was fat! *sniff* Pur-posefully *sniff* to show her up in the booty!!"

"Honey..." Audrey tried to comfort her baby sister, yet was unsure how to do so. Phoebe had been getting fat as of late. Out of the corner of her eye she could see other diner patrons giving odd looks to the sister's booth. The whole motivation behind this was as childish as Phoebe currently was being, a grown young woman bawling like a toddler.

"And she bought these shorts!" Phoebe sobbed after another spoonful. "That were tight and painful, made me wear them, when I thought..."
Phoebe was lost to her emotions and her increased appeitie. Her explanation of the events were fragmented and lost being her sobs, as it took Audrey most of her patty melt to decipher what had been going on.

"So Reagan insulted you, humiliated you, and has been bullying you?" Audrey summarized. "That has got to stop! I also don't like her spending so much when we're struggling to get by as it is!" She grabbed Phoebe by the sticky, ice cream covered hand. "And Phoebe, you're prettier and nicer than Reagan! Don't let her get you down, we're going to fix this."

* * * *


"I was so blind." Uma sighed into her hands. "Still, Reagan, that's a stupid thing to compete with Phoebe about. Who has the bigger ass?"

"Don't act like you're not surprised," Reagan crossed her arms under her growing chest. "Phebs and I have been pulling shit like this since high school when we tried to go after the same guys."

"I suppose all of this junk is your own choice, then," Uma jiggled some of Reagan's fattened middle.

"Hey, hands off!" Reagan yelled, hiding the fact that she was getting ticklish as she grew larger.

"Sure explains a lot about why you needed my help at the gym. But why can't Phoebe see that she's being played? Trust me, things with Nat can take a...bad turn, let's say."

"How about we enact some vengeance.?" Reagan replied, pleased to have swayed Uma to her side.

"I want to hit it to her where it hurts, yeah," Uma said. Much as her machinations with Reagan could backfire, she couldn't help but regard their current predicament. "So you plan on staying this flabby?"

Reagan shrugged. "Eh, I could do without gut," she admitted, although her newfound breasts pleased her. "I just want to stay on top of Phoebe. She's such a crybaby, only thinks about herself, little goodie-two shoes that claims she can't do anything wrong."

"Yeah," Uma said darkly. "I'm getting sick of her pity games. She can deal with being in over her head for once."

Uma wasn't wrong

A moment passed with the tattooed club owner thinking that Phoebe had decided to swing by that night before realising this wasn't QUITE the Phoebe she was familiar with.

"I hear you've been messing with my sister" announced Reagan as she lent against the bar, her boobs sitting heavily on her forearms, giving Nat quite the view down her stretched tshirt.

"Don't play dumb Nat, I know what you're like with girls like Phoebe" sternly put Uma behind Reagan.

"Ok, calm down hotshot, I'm listening" patronised Nat, appreciating the amount of bulging fat escaping Reagan's tshirt "you want a drink or...something to eat perhaps?"

"What you've been doing with Phoebe, loading her up with food and fattening her brains out..."
A pause ensued as Reagan assessed whether Nat really was listening before wagging a finger to draw her target down to her level again, allowing her to whisper directly into Nat's ear.
"I want in"

Nat's face lit up at those words, a look that she couldn't quite wipe away before continuing the conversation.
"Sorry honey, you've got the wrong person there, I just..."

"Well my sister ain't clever enough to get that fat on her own and she sure spends a lot of time with you" retorted Reagan, knowing that Nat was just playing with her at this point.

"What can I say, the girl can eat" purred Nat with the pretense of innocence still oozing from her.

"Well we are twins and I do have a much bigger ass than her these days" teased Reagan, employing techniques she normally used on guys.
The two locked eyes for a moment just before Sheryl's song finished, leaving an almost eerie silence over the club.

"I will be right back ladies, I just have to talk to my DJ" rattled off Nat with all the charm of a hostess before shimmying around the bar and trotting up to the sound desk across the dancefloor.

Reagan could only smile as she caught a glimpse of Nat peering back over her shoulder, no doubt to examine the redhead's figure in its entirety.
The moment did not last, however, before a forceful punch found its way into Reagan's softer arm.
"What the hell was that?!" exclaimed Uma as she stared daggers at Reagan as she chuckled "I thought we were getting revenge?"

"What I said was I want to stay on top of Phoebe" interjected Reagan "this Nat chick seems like a pretty good way of doing that considering what she's done to Phoebe over the past few weeks"

Uma was left flabbergasted at what she'd just heard.
Not only had she steered Phoebe into Nat's web of food related torture but now Reagan had lept into the same trap willingly.
Uma couldn't believe the stupidity of the twins and, more importantly, she couldn't believe that she was once again been upstaged for Nat's attention.

"Besides, I'm doing the house a favour, between Darryl and Nat my food bill is going to be non-existent back home" laughed Reagan as she started to salivate just thinking about all the free food she was setting herself up for.

Uma could only stare dumbfounded at the younger redhead, baffled as to how Reagan thought this could end well in any way.
The thought was cut short though as Nat came sauntering back towards the bar as the music kicked up again.

"Sorry about that ladies, you know how live entertainment can be" apologised Nat with a quirky smile "so where were we?"

"We were about to leave actu..." started Uma before being cut off dramatically.

"That's right, little Reagan wants to be my friend" grinned the host with a cheshire cat smile before closing the gap between the two of them to whisper in the redhead's ear as she had done before "I say let's play, friend"

Reagan would likely have reacted more openly but, before she had the chance to, Nat had grabbed her hand and was leading her to a door to one side of the bar.
As the girls approached the door, Nat turned to face Uma
"You coming Uma? There's room for everybody back here"
Uma's instincts told her that this was beyond wrong, but a deep urge within her stomach cried out for her to follow.

Without any further hesitation and a semi-audible rumble from her stomach, Uma followed after the others.
This was all she had ever wanted after all.

*****

"So ladies, what we have here is what I like to call...the Manager's Special" announced Nat as she heaved two large trays towards her guests who were seated in a cushioned booth next to each other.
Nat had brought them into a private function room that backed onto the bar but could not be seen by any other patrons of the club that night.

"WHEN you want this again you'll have to come through me because, well, its not on the menu" purred Nat as she laid each meal down before each girl "besides, its basically a food challenge so I have to...authenticate every attempt"

Needless to say, neither Reagan or Uma were particularly listening as they looked over the piles of food before them.

"Seeing as you're so curious, let me go over the meal" smiled Nat, taking great pleasure in her theatrics "each Special includes two foot long chilli dogs, a half dozen sliders and a rack of ribs laid on a bed of mashed potatoes, spicy wings and fried chicken with onion rings, mozzarella sticks and salt and pepper fries"

The sheer quantity of food would have been enough to deter most people but, given their recent dietary upgrades, the girls of Fordham Avenue were hardly 'most people'.

"Well whenever you're ready girls" beckoned Nat with a spread of her arms as Reagan and Uma threw themselves into the mountains of food before her.
As the girls feasted, Nat couldn't help but smile.
It had been a while since she had had so many people on her feeding hook and it felt good to be back in the game like this.

*****

"Urgh Uma, I can't move" groaned Reagan with her stomach bulging out from her figure in a near spherical curve "Uma?"

The dark skinned hedonist snorted in her sleep as a soft puffy belch escaped her lips, her own stomach looking even rounder than before.

"Urgh useless" groaned Reagan as she adjusted herself slightly with a hand lazily laid over her stomach with the haze of an overstuffed sleep tugging at her eyes.

"Oh Reagan!" cooed Nat from the kitchen "how would you like something sweet to finish?"

"I don't kn..." started Reagan with a grunt as she cradled her fullness just in time for the kitchen door to swing open to show Nat carrying a tray of cakes through.

"They would only go to waste after tonight so have what you want honey" purred Nat as she placed them before the two girls.

Reagan couldn't help but look at the selection which instinctively triggering her hunger again, even if she didn't want it mentally.
With a heavy sigh, she reached for a particularly aromatic chocolate cake with both hands before peeling a slice from it and taking a large bite, prompting a rather throaty moan of enjoyment as she did.

133331241122122344222211412.content:
Audrey had to admit, she was proud of Phoebe.
Things had been rough after the great divide between the twins, particularly given the emotional reactions from Phoebe and the long lasting absences of Reagan...and Uma for that matter...but Audrey felt her motherly tendencies stirring for her youngest sibling.
Turbulent times aside though and, after a great deal of supportive ‘there theres’, Phoebe’s mood had improved a great deal.

In fact, one might even mistake Phoebe to be growing up from her usual childish ways.
In a surprising turn of events, and with little persuasion, Audrey had managed to convince Phoebe to take a position at her office which the redhead had warmed to almost organically.
Smartening herself up, Phoebe had traded her usual skimpy attire for tailored skirts and formal knee length dresses whilst also allowing her pride to subside enough to start wearing her glasses again.
Phoebe really was a pretty girl when she wasn’t being so pushy with her appearance.

Audrey also took solace in the fact that Phoebe’s new job came with a constant and not insufficient wage.
Although not a great salary for one trying to support a house of four, Ixchel was after all self sufficient, but with Phoebe matching that wage and Reagan and Uma rarely home to drain resources they weren’t contributing to, things were financially settled for the first time in a long time.
Combined with Ixchel’s contributions the sisters even managed to hold onto some disposable income for themselves.
Disposable income which, given Phoebe’s improved mental state and Audrey’s pride for her sister, was being spent with something of a blind eye turned to it.

*****

“Mhm, Aud, could you pass me the soda?” asked Phoebe as she shuffled a pizza box onto the couch cushion beside her.

“Sure thing sweetie” smiled Audrey as she leaned across to her sister with the 2litre bottle in hand.

“Thanks sis” purred Phoebe as she twisted the lid for and drank deeply from the bottle, draining a significant amount before breathing.

This had become something of a regular occurrence for Phoebe and Audrey as the former settled into her new job and increased wage.
Also increasingly frequent were the number of shared meals the girls had in general.

Breakfast before work
Lunch at work
Snack breaks during work time
Dinner after work
Takeaway and tv nights

This particular instance was the latter.

Having at one point disapproved of Phoebe’s excessive consumption, Audrey had quickly realised that it did provide an outlet for her younger sister to air her feelings when dealing with the Reagan issue.
As unorthodox a method as it may have been, the matriarchal blonde deemed it a worthy sacrifice if it meant Phoebe felt supported...even if the two girls did take on a great deal of empty calories as a result.
Long story short, even once Phoebe had got out of her funk, neither Durant wanted to give up on their frequent bonding meals and the rest is history.

*****

“BUUURP!”

“Phoebe!” cried Audrey with a slight giggle to her tone, one which jostled her bloated middle.

The redhead barely seemed phased though as she dove back into one of the pizza boxes in close arms reach, retrieving a greasy cheese drenched slice and bringing it straight to her plump lips.

Audrey could only roll her eyes as she took to her own pizza box, looking over the tv as a parade of tanned scantily clad couples paraded around some beach chalet.
As per, she didn’t specifically care for the content but it was her guilty pleasure nonetheless.

“Is the garlic bread down there?” asked Phoebe, hoovering up a string of cheese dangling from the corner of her mouth, the only remnants of her most recent slice.

Audrey nodded, her own mouth full at the moment.

“Cool” smiled Phoebe as she heaved herself to her feet.
Although quite the professional at work, Phoebe hadn’t changed that much at home and, after a full day in the office she had immediately shelled her skirt and unbuttoned her shirt.
The wardrobe choice didn’t leave much to the imagination.

With her front open to the elements with the sides of her button shirt flapping around her bulging sides, it was clear that Phoebe’s boobs were catching up with Audrey’s in terms of size.
Her stomach was also surging forward compared to her thinner days and, even now standing, a prominent roll around her belly button was starting to feature giving her a heavy double belly look.
As ever though, Phoebe’s rear end was her largest asset.

Considering the redhead possessed something of an office ass already, working alongside Audrey had only allowed her rear to balloon even more.
With her panties being swallowed by the vast wobbling cheeks and overhung by her bulging love handles, Phoebe’s ass was an entity unto itself and a defining feature like no other for the youngest Durant.
Her thighs were expanding at just as great a rate as well which, combined with her ass, had garnered a great deal of attention at work, something that Phoebe still relished in.

“Sorry honey, I could have got that for you” apologised Audrey as she shifted in her seat whilst discarding her empty pizza box.

Don’t worry Aud” cooed Phoebe as she bent over to grab the bread box “you can get the ice cream”

“Ohh, I forgot about ice cream” pondered Audrey “do you want it now”

“Always!” cheered Phoebe as she plopped heavily back in her seat, a piece of garlic bread already hanging from her mouth.

‘I should have known’ thought Audrey with a chuckle as she shuffled to the front of her seat before rising to her feet.
“Ooph” groaned Audrey as she glanced down her body and gently stroked her belly with her finger tips.
The sudden shift in her well fed weight had felt slightly uncomfortable until the blonde realised a different source of pressure.
Not to peddle stereotypes but, as a motherly person, Audrey was prone to wearing her leg wear more high waisted than her age group would usually suggest.
This fashion choice also extended to her sweatpants.

Despite having eaten a great deal that night already, the stretchy grey material was still hugging her belly on a plane that still concealed her belly button.
It didn’t take a genius to notice though that the material was starting to pinch and form a slight bulge above the waistband.

“That doesn’t look comfortable Aud” observed Phoebe, taking a moment to pause from eating.

“You’re telling me” groaned Audrey as she tugged at the elasticated band, relishing in the release of pressure with each tug.

“Well then, let it all out!” suggested the redhead with a cherubic smile.

The suggestion caught Audrey off guard.
Such exhibitionism was usually the twins forte even with their recent weight gains.
Audrey was much more reserved even if the pressure on her stomach was REALLY unpleasant.

“Audrey?” called out Phoebe to her sister, breaking the blondes day dream.

“Huh? Sorry, what did you say?”

“Let the belly out if it’s uncomfy!”

“Oh yeah...”
‘What’s the worst that could happen?’

It took a moment of build up but finally Audrey built up the courage and...*snap*

“Oh god, that feels so good!” moaned Audrey with a deep breath as her rounded belly hung heavily over her now lowered waistband.
Naturally broad hipped, although not as curvaceous as Phoebe, Audrey had filled out quite impressively around the middle as she and her sister had indulged.

“Haha, told you!” smirked Phoebe before diving back into her food.

“Yes you did” smiled Audrey with a thankful warmth “so, ice cream?”

“Mhm, yeah” purred Phoebe “and chocolate and chips and cookies whilst you’re there”

“No problem” laughed Audrey as she turned to the living room door.
The blonde ambled slowly down the hall towards the kitchen, one hand cradling her bloated belly as she did.
She felt full but not uncomfortably so and, if she was being honest, it wasn’t the most she and Phoebe had eaten in one sitting...
As concerned as she had once been for Phoebe’s sudden weight gain, the worry had since dissipated, it wasn’t so bad enjoying what you ate especially now they had the spare money anyway.

*****

“Ok, I couldn’t decide on flavours so I’ve brought them all, hope that’s ok” called Audrey as she re-entered the living room, arms full of the food requested.

“Mhhhhm, good” cooed Phoebe from her place on the couch “pizza won’t be here for a while so that should keep us going”

Audrey looked confused as she put the food down
“You ordered more pizza?”

“Yep” purred Phoebe as she took a rather revealing photo and posted it through snapchat “I just figured there’s still loads of the night left so we might as well enjoy it”
Despite her recent changes, the redhead remained as popular as ever on the medium.

Although a surprise, Audrey couldn’t argue the decision.
She did feel much hungrier now she wasn’t being squeezed by her waistband...

“Sounds good Phebs” smiled Audrey as she sat down again, her boobs jiggling above her belly as she did before slipping up a large packet of triple chocolate cookies hungrily.
133331241122122344222211412.title: Doting big sister makes sisters bigger

choices: Audrey and Phoebe draw some male attention
Audrey agrees to go to lunch with Phoebe and Nat
Reagan and Uma have been keeping well fed
Soon enough another wardrobe upgrade is in order.
1333312411221223442222114121.content:
"Hey Auuuudrey" called Phoebe from the opening of her eldest sisters work cubicle.

"Yes Phoebe?" replied the blonde, not breaking eye contact with her computer screen as she flicked between databases and emails with a certain finesse.

"I just wondered if we had a plan for dinner tonight" cooed the bottom heavy redhead as she sauntered slightly into Audrey's cubicle space, her red dress clinging to her engorged figure with every fibre.

Audrey sighed, there was no way she would be able to concentrate on work during this conversation.
"Not officially, have you got anything in mind?"

"Nuh uh" replied Phoebe with an overly enthusiastic shake of the head, one which sent her larger chest into a wobble "I just wanted to know because I was thinking of going out for lunch and didn't want to get the same thing twice"

"Well where are you going for lunch?" asked Audrey, a hint of mum slipping into her tone as she turned in her swivel chair with her arms folded.

"I don't know, Nat'll probably just take me to the food court again" mused Phoebe with all her usual innocence and a glimmer of daydreaming of the potential feast she was going to indulge in.

"You're still seeing Nat huh?" questioned Audrey, the 'hint' of mum stepping aside for the more upfront version, one which was lost on the redheaded junior.

"Oh yeah, we're still friends" chirped Phoebe with a smile "do you want to come?"

"Maybe another time" murmured Audrey.
Her suspicions of Nat were very much still on the surface but there was no telling Phoebe things like that.
Besides, even with their combined wages, one less meal to pay for wasn't such a bad thing, right?

"OK!" smiled Phoebe "So I can get what I want for lunch?"

Feeling the need to bite her tongue, Audrey painted on a warm smile before responding to her sister.
"Sure thing sweetie, just work out what you want for dinner as well"

"I will" purred Phoebe as she turned tail, great hips swaying side to side with the accompanying cheeks shaking like jelly with each heavy step.

"That girl" murmured Audrey under her breath with a small endearing smile.
All that talk of food had stirred a hunger inside Audrey though and, in one well practiced move, she slid her desk draw open and grabbed one of the many doughnuts stashed away in there.
"Mhm, that is so good" moaned that blonde softly as she took a large bite from the sugar crusted confection, licking her lips to ensure nothing escaped her.
Fortunately for Audrey, it had gone unnoticed that she had her shirt untucked and free of her skirt to reduce the tightness around her stomach. She would have to pick up some more shirts for work soon but, for now, the doughnut was indulging her needs enough.

*****

*Two Days Later*

"Phoebe honey, could you get the door!" shouted Audrey.

"Coming!" shouted the redhead back.

Tonight was another one of the sisters much beloved takeaway and TV nights and they were not messing around tonight.
Both were showered and getting into pyjamas for the night and they had even had the foresight to order food at work earlier that day so they didn't need to wait longer than needed once they were settled.
Audrey was taking her sweet time getting re-dressed though meaning Phoebe had to get the door.

"You are a life saver, we are starving in here" announced Phoebe as she opened the door to the unsuspecting delivery driver stood on the steps of the townhouse, his arms laden with pizza boxes and a couple of bags hanging from his fingers.
Even with all the weight in his arms, the driver still managed to look surprised at the girl answering the door before him.
He had a sneaking suspicion that 'starving' wasn't ENTIRELY true.

As a self declared queen of comfort, Phoebe had donned nothing more than a white stretchy vest top and a pair of sweat pant-style shorts but, in true ditzy Durant twin style, had not taken into account how exposed this left her.
It was impossible to deny that Phoebe had continued to gain weight and came as no surprise, given her size and flirtatious exhibitionism, that she had more skin on show than some would be accustomed to.
A vest top so ill fitting that it couldn't cover her belly button, allowing for a complete roll of belly fat to hang free and heavy over her waistband, along with a valley of cleavage so deep it looked prone to causing suffocation was certainly more than usual for the unsuspecting delivery driver.
Not to mention her dominating hips and ass had expanded so much her shorts looked painted onto her and the seams had begun to split up her thighs.

As the delivery driver struggled for where to put his eyes, the transaction itself went by smoothly and before long the door was closing on him, forgotten almost instantly after.
"Pfft, you think we've got enough food there Phebs?" asked Audrey as she headed down the stairs, now suitably dressed herself.
Although more modest than her sister, Audrey also found her choice of comfort slightly more revealing than she once appreciated.
In truth, Audrey had very little skin on show but the tightness of her long legged pyjamas and the matching tshirt told enough tales on their own of how much the blonde had grown.

As Phoebe became increasingly double bellied, Audrey contrasted by having an uncreased rounded middle which sat heavily on billowy love handles.
'Round' was a rather apt word for Audrey's figure as a whole as her chest had continued to blossom whilst her lower half also bloomed, although more soft in comparison to Pheobe's maintained pertness.

"Maybe, we'll probably need some more before the night is out" mused Phoebe as she waddled into the living room with the boxes she had been given.

"Well we'll see about that" snorted Audrey as she followed behind, scratching the lower crest of her belly which had ever so slightly exposed itself beneath her shirt.

*****

*Three Hours Later*

"We're gonna need more food aren't we?" groaned Audrey as she swallowed the last bite of pizza in her mouth, idly licking her lips clean of sauce and cheese as she did.

"I thought you'd never ask" cheered Phoebe as she lazily reached for her phone "you can get this one though"

"Deal" replied Audrey as she absently rubbed her belly which rumbled softly at the thought of more food.

*****

*Six Days Later*

"Ooph, I can't eat another bite Phebs" groaned Audrey from the other side of the table, nudging her most recently emptied plate towards the middle.

"Right behind you there sis" groaned Phoebe in return as she slumped heavily back and delicately sipped at a glass of wine.

"At least we got value for money out of our 'employee of the month' meal though right?" smirked Audrey with a touch of sarcasm.

Phoebe could only smile.
Her sister had never been so sassy before but it actually suited the blonde well.
The two sisters had also never got along as well as they had been doing over the past few weeks and Audrey was quickly becoming Phoebe's best friend.
Well, along with Nat of course.

"Can I get you ladies anything else?..." asked the waitress tentatively as she weaved to the Durant's table.
This hadn't been the first time she had asked that question tonight and she fully expected to be sent off again with another order.
Needless to say, mind, it had not gone unpredicted that the two women before her would be in for the long haul that night but this actually did look like the end for them both.
As large as they had looked when they arrived they were certainly larger now.

Wearing a skin tight dress as always, Phoebe now sported a food baby that caused her usually creased belly to smooth out considerably, giving her quite the outward bulge as her belly sat proud of her hips in a rather rounded fashion.
Audrey meanwhile, whilst not showing too many outward signs of her stuffed nature, was contending with her overly tight button down shirt again which was stretched so tightly her button holes had spread open to expose the pale skin beneath.
At some point during the meal she had also freed herself from her skirt, allowing her bulbous belly to sit on her lap.

"You know what, I could go for some dessert" chimed Phoebe whilst wiggling in her seat, giving quite the show to their waitress.

"Are you sure Phoebe?" called Audrey from across the table, a slight look of concern tugging at her face.
Phoebe just nodded.

"OK" said the waitress cautiously as she pulled out her notepad "anything in particular?"

"Hmmm, just a bit of everything and we'll take it from there" smiled Phoebe.

"OK then...anything for you miss?" asked the waitress, looking to Audrey.

The blonde knew she didn't want to really but temptation overcame her in the end.

"I'll have the same please" requested the blonde politely, wishing she was in her pyjamas for this bit.

"They will be right out" smiled the waitress automatically before heading to the kitchen, completely astounded at how much these girls had put away that night.

"You are terrible" frowned Audrey with all the effort she could muster, albeit very little.

"What? You didn't HAVE to have any" smirked Phoebe "besides, the desserts here are fantastic!"

*****

*One Hour Later*

"These desserts ARE fantastic!" cheered Audrey as she dropped her fork down for the last time.

"Told ya" purred Phoebe with a wry grin.
1333312411221223442222114121.title: Sisterly bonding continues with gusto

choices: Phoebe’s accidental snapchat garners unexpected popularity
Nat continues to feed her four girls
Grandma Durant comes to visit
It's getting to be a tight squeeze at the townhouse.
13333124112212234422221141212.content:
“Oh please Audrey! Pretty pretty pretty please!”

Audrey was finding it difficult to concentrate.
She and Phoebe had just finished indulging in one of their classic oversized meals when the redhead had received a text that had got her very excited.
Now, whilst all Audrey wanted to do was crawl into bed and belch in peace, Phoebe was begging her to go to lunch with Nat tomorrow.

“I don’t know Phebes...” Audrey weakly protested, her hand covering her mouth to stifle a string of puffy burps.

“Pleeeease! It’ll be fun!” insisted Phoebe, bouncing a little more than a girl in her state of skimpy dress probably should, certainly in front of a sister who was copping an eyeful as she spoke.

Audrey sighed, pushing a moderate burp through her lips, before reaching the inevitable conclusion.
“Ok Phoebe, I’ll come with you just this once”

“Yay!” shrieked the redhead, bouncing around the living room for a moment before dumping herself down on the sofa and swiping her phone up to hammer out a text to Nat.

As nervous as the thought of meeting with Nat made Audrey, it was nice to see Phoebe so happy and, needless to say, the thought of lunch did appeal to the blondes new found gluttony.
As Audrey began to maneuvr herself off her seat, Phoebe suddenly came flying back in, phone held out and next thing Audrey knew was the sound of a phone camera clicking.
Briefly seeing the photo flash up on Phoebe’s screen, Audrey found herself slightly bemused at what she saw.

Phoebe’s appearance was no surprise, she saw that often enough, and usually more than she bargained for with the youngest Durant’s tendency towards ill fitting and displays of skin.
As such, it came as no surprise to have her eyes drawn to Phoebe’s bloated belly escaping her skin tight T-shirt.
Audrey did, however, also notice her own bloated middle escaping her pyjama top and sitting heavily on her thighs.

Lost in her thoughts mulling over her new found girth, Audrey only found herself pulled back as Phoebe’s phone pinged and the twin rattled off the response.

“Nat’s looking forward to it and says you look really good Aud” smiled Phoebe.

Audrey just threw an awkward smile as she found the energy to rise from her seat.
‘Of course Nat thinks I look good...’ thought the blonde as she half waddled out of the living room towards her bed.

*****

“Well if it isn’t my favourite family!” purred Nat as she clapped eyes on Phoebe and Audrey approaching.
