Phoebe simply squealed before taking off at a moderate pace for the ever growing redhead and threw her arms around Nat in a huge hug.
Audrey was far less enthusiastic as she closed in on the pair, awkwardly adjusting her stretchy denim pants as she walked.

‘Thank god +Size makes everything so stretchy’ thought Audrey.

Phoebe had suggested to her older sister that she wear sweatpants but the blonde had opted for more stylish jeans instead, even if they did sit as high waisters and pinched around her motherly hips..
Besides, sweats wouldn’t have gone with the blouse she had picked out and she was desperate to wear that at least as it flowed whisp like around her bulging figure, concealing some of her larger features.

Phoebe was far less conservative though, and with her sweats hiked up to her waist, ever inch of the younger girl was popping out.
The stretched grey material of her leg wear was tight around her legs, displaying her huge calorie soaked bum and thighs as well as drawing attention to her concealed belly hang which made a cute addition to the front of her figure.
Likewise, her vest top looked fit to peel off her as it struggled against her chest and the rest of her expanded belly.
Rounded out with feet clad in flip flops, she was the image of her formally thin self just much rounder and hungrier.

“Anyway, you both look fabulous so shall we get going?” asked Nat, turning slightly to gesture the group moved.

“Ohh yeah, where are we going?” asked Phoebe, eyes swimming with delight as she asked the question.

“Oh, just a little place called Brass Tops” announced Nat as she shimmied off in the direction of the popular buffet restaurant.

“Yes!” cheered Phoebe as she headed after her friend, leaving Audrey to follow up behind.
The blonde bit her lip anxiously, anticipating the direction this would take but was quickly overtaken by the sound of her stomach growling at her.
‘Oh boy...’

*****

“I’m sure you both know the drill here so go crazy girls, my treat” said Nat as she pushed the decorative double doors open, swarming the girls in the rich smell of meats and sticky sauces.
The Durants were lost for words, licking their lips and staring like kids in a sweet shop, or them in a sweet shop that one time.

“Girlies?” cooed Nat as she eyed her guests with a sly smile.

This snapped Phoebe and Audrey back to their senses and, on autopilot, they made for the buffet line grabbing a couple of plates each.
Pouring over the counters, it didn’t take long for the sisters to load their plates with a range of barbecued meats, potatoes, breads and a cast array of sides perfectly matched with their meat choices all whilst Nat followed behind with her hands full of a tray housing the larger girls overspill of food.

All in smooth automated motion, the girls then made their way to a circular booth, sitting down and then immediately diving into their respective feasts.
Audrey’s skepticism fell by the wayside almost immediately as she shoveled the first forkful of meat into her mouth, a delicate uncharacteristic moan escaping her lips as she did.
Phoebe, meanwhile, was far more accustomed to Nat’s hospitality and nothing could have stopped her as she dove into her food with the enthusiasm of a starved woman.

“You got everything you want girls?” asked Nat as she tucked into her own plate of sizeable portion
Both girls just nodded without fully looking up, the hunger having taken over for them both.
“Good” purred Nat as she bit into a large steak burger whilst eying Phoebe and Audrey across the table.

*****

As time trickled by, the plates piled up as the Durants systematically emptied each and every one of every morsel put before them whilst Nat diligently resupplied the hungry women per their requests.

“More chicken Aud?”

“Have you tried the ribs yet Phebes?”

“How about another portion of salt and pepper fries for the table, right?”

“Both finished at once, this might take a while” grinned Nat as she excused herself to get a fresh plate for both girls.

Any semblance of decorum either girl may have had before entering Brass Tops was long gone, buried under a mind boggling torrent of calories.
Audrey discovered the error of her ways in not following Phoebe’s suggestion of sweat pants and, to provide some comfort, had long since unbuttoned her jeans allowing her filling belly to escape onto her lap whilst pulling her blouse tighter to her bulging love handles.
Ever the wise in clothing decisions, Phoebe was actually maintaining her modesty for once even if each item was stretching further and further by the minute to keep her swelling belly under wraps. To compensate the forward growth her vest had crept up to expose her back though, not that the redhead cared and actually enjoyed the slight cooling effect of her exposed skin.
The fullness of her belly had also caused her blossoming boobs to be pushed up, reaching a point of rivalling Audrey’s at this point.

“I hope you’re still hungry you two” called Nat as she returned with another refill for the girls, possibly the largest one yet.
Phoebe and Audrey simultaneously groaned as they looked at their most recent acquisitions but, unable to resist, found themselves reaching out and continuing the binge.

As each girl sweated and slowly soldiered on, Nat just watched, indulging in her own food.
The more observant would notice that, since meeting Phoebe at the mall that day, Nat has also actually filled out some, an appetite like that was infectious after all, but her main prize was watching the Durants pig out.
Having Audrey join the fold was a sweet perk after reeling in Phoebe, Reagan and Uma.

*****

“Ooph, I have never eaten so much in my life...” groaned Phoebe as she kicked her bedroom door shut for the night.
Her and Audrey had really hit the buffet hard and it was showing now.
Waddling slowly, Phoebe unintentionally parked herself in front of her full length mirror before peeling her sweatpants off.
The waistband really was drenched in sweat after all that time eating but the real surprise came when Phoebe caught her reflection in the mirror.

“Woah...” whispered Phoebe as she saw just how distended her belly was, hanging heavy and firm free of her clothes.
Phoebe wasn’t completely stupid, she did know she’d been steadily growing recently but she’d never looked THIS big.

More out of habit than anything, Phoebe grabbed her phone, rolled her vest up completely and snapped a picture of her reflection.
She ogled the photo for a moment before making her way to bed and burrowing herself into her sheets.
As the redhead looked over her most recent picture, her belly sticking out so far in a near perfect sphere in front of her whilst her infamous rear ballooned out behind her...it was oddly interesting to see.

Biting her lip in the dark with nothing other than her phone lighting up her face, Phoebe opened Snapchat and brought the photo up in the app and plastered ‘oops’ over the picture as her eyes began to droop...

*ping*

“Wha...oh no...”
That shouldn’t have happened.
13333124112212234422221141212.title: It’s a lunch date!

choices: The Fathouse Four of Five nearly eat Nat out of business!
Eager to complete her collection, Nat sinks her clutches into Ixchel.
Nat finally talks Audrey into joining them at her club.
Coming from behind, Uma's newfound enthusiasm finally makes her the new favorite
133331241122122344222211412122.content:
At this point, the schedules of the women of 8422 Fordham Ave and club manager Nat were becoming inexorably linked. And with it a shift in the method of the meet-ups as Nat continued to encourage everyone's increased appetites. The new regulars to the club ended up being Reagan and Uma, while Phoebe and Audrey would meet Nat for regular lunches, as Audrey was reluctant to enter the night life scene.

And of course, the enabling feeder was beginning to feel the effects of personally catering to the other ladies caloric intake.

* * * *

"Keep these wings coming!" Reagan belched.

"Geez, Red, how about sharing some of those?" Uma snarked.

The manager's private booth was getting two well worn grooves into it these days, with the expansive pair of Reagan and Uma. Course, with the size of the brash twin's ass she had hips that went on for days, her cheeks and thighs flattening as she sat to give her an extreme squashed pear shape with her oversized club shorts, full belly hanging over her lap, Reagan had by far the biggest groove. Not to be outdone, Uma had a very thickened look, her potbelly nearly out-pushing Reagan's these days in distance where it was second in terms of width. Their tummies were on full display, given lavish attention by the exclusive menu.

"Nat can get us more," Reagan rolled her eyes, munching away. "Won't you Nat?"

"Sure!" Nat smiled, licking the last of her signature spiced-soy glaze from her fingers. These wing baskets had been subject to the baker's dozen effect, as it wasn't like Nat couldn't have some of her own as she brought out fresh food for her favorite patrons. Had to check quality control and all that. Damn, she made good food.

As the plumped, thick legged outset manager made her way back towards the chicken, she could feel the extra wobble in her body. Since joining in with her four latest victims friends she had been putting on the pounds herself. It wasn't an unpleasant sensation, for her, although her wardrobe was more selective these days. Her leopard print skirt and leather belt combo was feeling more pinched around her middle, and sections of her tattoos were more exposed than they had previously been with this outfit.

This introspection was interrupted by the sudden presence of Michael, one of her bartenders. "Hey Boss, got a minute?"

"Sure, *urp* excuse me," Nat coughed. "What's up?"

"Well," Michael really didn't want to be the messenger in this situation. "The kitchen staff is complaining about a backlog of orders that's really slowing things down. We've got customers on the main floor waiting on their apps and plates."

"Brit and Antonio haven't failed me before," Nat scoffed, "I think they can deal with an uptick in business."

Michael scratched his shoulder nervously, well aware of his boss's tendencies. "See, it's more about where most of the orders are coming from. The line is, err, clogged with your private orders."

Nat's expression soured, only to be broken by a sudden outburst back from the private booth.

"Hey! I was going to eat those cheese curds!" Reagan yelled.

"Too slow Reagan," Uma said with her mouth full. "You weren't sharing the wings so it's just desserts."

"Gawd, you're annoying when you get drunk!"

"Can't help it if you slow down," Uma teased. "Can't hold your liquor, Red?"

"Honey, I'm not even full," Reagan kneaded the top fold of her belly rolls. Since charming her way through two feeders on her mission to eclipse Phoebe's rear, Reagan was used to large portions. "I'm not about to slow down! Where's Nat with more food?"

With a cringeworthy smile, Nat looked Michael dead in the eye as she passed off the spent plates. "Well, if the kitchen can't handle the orders maybe you should go back there an help them. You REALLY don't want me to have to come back there."

"Sure thing, boss," Michael groaned, not wanting to argue further.

It's a shame that her best bartender had to fill in back in the kitchen, Nat thought to herself as she rubbed her forehead. She could really do with a stiff mixer right now.

* * * *

"I mean, you're always so nice to us taking us to these new places!" Phoebe squealed, "That we wanted to bring you here! Audrey and I've been to this diner since we were kids!"

"Yeah, it was nice to come back when we moved back to the city," Audrey smiled, pouring extra cream in her coffee. "You okay, Nat?" she asked, concerned.

"Hmph?" Nat replied. "Oh, nothing, just tired. We've been really busy at the club lately."

"I'm sorry to miss it," Phoebe said. "But Aud's got me on a new job and it cuts into how late we can stay up. But we have time for all these lunch breaks, which is also great. They serve breakfast all day so you can order it right along with lunch!"

The spread at their table showed the clashing sections of the menu. The Durant sisters, who knew the menu by heart at this point, had stacks of pancakes next to burgers, a basket of onion rings over an omelet, with extra bacon and sausage gravy finding itself a topping wherever it was or was not fitting. Even Nat had been talked into mixing and matching, as she nursed a breakfast burrito with a hot tuna melt.

Audrey had suggested the dinner so she could justify having more casual wear, still not one to maximize her outfits for maximum consumption like the ravenous Phoebe. "Oh look, they're doing the limited time pancake balls with the confetti batter and sweat cream, we should order those."

"OMG yes!!" Phoebe exclaimed, bouncing up on her massive rump akin to a plate of gelatin on a trampoline. "And the chili-cheese fries. You've gotta try those Nat."

"Eh," Nat shrugged, she still felt a partially digested mass in her stomach. As the Durant sisters continued to place orders and offer to share food with Nat, naturally being the most generous of the housemates, the club manager was regretting the major change to her common strategy. When she was feeding someone she preferred being in control, either with her club or taking dates to a place like a buffet or food court so she could keep loading the food their direction. Audrey and Phoebe were total sweethearts, and while they were still eating an impressive amount, they were so chummy with Nat on slipping the plates that Nat got a bit more food than she bargained for.

"*oof*" Nat groaned as they were getting to settle the bill. "I gotta hand it to you ladies, you know how to pick them." Heck, she was feeling gassy, struggling in her purse to find an antacid.

"And that's not even the best part!" Phoebe said, "We saved the best surprise for last."

Nat blinked. And blinked. "What?"

It took two waitresses to safely carry the largest ice cream sundae dish Nat had ever seen. The sundae crested the edge of the table, pushing aside empty plates like a raiding viking ship, a veritable mountain of a dozen flavors of ice cream, tons of nuts and whipped cream, a bushel of cherries and a bunch of split bananas outlined the fantastic dessert.

"We've always wanted to try this!" Phoebe said, "although we figured it'd be best with three people." And without losing one moment the dizzy redhead stuck her head towards the sundae with her spoon, an increasingly messy eater when ice cream was involved.

"Phoebe, manners!" Audrey chided, trying to reign in her sister.

"Umm," Nat frowned, "You too enjoy, I've had enough sweet."

"Come on, help us, Nat," Audrey said. "If we don't finish it in time it won't be free."

Nat considered her options: finding any further capacity in her stuffed stomach vs more money lost on her disposable cash...

* * * *

"Man, this is a smorgasbord," Reagan said, having hit overeating euphoria at yet another night at the club. "Darryl may have the dough, but he can't provide the atmosphere." Nat's house DJ, Sheryl, had a nothing killer set pumping through the club as the feasting beauties heard it from the private booth.

"Though you can't dance worth shit," Uma said, have let go of her previous reservations as she regained the confidence of her college days. "They'd have to evacuate the dance floor with your wide ass."

"I know right," Reagan said, although having become a glutton she didn't fancy the exertion. "I can't believe you shook your stuff out there."

"Works up quite the appetite," Uma said, picking up on her eating. "How about you, Nat, you work yourself to the bone with this place."

"Yeah," Nat's feet were killing her, standing up so much. Having two sets of feedees and managing her club was more tiring than she had thought. "You know, schooch over there before Michael comes out with the next manager's special. I am the manager after all."

On her break, DJ Sheryl and Michael began gossiping about Nat joining in with her favorite clients.

* * * *

"Isn't it weird how you never seem to get full from Asian food?" Phoebe asked.

Phoebe, Audrey and Nat were crowded around a table at the mall's food court, sitting on far more chairs and possessing far more lunch trays than their number would suggest. Ostensibly, they had original meet for a shopping trip as they again were needing to go up a rack size at +Size, although it had mutated to having lunch first so they would 'know what size to shop from.'

A week of catering to all four new favorites was leaving Nat frazzled. She was dressed far more casually than her typical club attire and business suits, nothing really fitting as she wore sweats and an oversized t-shirt. The constant enabling, and her own consumption was making her feel bloated an exhausted. Even her gourmet tastes had diminished slightly, as she and the Durant sisters ate through the fast food combo numbers like a bizarre game of food court bingo.

Her feeder dominance was beginning to backfire.
133331241122122344222211412122.title: Collective Gains

choices: The twins can't avoid arguing
Audrey's will power caves completely
Nat's increased business opens up more fattening opportunities
For once, everybody loses their inhibitions and parties the night away
The aftermath of Nat's attention leaves the girls larger than before
1333312411221223442222114121223.content:
"Hello?"

"Hey Audrey, it's Nat!" cried the voice from the other side of the phone.

"Oh hey Nat" mumbled Audrey whilst rubbing her eyes so as to see what time it was.
5:57am
"Are you ok? It's kinda early..."

"No time for that hun, I just wanted to apologise for not been able to meet up with you recently, its been PRETTY hectic at the club"

"Don't worry about it, long as you're ok"
Audrey groaned as she lazily swung her legs out of bed, muffling a yawn.

"I am amazing girl, which is actually part of why I'm calling" mused Nat with an air of self pride in her voice.

'Here we go' thought Audrey.
Although she had made an effort to befriend Nat, much to Phoebe's gratitude, the blonde matriarch of 8422 Fordman Avenue was still very much skeptical of the club owner on the other end of her phone.

"Well I'm throwing a bit of a party at the club tonight to mark the success of our expansion into new realms and I would really love it if you could come down" asked Nat.

Phoebe had mentioned something about Nat having to do a massive overhaul at the club, something about opening during the day as a bistro type thing to warrant taking on a larger kitchen staff.
Apparently Nat's food was held in such high regard lately that it was too much strain on the team.
Phoebe said the place was barely any more crowded than usual but Nat was a savvy enough business woman to know how to deal with consumer growth and the like.

"Oh ok...I don't know Nat, it's..."

"Now come on Audrey, I know you and Phoebe don't have work tomorrow so I'm sure your curfew can stand to extend a LITTLE longer tonight just this once" purred Nat, knowing she had Audrey's usual excuse taken off the table.

'Thanks Phoebe' thought Audrey as she chewed her lip, floundering a little still barely awake.

"Tell you what" continued Nat, undeterred by Audrey's silence "we'll call this an open invite, come if you want but it would mean a lot if you could make it, especially seeing as I wouldn't be where I am without you girls"

This caught Audrey off guard and stank suspiciously of a 'Nat Trap' as her and Uma had taken to calling them in college.

"How so?" asked Audrey, unable to engage any more mental faculty to the conversation in her tired state.

"Oh just without you, Phoebe, Reagan and Uma I wouldn't have realised that my passion truly lies in hospitality" cooed Nat with a smile that could be seen down the phone.
"Anyway, I will see you later and don't worry about being fancy or anything like that, we're all friends and we're just going to have a good time, bye!"

*BEEP*

Audrey sighed.
She could smell a rat somewhere, she just didn't know where it was or if it was actually a rat for that matter.
She did know though that, just for a change, she was hungry as her belly growled at her from the confines of a stretchy vest top.
At least she would have time for a decent breakfast before work now.

*****

"I can't believe you've ACTUALLY come to the club Aud, tonight is gonna be so good!" squealed Phoebe as the two girls stood at the bottom of the steps leading into Nat's club.

"Me neither" muttered Audrey as she thought back on how she'd ended up finding herself here.

"Huh?" asked Phoebe, looking up from her phone with a perplexed look.

"I was just saying I can't believe you got the taxi to go to McDonalds on the way here" mused Audrey, diverting the conversation.
Phoebe giggled.
"Well you did always tell me I should line my stomach before drinking and I couldn't get anything to eat before we left because I was getting ready!"

Audrey glanced at her sister with a look of bemusement at that comment.
For a start, it had taken the youngest twin all of five minutes to throw on a pair of sweats and a tortuously overtaxed tshirt likening the wearer's physique to that of Buddha and inviting people to rub her 'lucky belly'.
Secondly, Phoebe's idea of not eating before leaving had included half a box of pop tarts, a sharing back of chips and a sleeve of oreos.
It certainly didn't take a genius to know that none of these points were worth arguing with the young redhead though so instead Audrey made her way towards the club door.

"Hey Aud!" called Phoebe from the foot of the stairs.

"Yeah?" asked Audrey, impatiently turning around

"Your butt looks amazing" cooed Phoebe before waddling up the stairs herself.

As odd as it was to have her sister compliment her rear like that, the comment still made Audrey smile.
It certainly carried more weight since Phoebe's shift in perspective after her accidental Snapchat belly pic.
Despite being initially concerned of the backlash she would receive socially as a result of her weight gain, Phoebe actually received far more positivity from it than anything else and, long story short, had embraced the new attention to the max.
Shifting from a stereotypical flirtatious poser into a much more rounded (literally and metaphorically) lover of food and chub, her audience barely changed and, as it turned out, a lot of guys were still into what she had to offer.

"Thanks Phebes" smiled Audrey, trying not to blush whilst watching her sister climb the stairs, the redhead's own continuously growing assets shaking like jelly with each heavy step.
"You're...welcome" panted Phoebe as she drew level with her sister "Ready?"
Audrey nodded before pushing the door open for her sister, quickly following behind.

*****

The girls were immediately dragged into the bustling party behind the doors with people crammed in like sardines, something that neither Phoebe or Audrey had accounted for.
Nevertheless, the girls forced their way through the crowds, having to stop on multiple occasions as people recognised one girl or the other and wanted to talk or take pictures or rub Phoebe's belly as her tshirt requested.
It was a wild few moments for the Durant sisters as they slowly but surely made their way to the bar in the hopes that they would come across Nat at some point on their travels but to no avail.

"You seen Nat?" shouted Phoebe to one guest over the sound of Cheryl's DJ set

"Nat?" asked the girl in question, looking puzzled as she slowly sipped from her drink through a straw "nope, don't know any Nat's"

"Well she was helpful" grumbled Phoebe before turning back to Audrey who put a drink in her hand.

"What's this for?" asked Phoebe, taking a sip before the answer could come her way.

"We never really got chance to celebrate your new job so seems like as good a chance as any" smiled Audrey softly, taking a sip from her own drink

"Aww thanks Aud!" cheered Phoebe, throwing her arms around her sister causing their bellies to rub together within their respective clothes.

"I'm just glad you're happy replied Audrey as she gently squeezed her sister back, opting to gloss over just how big the two girls felt in that moment even if she did admit that Phoebe felt quite a bit larger than herself.

"Are you Audrey Durant?" called a voice from behind.

"Yes?" replied Audrey, turning to where the voice had come from.
It was Michael the bartender.

"Boss woman said to send you through the back once you got here" added the server before wandering to the end of the bar and placing a hand on the door next to it.

"Oh...erm...thanks" said Audrey as she nudged Phoebe along towards the door.

*****

"Well it's about time you made it!" called out Nat as she heaved herself from her seat to greet the two sisters at the door "there will be nothing left by the time these two are finished."

"Thanks for inviting us" cooed Phoebe, throwing herself in for a hug which was caught immediately.

"Oh not at all, come on, come on" ushered Nat as she wandered back to the booth with the sisters in tow "you must be starving the pair of you"

"Yeah!" cried Phoebe with her belly rumbling almost on cue.

"Well there's plenty to be had" purred Nat "but first...look who's here"

As Audrey and Phoebe came round the booth they both took a double take as they looked at Uma and Reagan for the first time in an apparently long time.

Uma was a mere shadow of her former athletic self at this point, although the amount of attention that Nat slathered her with did wonders for helping her get over that, even if her choice of a overstretched sports bra and leggings might indicate some denial.
Sporting a near spherical gut ballooning out from her padded hips, Uma was unquestionably belly dominant in contrast to the Durants as well as having a thick pair of thighs and a chin swaddled face.
Each hungry grab also gave away the development of fattened underarms which wobbled cavernous cleavage with each gentle nudge.

Next to Uma sat Reagan who appeared to have completely doubled down on staying ahead of Phoebe.
Dressed typically Reagan-esque in gym shorts, fish nets and a sleeveless vest, the older twin was frankly huge.
In keeping with her genetics, her ass took up more of the booth than Uma by a considerable margin and was stretching her shorts so tight that rips had formed around her thighs.
Her fish nets served more to cause inch after inch of fat to squeeze out between the webbing around her voluminous thighs and the lowest roll of her belly they had been stretched over which lay exposed in her lap.
The shortness of her vest betrayed her growing chest as the normally flowy material clung against her muffin top and side rolls, further displaying her descent into unadulterated gluttony at the cost of her waist line which now divided her middle into two heavy pale rolls.

"Can I get you girls anything then?" asked Nat innocently as she shifted her own weight to give the newcomers room to sit.
1333312411221223442222114121223.title: Full House

choices: Everyone ate so much they struggle to get out of the booth!
With Audrey back in the flock, her relationship with Nat takes a different turn.
Phoebe's friendly personality outshines Reagan's ASS-et in terms of popularity.
A night of heavy drinking comes with a hefty set of hangovers for all.
The housemates, and especially Ixchel, find new struggles with increased sizes.
13333124112212234422221141212232.content:
"Er, hello," Audrey said, beginning to realize to what extent everyone's night plans had been over the past few months. Nat had gone all out on refurbishing her club and kitchen, and the manager's special booth had been widened considerably.

"Hey Phebs," Uma said, rousing herself from some wings as she caught sight of the twin's shirt. "Here, let me rub your belly for luck."

Phoebe shifted her weight to sit next to Uma, who wiped her hands off with some napkins and proceeded to give the twin a full belly rub.

Phoebe giggled, "Aw, thanks!" Reagan scoffed from her end of the booth.

"How about it Aud?" Nat offered the seat, which conveniently meant Audrey would be hemmed in by her youngest sister and former college bestie.

"Thanks," Audrey said, nerves still frayed from going outside her comfort zone. But the smell of the appetizers Reagan and Uma were having were fantastic.

"You're looking good, Aud," Nat said as she squeezed into next to the oldest Durant sister.

"Thanks, um, you too?" Audrey said, feeling flustered. Nat certainly looked healthy. And bigger than Audrey had remembered. Her overripe plumped form was looking much larger, more evenly portioned all over compared to the standout features of Uma and the twins.

"Business is booming," Nat said, "and the girls have been helping me develop a fantastic menu, so I wanted to you taste the end results."

Helping was a generous definition of the efforts of the club regulars, as the generous extra padding on each of their frames was a testament to their enabled gluttony. Audrey had expected a different experience having passed the dancing attendees and drinks flowing from the bar but she remembered how Nat had been experimental with foods in college.

"A new twist on a classic," Nat explained as a new dish was pushed in from of Audrey. "Spicy Spinach-Artichoke Dip with extra parmesan and house made pita."

"Wow," Audrey said, too prim to use her hands and portioning out a bite with her spoon. She took a taste.

And another.

And another.

At this point it was obvious that Audrey would be the sole eater of this appetizer, as old memories began to stir in Audrey's mind with the tastes playing off of her taste buds. She had missed Natalie's fantastic cooking. When she was on their floor when she and Uma were roommates, there was always something Nat had offered to eat. Hell, after the first Freshman Fifteen Audrey had gotten an extra set from Nat's involvement.

And her previous concerns about that previous relationship were rendered dormant as Audrey began to eat all that was offered at the table. When Nat asked if she needed a refill of a drink, or Phoebe had her try some dumplings, to Uma offering to split dessert, Audrey ate, and ate. And ATE!

She was eating like a woman possessed, like a woman making up for lost time over all the previous meals her other roommates had consumed from Nat's influence. Sure, she had been keeping heavy portions at home or around the diner thanks to Phoebe's increased appetite, but this was decidedly different as the manager's table enjoyed course after course.

"*Urk*" Reagan winced, kneading the sides of her broad stomach. "I need to catch my breath." Her double feeder jumpstarted appetite, from her aim to surpass Phoebe as having the biggest Durant twin rear, had lead to her practically shoveling food into her mouth at every meal. She ate so large of quantities that she was beginning to have stomach pains from indigestion. It was like her stomach was a back up traffic jam on the freeway during rush hour, as the pain to Reagan's overfed appetite was getting sharp whenever she hit her limit, and she and Uma had already consumed several rounds as the first ones to the club. She was beginning to feel how tight her shorts were getting and could silently feel those rips increasing.

Like Reagan, Uma had already had an impressive amount to eat, and her swollen stomach was getting gassy from the food and beverage she had consumed. She gave out a low whistle after a mighty belch, now giving her own stomach rubs. Her dark skin was covered with even darker stretch marks, as she had given up on trying to diminish their appearance with medicative cream. "Excellent menu, Nat, I'm about ready to throw in the towel. Gotta let this settle before we hit the floor."

"Oh yeah, I still want to get out there!" Phoebe added, lavishing in the attention she was getting from people with the change in her style of profile pics. The air headed redhead might have bitten off more than she could chew with the pre-clubbing run to McDonalds. While her appetite could rival Reagan's, she had been downing plenty of drinks after the first Audrey had gotten for her as congratulations, and the inebriations were making her eager to head out to the dance floor much like Uma, as their only collective exercise these days.

While each of the women ate at their own pace, plenty of eyes were looking Audrey's direction, where any previous shred of willpower had been lost to the fathoms of her newfound hunger. From fried mozzarella to wings, pizza flatbreads to meatballs, the dips and award winning brownies, Audrey had a chance to eat everything on the menu. For how restrained she could be around the townhouse, this was surprising to many of her family and friends present.

"Uh, Aud, don't you think it's time to slow down?" Uma asked, concerned.

Audrey raised her head, glasses slightly askew and mouth stained with various foodstuffs. "Oh this is excellent! You girls have been having it so lucky! What do you call this again, Nat?"

"A Plum and Rum Parfait," Nat said, all smiles.

"Ooo, yummy!" Audrey laughed, her belly quaking in the tight confines of the jeans jacket and skirt combo she had selected for clubbing. "And a, what you say, chaser of another rum drink!"

"Coming right up," Nat said, flagging down her bartender.

"Since when has Audrey ever had this much to drink?" Reagan asked Uma, as neither of the two could find an answer.
13333124112212234422221141212232.title: Off The Cuff

choices: Phoebe and Reagan make up for lost time and eat...A LOT
Hung over Audrey stayed the night with Nat
Phoebe's modelling career gets an unexpected resurrection
133331241122122344222211412122324.content:
*BEEP-BEEP BEEP-BEEP BEEP-BEEP*

"Urgh be quiet!" grunted Phoebe as she blindly slapped her phone into silence.
It had been a long, albeit enjoyable, night but now the redhead was suffering for it.
Still wearing her clothes and makeup from the night before, and with her vision blurred by the tangled mass of hair flopped across her face lazily, Phoebe felt tender at best and down right sore at worst.
The thundering headache wasn't helping and certainly hadn't been helped by the sudden alarm waking her up.

Slowly becoming more aware of her surroundings as she came to, Phoebe was aware that she was laid out on a leather couch she didn't recognise but, much to her comfort, was wrapped in a blanket to maintain any dignity she may have left.
Dignity was an interesting topic at that point as, without even looking, she could feel the bulbous flesh of her ass sticking to the leather under the covers suggesting that she was without legwear.
Phoebe could also feel her bulging belly flopped out against the leather as well but that wasn't so different from usual.

With a great heave, the youngest Durant sat herself up and grabbed her phone to assess the damage, utilising the camera on her phone.
Phoebe did have to admit though that things had definitely looked worse after a night out as bad as she felt at that moment, but not so bad that she couldn't oblige her early morning social medias.
Shuffling herself around on the sofa, and with a little bit of creative hair tussling, Phoebe presented herself to her phone for the photo; customary peace sign and belly exposed as had become her regular pose.

'#BuddhaQueenHanging *sick emoji*'

Phoebe had to smile as she hit send on the photo.
It had been a rocky journey with her weight but she actually felt happy about it now, not to mention she was rather smitten with how soft and squishy her tummy was.
As she gently massaged her belly, the soft ringing of received messages called from her phone.

'That's your hangover face?! :o well jell!'

'BQueen wnna come 4 brkfst?'

'Lucky Buddha belly rubs DEFFO work '

'Bacon for hangovers all day long!'

'Mhmmm, bacon' thought Phoebe with a hint of drool as her nostrils flared instinctively.
"Wait a second..." muttered Phoebe, nursing her head slightly as she rose from the couch, sniffing the air "bacon..."
Following her nose, Phoebe awkwardly waddled through this unfamiliar house in nothing but her pants and last night's tshirt.
Ever the expert hunter when it came to food, it didn't take long for Phoebe to find the source of the smell and she swore she could feel her hangover start to cure itself.

"Hey there sleepy head, you must be Phoebe I'm guessing" announced Darryl as he caught a glimpse of Phoebe appear in the doorway to the kitchen.

"Erm, yeah thats me" fumbled Phoebe, very much confused as to who this guy was who knew her and was making her hungry "and you are?..."

"Oh yes, we haven't met before, I'm Darryl" smiled Darryl as he began to dish out bacon from a large frying pan "I'm a friend of Reagan's, I assumed she told you where she was bringing you guys after the party"

"Erm, nope..." replied a bemused Phoebe who wanted nothing more than to eat a lot of bacon as she teetered heavily on her toes in the doorway "Where are we?"

Darryl laughed, realising just how ditzy Phoebe was.
"You're in my house, Reagan had your taxi sent here"

"Ohhhh...ok?"
Phoebe was still confused and getting hungrier by the second.

"Tell you what, how about I get you something to eat and we can talk later, ok?" suggested Darryl, pulling up a second plate and dumping bacon by the spatula-full onto it.
Phoebe simply nodded as she staggered into the kitchen belly first and found a stool to perch on where her plate was placed just as she sat.
About to tuck in, Phoebe suddenly became aware of another person in the kitchen with her and Darryl.
"Ohmygod, Reagan? Why didn't you say something?"

"Shhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh" hissed Reagan from within her hair, shoveling bacon into her own mouth at a great rate of knots "too loud"

"Hung over too huh?" asked Phoebe as she tucked into her bacon, noticing the appearance of sausage, fried bread and eggs on her plate as well.

Reagan could only nod as she continued to eat.
"She's not much of a conversationalist at the best of times" teased Darryl as he slid a fresh helping of breakfast foods towards Reagan.
Phoebe giggled under her breath, trying to avoid shaking her head too much as she did.

*****

As breakfast trundled on for Phoebe and Reagan, the twins chatted a little between themselves and with Darryl.
It came out at one point that Darryl had been helping Reagan fill her face to her heart's content and the twins actually managed to air their grievances about Reagan's one-sided rivalry.
It was a sweet moment for the alienated twins as they gorged their hangovers, so much so that their bellies were aching nearly as much as their head's by the time they were finished.

"Well, I hope Uma wasn't planning on having any breakfast" chuckled Darryl as he cleaned away the remnants of the girls breakfasts.

"Pfft, her loss" sneered Reagan with a ripping belch and full belly.

Phoebe snorted as she rubbed her own bloated belly, licking her greasy lips as clean as she could manage whilst balancing her phone in her spare hand to capture her post-breakfast appearance for her fans.

"Can I get you girls anything else then?" asked Darryl, wiping the counter down like an industrious bar manager.

"Think I need a break for now" grunted Reagan with another belch as she dropped to her feet for the first time in a few hours.
As she landed her whole body wobbled, and it was quite the sight.
Definitely still the larger twin, and biggest town house resident for that matter, Reagan was all bottom heavy girth which was on full display given she had also discarded her bottomwear like Phoebe.
As queen of the booth at Nat's club, Reagan looked like she challenged Darryl's bar stools adequately with angry red marks adorning her thighs where her weight had pressed against the hard perch.
Indicative of her binging, Reagan's belly bulged out ahead of her hips in a round mass that hung heavily over her pants and gifted her with a fattened muffin top above her hips.
Although no Audrey, Reagan's chest had certainly soaked up plenty of calories in its time and was stretching her top much more than it would previously have had done, much to the redhead's pleasure.

Phoebe was just a slightly smaller clone of her twin in most dimensions, her only real size difference manifesting in the form of her double rolled belly forming a thick crease around her belly button in contrast to her sister's single formed stomach, even when not stuffed to the gills.

"Well let me know when you're hungry again and I'll get you both sorted" smiled Darryl as he finished his cleaning.

The twins waddled their way into the living room where Phoebe had been sleeping, catching a glimpse of Uma's head nestled in between a huddle of blankets on their way, before settling down on a sofa large enough to house both of their sizable arses comfortably.

"I'm glad we're talking again Reagan, I've missed you" smiled Phoebe.

"Argh leave it out Pheebs, you're obviously still drunk" smirked Reagan as she reached for the TV remote.

"I mean it Reagan, I hated that we fell out" replied Phoebe before curling up as best as her bloated figure would allow to watch the telly.
Reagan glanced at her twin before giving a subtle nod of acknowledgment to what had been said.
She had missed Phoebe if she was honest, she just didn't need her reputation damaging by being soft.
Besides, she could be friends with Phoebe again now that she was the undisputed queen of arses in the Durant family.

"...Audrey..." grunted Uma from her nest, a torrent of groans punctuating the announcement.

"She's not here Umz!" shouted Reagan, happy to be loud now that her hangover had been soaked up.

"Wha...What? Stop shouting Reagan, where's Audrey at?" asked a confused Uma.

Reagan shrugged.
"I dunno, thought she'd got in the taxi but I was pretty wasted" shrugged Reagan, idly flicking through channels "she'll turn up, she's a big girl"

"I guess" grunted Uma again, barely risen from her blanket fortress "hey, erm, can you guys smell bacon?"

Phoebe looked at Reagan unsure of what to say whilst the eldest twin threw a wink at her junior
"I dunno Umz, I can't smell anything"

"Oh no, me neither" chirped up Phoebe, stifling her laughter as she said it.

"Damn, could really do with some bacon" groaned Uma before collapsing back into her blanket cocoon.
133331241122122344222211412122324.title: The Morning After

choices: The twins are only just getting started
Reagan's jealousy begins to flare up again at Phoebe's popularity
An unexpected third joins the twins
1333312411221223442222114121223241.content:
"So what exactly is the plan today Reagan?" asked Phoebe quizzically as she waddled alongside her sister.

"Well, seeing as we have had that little problem between us" replied Reagan, momentarily becoming aware of how much her enormous rear bounced with each step as she spoke "I thought it would be a good idea for us to catch up on some sisterly bonding time without the others"

"Makes sense I guess" muttered Phoebe, still confused.

"Besides" huffed Reagan, her breath disappearing as she tried to walk and talk at the same time "I woke up absolutely starving and am in need of some serious foodage"

Phoebe didn't have to verbally answer that one as her own stomach betrayed her hunger, growling viciously within the tight confines of her t-shirt.
"Are we nearly there yet anyway? We've been walking for miles!"

In truth, the twins had only been walking a few blocks, something even their former thin selves could have comfortably managed, but the days of walking without complaint were behind the girls now.

Whilst Reagan still dominated her twin in size, and the rest of her housemates for that matter, she was becoming lazier by the day.
Casing point; last time she had lured a guy back to the house for an evening of amorous intent, something she didn't struggle with despite her increase in size, she had insisted that he did all the work whilst she mindlessly pigged out on ice cream for both of their pleasures.

The irony of wearing sweatpants was completely lost on the eldest twin too as she pulled them clumsily over her love handles, causing her belly to bulge slightly from the mild increase of pressure around her waist, not helped in the slightest by how stretched the grey material was around her arse.
Her ensemble for the day was capped with a strappy vest top tucked into her sweats and a checked shirt with rolled-up sleeves left open at the front, partly for style but mostly out of necessity as the garment was long past buttoning.

Phoebe, although just as ironically dressed in struggling sweats and a quirky t-shirt, certainly gave off more energy than her sister but, in reality, was no more suited for the morning walk than Reagan was.
"If I'd have known we would be walking so much..." panted Phoebe with her hands on her sides "I wouldn't have eaten so much last night!"

Reagan snorted, even if the thought had crossed her mind not moments before.
"Oh honey, sweetie, baby Phoebe, we both know that..."

"Oh my god, what is that smell?" interrupted Phoebe, a sudden surge of enthusiasm filling her voice.

"That sis, would be our destination" purred Reagan, her own mood lifting with the end in sight.

*****

"What is this place Reagan?" asked Phoebe as she heavily plopped herself into the booth that the two girls had been guided to.

"This is the most amazing breakfast place in walking distance of the house Pheebs" gloated Reagan as she sat opposite her sister.

"Obviously" replied Phoebe, her mind obviously elsewhere as she idly licked her gloss coated lips.

"It's pretty great here, Darryl showed it to me ages ago" smiled Reagan, indulging herself in some fond memories as she explained herself "and, if you haven't read the signs yet, it's an all you can eat breakfast buffet"

"Wait, what?" asked Phoebe, double taking with a hefty bodily jiggle.

"Oh yes, fill your boots Pheebs, we're in for the long haul!" grinned Reagan, rising from her seat again and heading straight for the buffet.

"Hey, wait for me!" shouted Phoebe as she hauled her own arse out of her seat.

Bacon
Sausage
Eggs
French Toast
Breakfast burritos
Hash browns
Oatmeal
Pastries
Muffins

Anything the twins could have dreamed of having for breakfast that morning was available to them and, despite Phoebe's panic of being left behind, they had it in ample quantity.
With a high piled plate in each hand, the girls waddled back to their booth with hungry gleeful looks adorning their faces.

"This all looks so good!" cooed Phoebe as she eyed up what she had got herself.

"Uh huh" grunted Reagan who had already taken it upon herself to dive into the first of her plates.

"Oh ok" giggled Phoebe as she realised the time for talking had now passed, before turning on her own food with gusto.

"Oh my god" groaned the junior twin with a hint of arousal as she took her first monstrous bite of breakfast meats sandwiched between pancakes and waffles "this is so good"

"Try the syrup" suggested Reagan between mouthfuls whilst pointing at the large pitcher in the middle of the table with her fork.

"Ohh yes please" purred Phoebe, setting her cutlery down and grabbing the jug.
With an almost delicate hint of decorum, Phoebe extended a single finger into the pitcher to dab at the sweet liquid within and, as delicately as she had dipped her finger, licked the substance from said digit.

"Mhmmmm" groaned Phoebe again as she swiped the receptacle up and poured a great waterfall of syrup over her loaded plate, taking a moment to wipe a run onto her finger and sucking it clean.
Before she removed her finger from her mouth though, Phoebe took her phone out and, with some mild alterations to her pose, snapped a rather flirtatious photo full of curves and sexuality.

"Ohh Reagan! Photo time!" cheered Phoebe, momentarily forgetting her breakfast with the overwhelming urge to take selfies taking over.

"Urgh fine" grunted Reagan as she swallowed a dense mouthful before tossing her hair back and fish hooking an eyebrow in as alluring a manner as she knew how.

"There we go" cheered Phoebe as the twins sat back in their seats after leaning into the table in order to both get into the shot "and send!"

"Right, can we eat now?" asked Reagan impatiently, already picking up her cutlery in preparation.

"Hell yeah!" beamed Phoebe, instigating an impressive moment of synchronised feasting.

As the girls attacked their respective loads, Phoebe's phone silently vibrated in her sweats pocket indicating a flood of notifications from her various social media outlets.
Had she not been otherwise preoccupied, the redhead may have taken the time to see just how many complimentary remarks that she and Reagan were receiving for their latest shared selfie, and may have also noticed that a sizeable portion of which were aimed at the girls sizes...

*****
As the morning slowly trucked by, so did the girls through copious amounts of breakfast foods.

Two plates became four.
Four plates became five with baskets of muffins.
The long syrup pitcher for the table was soon joined by a second and third as the girls drenched their plates in the stuff.
Sooner or later though, things began to slow down before finally after scrapping together the last forkfuls of food...

"BUUUURP...urp...pard-urrrp..." belched Reagan with a smirk.

"Reagan!" accused Phoebe whilst trying not to laugh, far from innocent as she silenced her own burps into a clenched fist.

"I'm just making room" goaded Reagan as she rubbed her belly, burping again in the process.

"Well the Social-verse would definitely like that" mused Phoebe, phone in hand.

"Wah?" asked Reagan lazily.

"People are all over the fact that we've gained weight lately, y'know?" explained Phoebe as she scrolled through comments on the picture she had posted before the feasting began.

"So they should be!" announced Reagan "we are pretty damn sexy these days Pheebs"

"I thought we always were sexy?" asked Phoebe, confused as her twins statement

"Oh we were, but this is like a modern day body positive kind of sexy" purred Reagan "not to mention guys are all like closet fat lovers"

"Really?" asked Phoebe, not convinced even with the internet supporting Reagan's statement.
Seemed a lot of girls were closet fat lovers as well...

"Absolutely" smirked Reagan, gently slapping the broad bulging side of her belly "take another picture and you'll see"

Phoebe was almost reluctant but her inner social bee couldn't resist a photo opportunity so, with the help of a passing waitress the girls did a follow up photo for Phoebe's socials.
It didn't take long for the notifications to come flooding in.

"See sis? The internet loves a couple of bombshells piling it away, especially when they're as enhanced as we are"

Phoebe could feel her cheeks go a little warm at Reagan's comments but it did seem that she was talking sense.

"So, now that we have breakfast out of the way, you ready for the next part of our day?" asked Reagan

"This wasn't it?" asked Phoebe, brow furrowing under the thought process.

"Oh no, not when you have such a doting audience" teased Reagan "besides, I'm totally hungry again nearly"

Phoebe did start to protest but, as per usual, her stomach did all the talking for her.

"That'a girl" teased Reagan again before planting her hands on the booth table "now lets get out of here before we get tempted by breakfast again"
1333312411221223442222114121223241.title: Breakfast at Twin-any's

choices: A certain matriarchal sister is less than impressed with the twins conduct
Internet popularity sparks some serious weight gain for the twins
As their waistlines expand, embarrassment befalls the twins
13333124112212234422221141212232411.content:
"I can't believe how crazy people are going over that photo Reagan, I didn't get this much attention before" remarked Phoebe, still mystified at just how deeply the cult of personality she had following her on the internet ran.

"You better believe it Pheebs coz it's happening" responded Reagan, consciously aware that Phoebe's phone was going crazy in her twins pocket even though she couldn't hear it.

"It's just so weird" mused Phoebe to herself as she blindly followed Reagan into Brass Tops, their favourite all-you-can-eat buffet.

"Well I hope your breakfast has settled because round two is about to begin" purred Reagan, inhaling the intoxicating smells of juicy meats whilst openly salivating.

"I think so" pondered the youngest twin as she autopiloted herself into a seat, still staring at her phone at the torrent of adoration in comment form.

"Then lets give these people something to talk about" encouraged Reagan as she hooked onto Phoebe's elbow and dragged her to the establishment's characteristic brass topped counters.

*****

It didn't take the girls long to expertly pick their way through the restaurants many offerings, loading plates artfully with the most delicious things they could get their hands on.
As they negotiated the buffet, both girls were getting an array of looks from other customers which were returned either in kind or ignored on the grounds of rudeness.
Either which way, the twins were soaking up any attention they could get, just like their skinny former selves did in any bar or street.
They were also soaking up calories like they were going out of fashion.

"Umph, this steak is so good!" groaned Reagan as she carved great chunks from the plate sized hunk of beef before her, alternating get shovels of mashed potatos as the combinations all melted in her mouth with minimal effort.

"You have GOT to try the burgers Reagan" moaned Phoebe as grease dripped down her chin after each monstrous bite.

"Already been there" retorted Reagan through a mouthful of meat as she reached the bottom of her plate "refill!"

Phoebe wasn't far behind her twin as she sauntered back to the buffet counter to reload her plate once again.
Both twins were on their third plates now, which after the breakfast they had shared was quite an impressive feat, but neither girl felt full yet.
Whether it was the thrill of the online attention they were feeding or just a deeply ingrained habit after weeks of eating to their hearts content, Reagan nor Phoebe could tell.

"Ooph, my pants are getting tight Reagan" groaned Phoebe, stretching her waistband as much as she could so as to squeeze her hands down in order to massage her belly.

"Me t...ooph...too" puffed Reagan with a half arsed belch "and let me tell you, doesn't matter how many bus boys get nosebleeds from looking at you, management don't like it when you start exposing things"

"How do you..." started Phoebe, bemused as her head span trying to imagine that scenario.

"Doesn't matter" cut off Reagan "we just need a solution"

"I don't know" complained Phoebe as she stubbornly stabbed at her plate of food, not willing to leave any behind.

Reagan also persisted with her plate, even though she was flagging more than Phoebe at this point.
As a particularly large burp surfaced on her lips though, the solution came to her.

"I've got it!" Reagan shouted to her twin before fishing her phone from her cleavage and started hammering away at it.

*****

"Well it is nice to see you two getting along so well again" mused Darryl as he set the car in motion again, leaving Brass Tops to shrink away in his rear view mirror.

"Uh huh" grunted Reagan as she untucked her vest top and rolled her sweatpants down over her belly, allowing the expanding mass to bulge forward into her lap "sure you don't mean that it's nice to see THIS?"

"That too" nodded Darryl, unable to hide his smile.

"Thanks for picking us up Darryl, you're the best!" chirped Phoebe from the backseat, her own burgeoning belly hanging from her hips as she lent forward to thank their saviour.

"Don't mention it" smiled Darryl, innocently enough "so you girls nearly ended up infringing Brass Tops pressure 'no nudity of any sort no matter how many bus boys you give nosebleeds' rule huh?"

"What is this bus boy nosebleed thing?" asked Phoebe, curiosity spiking at the repetition of the story.

"Never you mind" barked Reagan at her junior who stifled a giggle.
"And yes" she admitted to Darryl who had to bite back a smirk.

"Ah Reagan, what have I told you about dressing accordingly?" teased Darryl

"Well we did come from that breakfast place which we hit hard I might add" sassed Reagan as she playfully fondled her belly.

"Oh I can see that" mused Darryl

"And we didn't get to finish at Brass Tops either coz Reagan's vest top started to split" moaned Phoebe, hunger flooding her senses now that her belly was free to the world.

"I can see that too" mused Darryl again, sidewards glancing at the small hole that had appeared above Reagan's hip giving a tiny window into the skin-toned bounty beneath.

"Leave it pervert" snapped Reagan, although with far less venom than she would have once intended "so this does mean you are going to have to feed us"

"I did expect as much, I can hear your hunger in your voice these days" replied Darryl with all the suave attitude of a crack-pot detective.

"We'll see about that" muttered Reagan as she continued to massage her exposed belly.

*****

"Oh my god Darryl, you are amazing!" cried Phoebe as she wandered into one of the many living rooms in Darryl's house.

"You're welcome" replied Darryl, all too calmly as he watched the two redheads minds explode before him.

"You're a smart arse and I love you a little bit right now" muttered Reagan, eyes transfixed on the takeout feast before them.

"I know you do Red, now eat up" teased Darryl as he sauntered past the girls with a smirk on his face.

"Oi, come back here you" shouted Reagan, lacing an arm around her sister and grabbing Phoebe's phone from her pocket as she did.
Darryl froze on the spot, slightly concerned he was actually in for it at this point.
"We need a picture of us and all this" Reagan followed up as she handed Phoebe's phone to Darryl.

With an open release of breath, Darryl took the phone and snapped the photo of the two girls, linked in a semi embrace at the hip with their exposed bellies pressed gently together.

"Thanks babes" teased Reagan with an almost curtsy and sickly sweet voice before dropping herself by the side of the table and tearing open a pizza box like a depraved animal.
Not far behind, Phoebe dove down next to her sister and grabbed two helpings of kebab meat and a bucket of fried chicken.

*****

"Urgh, Reagan, how are you still eating?" groaned Phoebe from her reclined position on the sofa, her breathing shallow as she contended with the heavy mass in her belly from a day full of mindless and near constant gorging.

"I'm not" grunted Reagan "there's just so many wrappers around its impossible to move without disturbing something"

"Ooph, good because the thought of you eating is making me feel sick, I'm THAT full right now" complained Phoebe again as she cradled her belly delicately, trying to limit her grease flavoured burps.

"Lightwei..." started Reagan before covering her mouth as her cheeks bulged out as far as they could "BUUUURP!"

"Better?" grunted Phoebe, glancing at her sister who was sat on the floor with her legs spread, allowing her own belly to settle between her thickened thighs.

"Erm...not really" replied Reagan with a laugh brewing as she spoke.

"What's so funny?" asked Phoebe, awkwardly rolling herself over and finding comfort in having her belly rest on the sofa cushions beside her.

"It's just...I've NEVER eaten this much before" smirked Reagan before laughing fully this time.

Phoebe took a moment to think on her own diet as of late before responding.
"Yeah, me neither" laughed the youngest twin, a string of burps escaping with each note of laughter.

"Give us your phone Pheebs, gotta do that" announced Reagan, reaching her arm out "don't want to waste the effort after all"

Phoebe continued to laugh as she passed her phone over to her twin.
"I've actually had fun today with you Reagan" admitted the younger twin.

"You know what sis" responded Reagan as she held the phone up in preparation "me too"
13333124112212234422221141212232411.title: We're gonna need a bigger booth!

choices: Extracting the twins proves to puzzle the other townhouse residents.
The embarrassment doesn't end there, with issues at college and work.
After that incident, the twins face further challenges at their size.
The numbers come in with just how much Phoebe and Reagan weigh now.
Come to think of it, what had happened with Audrey at Nat's place?
133331241122122344222211412122324113.content:
"You sure you girls didn't want to spend the night again?" Darryl asked from the driver's seat, watching the two bulbous Durant twins fill up the back seat of his BMW.

"Can't, all my shits here," Reagan said, getting a bit droopy eyed now that the full enormity of what she had eaten with Phoebe settled in her stomach. The past 36 hours, from a big night at Nat's club, a breakfast of bacon and cleaning out two buffets over the course of the day had really packed a wallop. Not only were Reagan and Phoebe's butts mashed together in the car seats, they stomaches formed a point of contention in a non-historical take of the 'Battle of the Bulge.'

"Yeah, it's been fun meeting you!" Phoebe said, vivacious as ever but also cradling her great gut. "But we've got classes tomorrow. And I work with Aud now so I need my things too."

"Suit yourselves," Darryl shrugged. His car was no stranger to carrying the weighty hookups he had made as something of a feeder sugar daddy, although it was currently ill suited for the twin sisters. If anything Darryl had never gotten to get a pair of twins to indulge appetites for, Phoebe's unexpected arrival and makeup with Reagan granting the feeder with a fantasy playing out in real life.

As the twins almost had to be rolled into his car when Darryl rescued them from the buffet, the topping off they had done at his house to add to their already massive binge made extracting them from the car more difficult. Reagan, a patron saint of gluttony at this point, had an overfed belly struggling to digest the mass she had consumed over the last day and a half, with Phoebe as her slightly smaller 'shadow' eating along with her throughout the day. The twins' stomachs were so bloated by this point that, unbelievably, one might say their bellies were as wide was their hips at this point.

Their potential indecency at Brass Tops had been delayed to this point. From a distance, Phoebe and Reagan's exposed middles could be mistaken for a strange flesh colored truck tire worn about each waist. Their clothes were fraying out at this point, Reagan's ruined vest and fragmenting sweatpants leaving plenty of flesh to be seen around her waist, overhang, hips and rear. Phoebe's clothes were somewhat less damaged, the hem of her shirt cracked with small tears, but the space between her shrinking t-shirt and sweats left little to the imagination.

The suspension of Darryl's car creaked with relief once the two mammoth beauties had managed to extract themselves from the BMW.

To call Pheobe and Reagan a pair of fatasses was the absolute truth. Once they got moving, the flab located in their backsides stuck out as huge, quivering butt cheeks that swayed and waddled with every breath and movement. Each squashed lobe was a sponge of titanic caloric absorption, and it wouldn't be long before the aftermath of this weekend long binge would be adding further padding to the extra plush tushes.

Darryl bit his lip as he controlled his libido driven thoughts, pleased as what his part had been in helping enable this transformation in the Durant twins and planning a way to encourage them to let him pull out his measuring tape. But for now he remained as gentlemanly as ever as the deep pocketed fat admiring playboy he was, finding each of the girls on either side of him as he helped them to the front door.

"Thanks for parking out front," Phoebe said, "most folks usually park down at the garage, which adds another flight."

"Mhmm," Reagan added, getting quite lethargic at this point, needing a rest after demolishing her personal best in food consumption and needing to rest to alleviate pressure, before she inevitably got hungry again.

"Nothing to it," Darryl smiled, if finding himself taxed by supporting their respective weights. "Don't go wasting away now!"

"Hardly likely," Reagan said, sniffling a belch as she fished for her house key.

After Darryl drove off, the twin sisters stumbled themselves into the cool of the townhouse. It was oddly quiet for this time of the evening, with only the drone of a blue screened TV and the overhead fan audible.

"You...bitches..." came a weary voice from the couch.

"Uma?" Phoebe asked.

"What the hell happened to you?" Reagan asked.

The extra sized ex-athlete groaned as she shifted her bulk on the townhouse two-seater. Unlike the twins she didn't look any larger than the results of their big night at Nat's club, although her state of physical unfitness was apparent as her stretch mark covered belly heaved and even the slightest effort seemed to cause her pain.

"First, you and that Darryl guy just let me sleep after we crashed at his place, then you are were gone after I woke up!"

"Don't tell her about missing the bacon," Phoebe whispered.

"So I had to run all the way back here!" Uma continued.

"From Darryl's?" Reagan was taken aback. "Shit. Why didn't you take a cab?!"

"I didn't have my wallet on me!"

"So what? Just take some of Darryl's money and pay him back later."

"Excuse me for still having some scruples, you pair of lardasses."

"Whatever," Reagan wasn't up to finish the argument, as sleep threatened to take her. "Where's everyone else?"

"Hells if I know," Uma said, trying to curl back into a comfortable position in her exhaustion.

"Bleh," Phoebe sighed, also growing lethargic, "I could do with a shower."

"Yeah, I could do with crashing," Reagan said, visions of her bed approaching her as she took the first step to the second floor.

Two steps in and this was a difficult prospect. Although the queen booty redhead had her hands gripping both railings, the reality of trying to shift her overfilled bulk up a simple flight of steps decided to come down upon her head like a hammer hitting a nail.

"Come on, hurry up Reagan," Phoebe said.

"I'm trying," Reagan hissed, straining muscles that had gone untrained for weeks that now had to contend with her newfound obesity.

"Well, go faster!"

"I could do with a push" Reagan said, beginning to realize that the strain of walking to the breakfast buffet this morning was small potatoes compared to the effort of traveling to the second floor. And Reagan had nearly eaten her body weight in small potatoes in the form of hash browns.

"Like, where do I push?" Phoebe asked. Currently, her view was filled with nothing but Reagan's ass that had eclipsed her own. Although a bit more energetic than her sister as of late that was akin to saying a fat seal moved faster on land than a walrus.

"Just anywhere, come on Phoebe, we practically have the same bodies--YAH!!" Phoebe caught her off guard by thrusting both hands into the doughy composition of her monstrous booty, nails first. "Easy! Easy! Watch the goods!" The probe drummed up a less than flattering sensation. "Knew I should have gone before we left Darryl's."

Phoebe pouted. "Reagan, I can't fit your fat ass in my hands and it's too hard to push!"

For anyone wondering, Reagan had managed to travel up to four steps at this point.

"Well, put your back into it! I don't know." Reagan had a sudden thought. "Turn around and push me up bum to bum."

"Really?"

"It's our only option." Reagan continued to strain her arms in helping her climb each step.

Uma, still sore, turned herself to snicker at the comical sight the twins had made for themselves. With the combined cushion of the mega-sized booties distancing them, Phobe struggled to hoist herself up the stairs backwards to support Reagan who was starting to lean back to relieve pressure from her middle. Both were so overstuffed that what should have been a simple climb became a herculean effort, with plenty of creaks, groans, popping of seams and swears.

"And," Reagan huffed, "Twelve."

"Oh gawd," Phoebe cried, "keep moving! Make space for me."

The two jumbo twins crowded the landing. Reagan regarded the remaining climb. "Hell, I need to rest before trying any more."

"That was hard," Phoebe said, neither twin willing to admit how they had led themselves into these circumstances. "I'm so sweaty and stinky from that, I really need that shower." She clambered into the bathroom.

"Hey," Reagan roused herself from where she was leaning on the bannister, "I call first dibs. I need the toilet."

"But I'm already inside," Phoebe said. "Go upstairs or downstairs."

"Come on, Phebes," her twin cried. "Just let me go here and then I'll be out of your way."

"Ugh, fine."

And with both twins trying to cross the threshold of the bathroom at the same time, in opposite directions, that became the biggest mistake of all.

"Oooff!" came twined cries of pain, and a hard crack in the wooden door frame. As both twins had done most of their respective gains apart until today, it had been some time before they had encountered the unpleasant consequences of both of their bottom heavy hips approaching a ridiculous circumference. The last time the twins had ever gotten caught in something was back at summer camp many years and a hundred and more-so pounds ago.

Their sweat had been just enough lubricant to have their flesh attempt to slide past each other, but now both of their meaty thighs and butts where trying to cram into the same space, a physical impossibility.

"Ow!" Phoebe cried.

"Come on," Reagan said, worriedly. "Push!"

From each side of the doorframe, each twin scrambled to find some sort of purchase. There were few options with each twin only having a scrap of wall and the squashed ass cheeks of the other as respective handholds to contend with.

"I can't move!" Phoebe said. "I'm stuck!"

"Oh fuck it," Reagan sighed, having to swallow her pride along with the effects of her binge. "Can somebody help us? Please??"
133331241122122344222211412122324113.title: The Frame of Shame

choices: Audrey and Nat make a go of it, giving the townhouse a second matriarchal figure
Audrey and Nat agree to nothing serious but keep things hot and heavy
Parting as friends, Nat's attention goes else where
As the Durant sisters have their hookups, Uma and Ixchel are left out.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135.content:
Audrey, Audrey, Audrey...
As any of the girls who had been paying attention had noted, it was VERY unlike the blonde matriarch to cut loose like she had done at Nat's club.
Truthfully, she had probably NEVER cut loose like that before, not even in her wildest of college days but the night in Nat's club just seemed to unlock a beast inside.
Food...drink...Nat
Audrey had had a wild night indeed.

*****

12 HOURS EARLIER

Audrey did not have a clue where she was.
Tangled in a mass of bed sheets with hair plastered across her face, Audrey was a state and she felt it.
Aching in her bones whilst her head pounded like a sledgehammer, she was out of control and that didn't sit well.

"Uma?" she feebly cried out in the hopes she wasn't completely alone.

"Phoebe?" just as feeble and with far less hope, the youngest twin's name came tumbling from Audrey's mouth.

"Reagan?..."
Audrey really was getting desperate if she was hoping Reagan would come to her rescue.
More the point and unbeknownst to Audrey, three girls she had hoped to find were at Darryl's with the twins demolishing their hosts breakfast feast at that very moment.

It took a moment but the sound of footsteps approaching came into Audrey's head, hopefully in the real world although the blonde couldn't tell at this point.

"Hello?" called out Audrey again, hoping the mystery footsteps would announce themselves soon and, at the very least, be gentle about it.
'God my head hurts' thought Audrey with quite the internal groan.
"Hel...argh!" cried Audrey as light suddenly poured into her eyes and fresh air enrobed her shoulders serving as a major shock to her delicate system.

"Well good morning sleepy head!" called out a familiar voice, the feeling of the soft mattress indenting and tipping Audrey slightly sideways with the force.
Audrey scoured her memory for who the voice belonged to and, futilely, attempted to remember who she had been with last night.
It took a moment, delayed even more so with the smell of bacon filling her nostrils, but finally the pieces fell into place.

"Nat?" groaned Audrey as she rolled back into the mountain of pillows and covered her eyes with her forearm.

"Duh, course its me!" smirked Nat as she shuffled a little further onto the bed, into the space created by Audrey moving "you don't go home with many girls surely?"

The blonde could only shake her head in denial as her head continued to throb.

"Phew, I should think not too, it's not very becoming of a lady like you" teased Nat.

"Where are we?" asked Audrey weakly, still shielding her eyes from the faint light coming from between the drapes opposite the bed.

"Less of that, drink this first" offered Nat, nudging a cold glass against Audrey's arm.

"Huh?" grunted Audrey, unwilling to uncover her eyes.

"Just trust me" insisted Nat, peeling Audrey's arm away from her face and pushing the glass into her open hand.

*****

"So what actually happened last night?" asked Audrey, almost miraculously more alive as she delicately placed pieces of bacon and fried bread into her mouth.

"Oh you would not believe Aud, I have NEVER seen you party like that" laughed Nat having gotten into the bed next to Audrey with a thin dressing gown wrapped around her body.

"Oh god..." moaned Audrey as she took a deep drink from the banana milkshake Nat had given her.

"Milkshake good?" asked Nat, ever the attentive host.

"Mhm" Audrey nodded as she savoured the thick creamy liquid in her mouth before swallowing "much better"

"Good" purred Nat as she looked over her friend enjoying her breakfast "Let me know if you want a top up"

Audrey nodded again as she continued to eat.
"Are the others here too?"

"Nah, they left before we did" answered Nat "think Reagan said they were going to some guy's, Darryl's?"

Audrey didn't know the name but motherly instincts were beginning to bubble.

"I'm sure they're fine, the three of them did leave together" reassured Nat with a gentle hand on Audrey's shoulder.

"I should still check though" muttered Audrey, shoving the empty breakfast plate away and sliding out of the bed.

"Oh Audrey, they're adults, just relax!" insisted Nat, crawling to the foot of the bed, watching as Audrey clumsily dumped her clothes on the bed to avoid excessive bending.

Mum brain was running faster than light at this point as Audrey fished out her skirt from the night before and stepped into it.
"I can't Nat, you know how I stress and if the twins are...hnnngh...come on...if the twins...uuumph...why won't my skirt close Nat?"

"Erm..."
Nat attempted to look innocently away but the grin on her face was impossible to hide.
Not that it mattered when Audrey inevitably looked down.

"Oh my god!" screeched the blonde as she looked down her front where her hands were futiley attempting to pull the button of her skirt together, instead only pushing a bulging mass of pale belly between the unreaching flaps.
"How much did I eat last night?!"

Nat could only laugh as she watched the scene play out.
Having watched/helped Audrey get undressed earlier that morning when they had got in she had suspected the skirt would be problematic.
Only in her wildest dreams though would it have been THAT problematic.

"Oh honey, you really did go to town last night" teased Nat with a bitten lip as she watched Audrey attempt to close her skirt again.

"How am I going to get home now when I can't get dressed!" asked Audrey, trying not to lose her mind too much.

"We'll figure something out Aud, it's fine" supported Nat "it's really not that bad"

"Not that bad?! In one single night I am unable to fit in an item of clothing, I should have known this would happen if I came out with you, you always..."
Audrey was getting hysterical now.

"Hey, I didn't put any food in your mouth last night" returned Nat, almost a little hurt "I don't do that anymore, not since college"

"Oh come off it, you've been feeding Phoebe for months" complained Audrey, giving up on the skirt at this point.

"No, I've supplied her with food" corrected Nat "and I've never done it when she's not wanted"

"But, I don't do this" moaned Audrey, dropping herself on the bed with her belly in her hands.

Nat found herself a little lost in how best to support her friend.
It was impossible to deny that Audrey not being able to fit into her skirt was quite the turn on to Nat but at the same time she wasn't going to prey on her like that when she clearly wasn't happy.

"Look, we can sort something out, I can buy you some new clothes and get you a cab home, it'll be fine" said Nat, taking control of the situation.

"Uh huh" mused Audrey, more in her own head than the conversation.

"And likewise, if you want to stay here for a bit you can do" offered Nat, putting an arm around Audrey as she spoke "it's entirely up to you and I..."

In a movement far too swift for a hungover person with the idea of a very drunk person behind it, Audrey slid down Nat's tattooed arm and locked lips with her.
Despite enjoying the moment though, Nat had to speak up.

"Ok, hold up Audrey, what's going on here?" asked Nat as she held her friend at arms length.

"I, erm...I don't know" mumbled Audrey, holding an outstretched palm against her forehead "I'm just...going with it"

"Ok, but this is kinda..." started Nat before Audrey stuck a finger against her lips.

"Do you want to feed me or not?" asked Audrey almost huskily with a hungry lust in her eyes.

"Yes but..." replied Nat as her confidence began to falter

"Well then go with it" purred Audrey as she clumsily clambered onto all fours and kissed Nat again.

*****

The day had taken...quite the turn for Audrey and Nat.

The long and short of it had been a lot of raucous behaviour that Reagan would have applauded, a near constant torrent of food that Phoebe would have applauded and, now that things had settled down again, a moment of reflection that Audrey and Nat were internally applauding.

"So help me out here Aud" started Nat, her dressing gown sliding from her shoulders with a handful of cake about to be delivered into her mouth "where the HELL has that come from today?"

Audrey pondered for a moment, mostly to swallow her own mouthful of cake.

"Really, I don't know...it just felt right" contemplated Audrey, hunkering into the blanket that Nat had provided for her decency as the pair cozied up on the sofa in Nat's living room.

"Ok" pondered Nat, not entirely satisfied with that response "So where does that leave us after today?"

Audrey had to think hard on this one, more opportunity for cake at least.
"I'm not sure just yet" answered the blonde honestly.

As the girls watched the TV quietly, Audrey's phone pinged beside her.
Swiping her phone up and opening the message from Uma, she snorted most ungracefully.

"What?" asked Nat attempting to peer at the phone.

Audrey read the message:
'I'm pissed as hell with you...but that doesn't mean you should miss this...'
Below was a picture of Phoebe and Reagan stuck in what seemed to be the first floor bathroom door.
Seeing it for the first time, Nat burst out laughing whilst Audrey smirked broadly as she replied to Uma.
'Looks like they've had fun, see you soon xxx'
1333312411221223442222114121223241135.title: Another Morning After
