choices: The dreamy weekends turn back to new struggles for our zaftig ladies.
Audrey and Nat reminisce on the time they were roommates in college...
Reagan and Phoebe are back together, but the twins activities have changed.
Time passes, and soon someone else surges ahead as the heaviest roommate.
13333124112212234422221141212232411352.content:
With the laughter of the twins' predicament in Uma's text passing, Audrey and Natalie found themselves at the same lingering question.

"We enjoy each others company," Nat said, "and you kissed me, remember?"

"I know, it's just," Audrey bit her lip. "I don't know how to explain why I did it, although I enjoyed it..."

Adjusting the sleeve of her nightgown over a tattooed shoulder, Nat then spread that arm around Audrey's fattened middle from behind to stroke the side of her belly. "Wouldn't you say were more than friends? More like lovers?"

"I..." Audrey tried to make sense of her feelings. "I really like you, Nat, I don't know why I set aside those feelings for so long, but I've never thought of it as love. I mean, being in love with a woman. Not that I wouldn't love you, but, I've never thought myself--"

Audrey was shushed by Nat pressing a finger to her lips. "I get it, Audrey. I've always been the most forward since college. You never struck me as one who was into gals, although I admit that added to my attraction. But I don't want you to make the next step until you're able to decide for yourself."

"Thanks Nat. I mean, whoo, I guess there was something freeing about being at your club last night. It's been awfully busy at work, and the girls have gotten the whole house turned on each other with one of their spats, I've been under so much stress lately. I guess what I'm trying to say is that, I don't know if I can go steady with you until I sort out several other things."

" 'Go steady'?" Nat chuckled, "we're not in high school, Aud. But I'll be here for you when you need me."

"Today's been great," Audrey smiled. "Minus me freaking out. I shouldn't toy with your emotions either until I'm sure I can be committed. It's been fun hanging out with you again, Nat."

"We can still have fun and keep things platonic," Nat blushed. "Or if you'd prefer, sporadically intimate. I've got the manager's booth at my club for may favorite, most special customer."

Having plunged down the smorgasbord of Nat's fine cooking in the last 24 hours, Audrey couldn't help but lick her lips at the prospects. "Oh, I'm always going to enjoy your food. Clearly, too much to the point of overindulgence." Audrey gripped the meaty fold of her overfeed stomach, still trying to digest the cake from earlier.

"Oh shoot, right," Nat said, becoming pragmatic even before Audrey did, as the aftermath of their soul-searching brought its own issues. The elephant in the room being Audrey's elephantine stomach. "I can't have you going home half naked. And that skirt is shot."

"Here," Nat got up to her closet, turning on the light and searching through her clothes. "Let me see if I have anything that will fit you."

She presented Audrey with several clothing options. "A loaner to get home with, the least I can do."

"Thanks Nat. Do you mind?"

"Sure, oh wait, sure, let me give you some privacy." As much as her own libido shot up at Audrey's predicament, she had promised to take things slow with her for now. As she stepped out to freshen up, Audrey got down to looking at what options she had to make herself decent to head home.

Audrey had to laugh in how she and Nat had very different styles. Audrey's style was simple, plain and conservative in some circles, with even her discarded party clothes not being too flashy (although Phoebe had said her butt would look amazing) while Nat had a lot more color and personality. The assortment that she had to try on was rich with textures and different kinds of fabric Audrey wouldn't have ever thought of wearing before.

It went without saying that both Audrey and Natalie were fat women. And while Audrey was initially hopeful that she could find something of her size in Nat's wardrobe, their physiques were quite different. Audrey, ever big-boned as the tallest sister of the family, had a long torso and weighty apple-shaped belly to Nat's ruebenesque, thigh heavy weight. Enough differences to the point that as Audrey tried on some of Nat's clothes to borrow, one of two issues would crop up. It didn't help that Audrey should have called it quits after realizing how much she had demolished her diet after last night at the club, but her hunger had led her to being stuffed anew with cake and goodies shared with Nat.

The stubborn mass digesting in her belly proved too taxing to the stretch of some garments, while those that were loosest about the stomach weren't quite long enough for Audrey's frame, leaving more skin showing than she cared to reveal. It would be a different story if she could find some skirt or pants suitable to pair with a shorter shirt. Unfortunately, Nat had something of a pinched under-bust where she wore her skirts high, a metric too taxed by Audrey's overfed belly. And all the give in the rear from Nat's more broad hips couldn't make fastening the clothing up front any less awkward as Audrey struggled over her belly.

"Um, Nat?" Audrey called out. "Can you come here?"

Nat opened the door a creak. "Yes?"

"Thanks for offering, but I don't think I can fit in any of your clothes," Audrey admitted, growing beet red yet also excited. "Unless I try your maxi dress here that leaves me far too, um, inadequately covered."

There was a slight pause.

Audrey patted her side, making her belly jiggle. "Your food is just too good, if only I had managed to watch my appetite."

"You tease," Nat retorted, smirking, as Audrey blushed.

"Alright, big girl," Nat said, "let me see what size you were. I'll go out and get something that should fit, make yourself at home."

"Thanks Nat," Audrey said sheepishly, keeping herself half dressed in the outgrown remains of her previous outfit. As Nat left it gave Audrey a chance to take in the layout of Nat's high end apartment.

The club manager lived in a more upscale part of the city, in a designer flat comfortable for two people. It definitely didn't have the room for five like Audrey's roommates, even before their respective weight gains. Nat had offered her the TV but Audrey didn't have any shows she wanted to watch and was more curious than anything.

Nat didn't keep pictures on the walls but there was a bookshelf over in her living space. Books with large binders. Audrey picked one and saw that it was filled with architectural markups and interior swatches, design work as Nat had built her club. The next book went into operations, although it gave way to recipes she used at the club.

Most of the books were cookbooks. Making Audrey all the more interested.

*****


"Audrey?" Nat knocked at the door. "You still decent in there? I got you something to wear."

Some time later, Nat had arrived after an impromptu shopping spree at +Size. She unlocked the door to a chorus of Audrey's giggles.

"Oh my gosh," Audrey said as Nat entered, "I can't believe you've still got all these old college notebooks!"

"Hey now, some of my best recipes are from that era," Nat said, oddly defensive for once.

"But you've got all your school notes in here too. Your scathing remarks about the other people in our dorm and all that bad poetry you wrote!"

Nat cringed. "Ok, so I wasn't suited for my first major in college."

"All the world a despicable shore--" Audrey began to read, before having a shopping bag flung towards her face.

"Ok, ok, can it and see if this fits you," Nat objected to further airing out of her bad poetry as Audrey went to get changed. She shook her head filing her old books back in order as her blonde friend got changed.

"How did you manage to find something in the same style?" Audrey asked a few minutes later, pleased to be wearing a better fitting skirt. She couldn't hide her stomach at this point but it was covered and the waist wasn't too snug. It had retained her club look from the previous night, albeit at larger size.

"You should start shopping at +Size, they cater to gals with our physiques."

"I promise to pay you back for this," Audrey said as they prepared to leave.

"Come off it," Nat said, "it's a gift, you've given me enough business."

"I can't take advantage of your generosity," Audrey began.

"Take the gift, blondie, I mean it," Nat teased, before she found herself on the receiving end of a tight hug.

"Oh, thanks for everything Nat," Audrey said, "I'm so glad we're friends again. I'm sorry for what friction came between us."

"It's cool, Audrey. Whatdaya say we have our own lives, but leave time for each other?"

"Sounds great!" Audrey said, having a more chipper outlook on life. Although her budding adventurous side brought up one last coy comment. "You know, if you keep feeding me like this these clothes aren't going to last much longer."

"I'll always be there for a friend," Nat said, grabbing her keys as they prepared to leave. "Especially for a friend with extra special benefits."
13333124112212234422221141212232411352.title: Extra Special Benefits

choices: Phoebe has a new feeder boyfriend
An unexpected modelling opportunity is calorie rich
Reagan doesn’t care as the jealousy seeps in again
133331241122122344222211412122324113524.content:
After a rather insane night that nobody living at 8422 Fordham Avenue was bound to forget any time soon, things began to settle in to some semblance of a routine;

Phoebe and Reagan made good on their sisterly reunion, painting any and all eateries red.

Audrey and Nat continued to ‘make time’ for one another whilst steadily climbing the ranks of mum bod territory, much to the surprise of her house mates who were none the wiser to her choice in companionship.

Uma was spending a lot of time with herself, seen rarely and often grouchy when she did appear, not to mention that she seemed to be stretching her dangerously outdated gym wear more by the day.

Last, and by no means least, was of course Ixchel who for all intents and purposes was just carrying on as per normal. It suited her that her housemates didn’t ask after her - they usually didn’t mean it after all - but she certainly couldn’t complain at the extra food in the house...

*****

grumble

“Urgh god...” groaned Reagan from within the tangle of bed sheets.

grooowl

“I’m coming!” grunted Reagan a little louder to her complaining belly as it’s cries of hunger roused her from her sleep.

With begrudging acceptance and a chorus from her creaking bed frame, Reagan heaved herself out of bed, grabbed a T-shirt whilst crossing her room and opened the door closing her off from the rest of the house.

Taking a moment NOW to pull her shirt on over her otherwise underwear clad body, the redhead waddled towards the bathroom with phone in hand, beginning the morning rituals she had adopted from Phoebe.

As wonderful as the attention was that the older twin garnered from piggy backing her sisters’ profiles, Reagan was far too much of a self indulgent individual to not strike out on her own.
The process had taken best part of an afternoon and a great deal of help from Phoebe, but Reagan had managed to tweak her social profiles to accommodate her current lifestyle and the rest was history.

Situated in front of the bathroom mirror, Reagan posed with a slight kink in her body alignment, a delicately chewed lip and a set of fingers splayed over the exposed belly hang rolling out from under her shirt.
Giving her belly a slight pinch causing pale fat to bulge slightly through her fingers making the picture all the more alluring for her avid fans.

Content with her morning show piece, Reagan threw her hair back and let herself back out of the bathroom.
A small glimmer of memory flashed into her mind of the night her and Phoebe had got trapped in that very door frame, but it passed nearly as quickly as it came. The arrival of another resident helped to push the embarrassment from the twin’s mind.

“Hey, watch where you’re going!” Reagan quietly barked, more interested in the torrent of likes her latest offering was already bringing in.

“Oh pfft” grunted Uma as she stomped into the bathroom, her distinctive spherical belly wobbling ahead of her engorged frame.

Reagan couldn’t help but chuckle to herself as Uma passed her, looking quite the sight with her pregnant looking belly leading her way atop black pillars of fattened thighs.
Riddled in stretch marks, Uma was a ballooned shadow of herself even if she was small fry next to Reagan still.

*****

With a smirk still painted on her lips, Reagan made her way downstairs only to hear her name being called from behind.

“Reagan, sweetie, could you...help me out...please?” came the soft words of Audrey at the top of the stairs.

“I dunno Aud, kinda on my way for some breakfast y’know?”

“It won’t be long, just...ungh...please?” groaned Audrey.

“Oh fine, what is it?” complained Reagan as she clumsily turned around on the stairs, only to be met with her second sight of the day.

At the top of the stairs with her hands on her hips, Audrey stood giving quite the display of plump midriff squeezing over the band of her high waisted jeggings which, needless to say, were not around her waist.

Truth be told, they didn’t even make her hips as the hem of her panties betrayed and the exertion of attempting to get the leg wear high enough had left the blonde matriarch flushed.

“Can I borrow some jeans or something? I’m heading out soon and nothing of mine fits” moaned Audrey, still with her hands on her hips.

“Wouldn’t Ixchel be a better ask, she’s more your figure right?” probed Reagan, trying to ignore her constant stomach rumblings.

“Well yeah but I’ve already tried, turns out I’m bigger than her now” confessed Audrey with a hint of shame mixed with what Reagan could only think to be...arousal?
What was going on with Audrey lately anyway?

“Ooh, Audrey’s starting to get a real mum bod now” teased Reagan as she laboriously began to climb the stairs again, one great wobbling thigh rolling past the other.

“Shut up” grumbled Audrey in return “can I borrow something or not?”

“I dunno, my stuff is a bit skimpy for you” Reagan continued to tease whilst struggling to catch her breath as she drew level with her oldest sister.

“You must have sweats” pleaded Audrey as her own stomach began to purr from hunger.

“I’ll see what I can do” sighed Reagan with a grin as she waddled towards her room, nudging the door open with a great curving hip.

*****

“Well they’re not too tight” admitted Audrey with a gentle puff through her mouth.

“Nope” agreed Reagan, working her way around a large block of chocolate she had discovered in her room.

“Kinda the other way now though” mused Audrey as she let go of the grey material around her hips and watched as rolled back down past her knees.

“Well they’re the smallest I have nowadays and, honestly, I haven’t worn those bitches in a while” contemplated Reagan as the last of her chocolate disappeared between her lips.

“Well thanks for trying” smiled Audrey as she stepped out of the leg wear “you want these back?”

“Nah you keep em, something to grow in to” winked Reagan as she passed her sister and began to descend the stairs again.

The comment caught Audrey off guard but, after a moment of thought, the prospect did seem...amusing to say the least.
It’d certainly drive Nat mad anyway thought the blonde as she made a mental note to take them with her when she left.

*****

‘Finally, I can get some breakfast’ Reagan told herself as she hit the ground floor, her body jiggling from the impact as she lazily paced towards the townhouse kitchen.

All was going to plan as the redhead began to silently salivate at the prospect of her first gorge of the day only to be disturbed by the sound of the tv quietly playing away and frequent and feverish rustling of papers and boxes coming from the living room.

“Who on earth could that be?” muttered Reagan as she halted her progress and turned tail again, following the sounds back towards the living room.
A warm feeling bubbled inside Reagan as she felt her arse wobble violently behind her, the fabric of her panties being chewed on by the great curves of blubber behind her.

Lost in her erotic thoughts, Reagan only found herself brought back to reality as the sound of someone speaking to her cut through her thought process.

*****

“Oh hey Reagan, didn’t know you were up” purred Phoebe with a wide grin and cheeks full of greasy breakfast burrito.

“No worries, ain’t been up long” replied Reagan as she eyed up Phoebe lounging on the sofa surrounded by a great deal of debris from food already inhaled.

Phoebe only smiled through her mouthful as she carried on eating.

“Any for me?” asked Reagan, licking her lips a little.

“Erm...not really” replied Phoebe, swallowing hard “on a bit of a challenge from the fans”

“Fair play” muttered Reagan as she pulled out her phone and began to concoct her own order having been inspired by her sister.

“Hey if you hurry our orders might come together” piped up Phoebe, wiping her mouth on the back of her hand.

“You gone twice?” asked Reagan, eyes flitting up from her phone through curiosity.

“Oh yeah, SOO hungry this morning” purred Phoebe before unexpectedly bringing herself to her feet after inhaling the last greasy bite.

The simple act of standing up drew Reagan’s attention more than anything had that morning.

Although visibly bloated from the extensive breakfast binge, it was clear that Phoebe had grown outwards since the twins altercation with the door.
Her belly hung heavily under its own great weight as the redhead gently kneaded her fattened side, quaking ripples rolling through the two tiers of fat at her touch.
Her chest was swelling against restrictive cups which were biting into the plump flesh within with each breath.
Unsurprisingly, Phoebe’s arse was the embodiment of her gluttony, swelling outwards with more and more empty calories by the day with heavy love handles chasing her hips outwards an inch at a time.

Phoebe’s arms were flabby, her chin swaddled with a second and her cheeks were plump and rosey.
Her bottom half was dappled in cellulite and even her feet had a chubby quality to them.

Most importantly though, she was fatter than Reagan in every way which was an impressive feat given the senior twin’s bulk.
But how?!
133331241122122344222211412122324113524.title: Queen Reagan, queen no more...

choices: Phoebe invites Reagan along to a Gormand-Size shoot.
Reagan is sworn to secrecy, as Audrey doesn’t know about Phoebe’s modelling yet.
Phoebe has unexpected support for her new gig within the townhouse.
Growing ever wider, common features soon become an obstacle to Phoebe’s rear.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
Taking in the sight of how her younger twin had bcom even fatter, all Reagan could do was mouth “Holy shit…”

Each of Phoebe’s quaking steps caused her ginormous ass to wobble and bounce, threatening to pop out of her tight pyjama bottoms as she reached for the second of her four breakfast orders that morning. Although Phoebe had more chipper energy than Reagan, the younger twin moved just as slowly and laboriously as the pair grew to titanic sizes.

Back when Reagan was driven by jealously over the whole ass expansion of their respective gains, she had channeled that hate and sibling rivalry into continuously stuffing herself, an effort that required plenty of willpower. Only by alternating nights with Nat and Darryl enabling her allowed Reagan to keep up with the massive nutritional requirements to gain those pounds. Since making peace with Phoebe, Reagan was content with her massive appetite and thousands of followers interested in the size of her ass.

In fact, much like this morning, Reagan felt most of her efforts now extended to keeping herself fed. Having taken such extreme efforts to match her sister for expanding size, Reagan was familiar with just how many extra calories were needed to add an inch, even if the twins’ signature assets soaked up calories like sponges. As Reagan stomped into the kitchenette looking for food while her own breakfast burrito order was processed, she regarded what had become the new normal for her. Much as she enjoyed eating and the attention it garnered, it was beginning to feel like a chore. Moving was becoming difficult and the incident that had caused both her and Phoebe to get stuck in the bathroom door had scared the older twin somewhat, although she wouldn’t admit it. What if she got stuck in a tight spot with another housemate? Or worse, grew so bootylicious that she couldn't fit in anything?

Rather than see it as becoming a slave to her appetite, Reagan had accepted that she was huge and this was about as fat as she wanted to be before it got uncomfortable. Her gaining had slowed down considerably, compared to her climb over the last several months, as she neared her plateau.

And yet Phoebe was surging ahead…

The puzzle occupied the oddly self-reflective Reagan as she joined her twin in the last wave of their breakfast binge, each having ordered another dozen burritos apiece. Hunger satiated temporarily, Reagan regarded how the bubbly Phoebe managed to chow down all the more excitedly as she completed the challenge set by her fans.

“Jeez, Phebes, how do you have that much energy?” Reagan asked.

“Huh?” replied the oblivious redhead.

“You know, for getting fatter,” Reagan said, thinking back on the number of food comas she had eaten herself into and the booths she had gotten stuck in as the twins grew out of their 200s.

“Am I? Phoebe asked blithely. The more gregarious twin took to the dramatic shift in their collective lifestyle much differently from Reagan. Her blend of perkiness, friendliness, and cluelessness had never approached the weight gain from dubious objectives like Reagan had. Indeed, it could be said that outside of her initial gain from comfort eating to get over getting dropped from her acting gig had switched to resonating, however subconsciously, that getting fat had led to further popularity, comfort, and overall better times.

Reagan was taken aback. Gawd, Phoebe couldn’t be that thick about how thick they were getting. “Not that I care, but don’t all those jackasses and staffers at college look at you with scorn and snide marks?”

Phoebe paused her post-digestion belly rub. “Not really. After working with Audrey I graduated early.”

“Wait, what??” Reagan couldn’t believe that. For the longest time, the only A’s Phoebe had ever accumulated were bra sizes. “You’re kidding! Wait, did you actually get a diploma?”

“A what?”

That explained that then. “So what you meant to say, sis, is that you dropped out for a lucrative paralegalling career.”

“It’s not that lucrative,” Phoebe said, picking morsels out of her teeth. “I get more money modeling.”

That brought Reagan some pause. “What modeling? You haven’t modeled since, well…” Reagan recalled that day, what felt like half a lifetime ago, when she had begrudgingly consoled Phoebe during her ice cream binge after the younger Durant twin had split her pants during her acting gig, as the booty gaining war had started in that aftermath.

Phoebe lit up. “It’s been great, Reagan, I’ve gotten paid for being in front of the camera again ever since one of my followers messaged me about it.” She fished out her phone from under a flabby roll and after a few taps showed her twin the screen.

“What the hell is gormandize?” Reagan asked, struggling to read the cursive font on a black-backed website at the awkward angle.

“No,” Phoebe corrected, “I got this wrong all the time too. It’s ‘Gormand-Size.’ It’s a site that celebrates big beauties like us, and one of the studios is local.” The younger twin had a dreamy, somewhat vacant look to her eyes as she described it. “And Marcello makes the best flan.”

“Who?” Reagan asked, trying to search for the site on her own phone.

“The studio prop master and chef,” Phoebe replied happily, licking her lips. “They let me eat during the shoots, and last week I got a trough of flan to myself.”

Out of all the dumb things Reagan had heard her twin say throughout the years, that was one of the weirdest. She was starting to put the pieces together about what sort of modelling Phoebe had gotten herself into. The age restricted access to ‘Gormand-Size’ was the final piece to the puzzle.

Much as Reagan didn’t care what sort of nonsense Phoebe got herself into, she was a big enough...err, old enough girl to take responsibility for herself for a change, the whole prospect sounded as sketchy as hell. And this was coming from the townhouse resident with the most active, promiscuous sex life, although Reagan never stuck around with the same conquests for too long.

“Phoebe, sis, this is a skeevy sounding site. Like a porn site.”

Phoebe shook her head. “No! Well, no, I haven't agreed to model nude yet. They lend me fashionable outfits. And the food is so good~!”

Of course, neither of the twins were the definition of ‘fully clothed’ as each flabby roll of fat bulged out from the hems of their overtaxed lounge wear. They were showing more skin than they ever had during their scantily dressed skinny days. It’s not like Phoebe or Reagan being nude would reveal anything new about their zaftig sizes.

"Do you hear what you're..." Reagan's comments fell flat, recognizing this kind of behavior from her twin. "You're really enjoying this, aren't you?"

Phoebe was all grins as she hefted herself from her seat for the third time that morning, her cascade of fat drooping to gravity as it was no longer supported by the over-burdened couch. A return to modeling, pampered living and an all encompassing access to food? No wonder Phoebe was continuing to pork up.

"Oh, and I heard about a new pizza joint that opened up right near the studio, wanna head there for lunch Reagan?"

The older twin felt her bulk press down into her well-worn cushion groove. "Sure, just give me a chance to nap this off," she replied, feeling ever-more lethargic as she struggled to digest a massive breakfast.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: Calorie Rich Modeling

choices: Onwards!
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
"Hey Phoebe, I got the last of those cameras set up." From the steps down into the living room from the second floor Ixchel appeared. Blinking from her drowsiness, Reagan looked at her cousin with fresh eyes. The Mexican/Korean housemate was by far the smallest resident but that did not make her immune from the collective weight gain shared by the young women.

Having a dual strain of doughy, rounded phenotypes in her genetics, Ixchel had plumped up more than a moderate amount. Some brown skin was visible in the wayward gap that appeared between her printed shirt and long skirt as she paused on the steps to sort out some cables and an old modem in her hands. Pudgier than ever, Ixchel had let her hair grow long as the dark strands draped over rounded shoulders and engorged breasts. Given how they flopped within the stretchy confines of her shirt, she was out of fitting bras as she was catching up to the twins and Audrey for breast size. These sat atop a fattened stomach, not as protruding as Uma or Audrey, mind, but giving Ixchel a shape like a stuffed sausage as her thickened thighs and calves could be visible putting the fabric of her skirt through its paces as she walked.

Sitting down heavily in the remaining chair, Ixchel took her glasses off for a polish, unaware of how much of her belly was now uncovered from the impact. "I had to jury-rig a second router in your room but I think that will give us the coverage we need for your streams."

"Aw, thanks Chel!" Phoebe began to lean her bulk over towards her cousin's seat, before finding the distance too far for a hug and settling for air kisses.

"Cameras?" Reagan asked. "Is this about Phoebe's weird modeling?"

Ixchel nodded simply, all business. "Just don't go unplugging anything next to your alarm clock," she warned, having been burned too often by Phoebe making hazards with the townhouse's internet in the past. "Plus, you'll probably want to tidy up before you start filming in your room."

"Sure thing!" Phoebe replied.

"And you're okay with this?" Reagan questioned Ixchel before realizing what she said. Shit, she was beginning to sound like Audrey. Sure, Chel had her gaming streams and stuff but she worked for that medical tech company. Right? And she was the last holdout for eating healthily after Audrey had fully given into her repressed appetite.

"Oh, Ryan said she was a great find!" Phoebe explained, which still didn't explain anything to Reagan at all. "The studio is more of a start-up so people with both web and video experience are needed."

"Let's just say it's been more interesting than any projects I've had with work lately," Ixchel said, putting on her glasses. "Pays better, too."

"What's the matter?" Reagan jeered. "Company thinks you're too fat for making those fitness lifestyle apps?"

Ixchel huffed, tugging at the hem of her shirt. "You're one to talk, Reagan, we should be thanking both you and Phoebe for dragging us all down this path."

"You know it, bitch," Reagan said with a chuckle, pleased with keeping her place in the packing order of the house's hierarchy.

"Ooooh! Chel! You want to join Reagan and me for lunch at that new pizza place?" Phoebe asked. "I hear there's an early-bird special!"

"Sure, I could go for two or five slices," Ixchel replied.

"Damnit, girl," Reagan groaned, "give me a chance to make some room." She kneaded her broad stomach, still stuffed with the eclectic mix of pop-tarts, instant waffles, and breakfast burrito takeout she had eaten to quiet her morning stomach growls.

"You know," Ixchel said coyly. "I did acquire that last piece of equipment if we want to start another one of your field assignments, Phebes."

"Really?!"

"What now?" Reagan sighed.

Ixchel set up a new piece of equipment. "A new megapixel high resolution body cam. I'll also bring the tripod if we have the space for it."

"Ahh," Phoebe stage whispered. "Wouldn't that be a super-naughty thing to do?" She giggled.

"Yes!" Ixchel replied, rather forward for the reclusive nerd.

"Just what are the two of you on about now?" Reagan said, beginning to regret agreeing to this lunch date.

"It's just another challenge, Reagan!" Phoebe said, licking her lips.

----

Cal's Zone was the horribly pun-titled new pizza joint across town as the three cousins made their way to lunch at 1:30, with many complaints from the twins about the car getting small. Inside a renovated old city brick interior, the pizza shop looked promising if sparsely filled, customers having lulled after the soft opening. After managing to waddle their way inside, the twins knew from an instant that the short booths up front would be inadequate for girls of their heft. Ixchel suggested they take one of the tables in the back where there was the most privacy.

The three women needed a six-seater table on account of Reagan and Phoebe needing two chairs apiece to prop up their massive posteriors. Much to Reagan's chagrin Ixchel sat next to her while Phoebe got one side of the table to herself.

"Okay," Ixchel said after orders were taken. "I don't think they know about the body cam. And the angle looks good." She had mirrored the camera feed to her phone. "Now, Phoebe, tell your viewers about what you're going to do."

"You guys," Phoebe launched into a signature perky, saccharine tone of voice. "This Cal Zone's place is amazing, the smell of good pizza is everywhere. And their double extra-large deal is FREE! if you finish it in the shop." Phoebe jiggled her flabby upper belly. "Which I don't know if I'm going to be able to finish, you instagram followers already know I went for the Gross Grande Burrito challenge this morning."

"Gross!" Reagan said under her breath, not using the definition of 'a count of 12 dozen' that Phoebe had used to describe her burrito challenge.

Ixchel shushed her. "Quiet, or I'm going to need a lot more edits on the video."

"This is stupid!" Reagan said, who was used to lunches only with her twin where they could eat, talk, eat, catch the reactions from onlookers, and eat in relative peace. It was nothing against her cousin, Reagan was off put by the small, empty pizza joint as she wasn't as impressed as Phoebe had been upon arrival. And now her younger twin was bringing her bizarre BBW camgirl/modeling thing into lunch.

"Hush," Ixchel said. "Think of it this way, if this pays out for Phoebe and me we could chip in for a larger vehicle."

"Fine," Reagan said sourly. From an outsider's perspective this was a new low for Phoebe's continual gullibility. Reagan was fine with being the center of attention, even moreso as she had jumped on the fat booty snapchat bandwagon with Phoebe. She knew she was still as hot as hell at her present enormity without degrading herself with eating challenges from strangers.

"And cousin Chel is here on camera," Phoebe waved with a stage whisper. "And we're all going to have lunch with my twin Reagan."

"Don't you dare film my bad side," Reagan warned.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: Part 1: Cousin with the Tech Support

choices: Phoebe's eating becomes an online hit, if disruptive to life at home.
She fattened them all, will Phoebe sway others as BBW feedee models?
New accommodations are needed at 8422 for the blimping beauties.
Meanwhile, further shenanigans are had by the other fattening housemates.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
"That'll make for a good intro," Ixchel said, focused on keeping the body cam at a good angle and other quick adjustments to her phone based recording setup. "Here, I'll get us drinks while we're waiting."

Much as Reagan grumbled about the proceedings, she appreciated that Ixchel waited on the pair of them as their pizza orders were cooking. She could sip her giant cherry Pepsi to drown out the cutesy talk Phoebe was blabbering on about to her fans. As Phoebe was trying to save room, Reagan had a basket of cheesy garlic bread all to herself.

"And here you girls go," a lanky waitress said minutes later as she set down a tray with several pizza orders. If she hadn't figured out they were filming Phoebe's eating challenge, she definitely didn't think highly of the amount of food the trio of lardasses was ordering. It was making for interesting gossip back in the kitchen.

Grunts and shuffling of seats were needed as the fold-outs of the table were needed to fit everyone's pizzas. Both Reagan and Phoebe had ordered the extra larges, a pizza size normally meant to feed 5-6 people. And the younger, vivacious redhead had two of them as per the 'Double Extra-Large' promo. Ixchel had order a chunky sized calzone and had been supplementing her trips to refill the twins' drinks with plates from the salad bar.

"OMG-ness, you guys," Phoebe continued as Ixchel resumed filming, in awe at the two steaming, freshly made pizzas laid out before her at the end of the table. And yes, that was said as a three-letter acronym with added hyphened syllable. "I asked the cute guy at the register what the best pizzas on the menu were, and that's these. This is the Spinach Alfredo Chicken Parmesan and this is the BBQ Hawaiian with Tomato." Each was a sea of crust, toppings, and bubbling cheeses; the creamy white, green, and tan of the former with the burnt ruddy-browns, pinks and red of the latter with scattering amounts of yellow.

"And Chel's got an impressive calzone, show them Chel." At Phoebe's beckoning, Ixchel careful lifted her plate at a tilt so her calzone was briefly in the shot.

"And what'd you order again, sis?" Phoebe asked.

"The Super Spicy Meat Special," Reagan growled between bites, her tone indicating her half of the table was not to be disturbed now that food was in front of her.

As much as the twins had rekindled their sisterhood with frequent buffet and diner lunches, today's outing highlighted the contrast in their styles of eating. Reagan had become a dogmatic eater, preferring big lunches and late night eats, as partying at Nat's and having snacking intermissions during sex could attest to these habits. The larger breakfast that morning had put her off her game. An extra large was child's play for her, normally, if not for the basket and a half of cheesy bread along with the pudding cups Ixchel had gotten her from the salad bar. After the two-thirds mark Reagan was slowing down, using a well-practiced series of massages to sooth her belly from the massive qualities of food she often subjected it to.

Phoebe, however, took to the food like a fish needing water. Or perhaps a puppy to training, given how eagerly she took to each bite and moaning with pleasure from the taste. It was more pronounced than her usual habits, with Reagan attributing to Phoebe's mugging it up for the video to be posted on 'Gormand-Size' once Ixchel was done editing it. It would be sickening if Reagan hadn't lost most of her gag reflex by this point.

"*hurk*" Reagan breathed heavily some time latter, feeling stuffed to the absolute gills. "Gonna have to take this home." A respectable quarter of her extra-large remained to be boxed with more of that cheesy bread, in all honesty Reagan would have it for dinner that evening, if not a late night snack, but she had become acutely aware of her limits. Gone were her days of hour-long binges, Reagan had shifted to keeping two massive meals with snacks in-between, efforts to keep her tank from going empty.

Phoebe weakly brought another square of pizza to her lips. "This is, so, so, tasty everyone," pause for a belch, "but I'm not too sure on the Double Extra-Large challenge. Not after burritos." She cumulatively had just shy of three times the amount of slices left that Reagan had.

"Don't puke my direction if you get sick," Reagan chided. Just how air-headed could Phoebe be with these eating challenges of hers? The only saving grace on that "Gross Grande Burrito" challenge with breakfast was that the namesake burritos were actually palmed sized and normally came in orders of two or three. That 'taquito' would have been a better moniker was lost on the fast food marketing executives.

Ixchel, for as focused she was being on the furtive filming, had but away quite a bit of food herself, as she finished the last of her calzone with a large mouthful.

"Feeling full, Phebes?" Ixchel asked encouragingly. "That's a shame. This was going to be the first video set out in public you were going to make for your fans."

"You're right, Chel," Phoebe said, somewhat delirious as she found a second wind. "I wouldn't want to disappoint everyone that believes in me."

Reagan rolled her eyes, muttering "Oh, please."

After having already consumed four times the suggested daily caloric intake for the average male by 3 o'clock, Phoebe drew upon her unbelievable energy reserves to go back at her eating challenge with gusto. It was disturbingly mesmerizing for her twin and cousin seeing just how far Phoebe had given herself to gluttony. Whether it was for the online acclaim, proving something to herself, or being just so unrestrained in her consumption, who could say what motivated Phoebe at this point, yet the signs of how the youngest (on a technicality) housemate had become the fattest was clear to see.

"Alright," Phoebe huffed, great swaths of her stomach peaking out from under her top as it pressed against the table, her jiggling juggs also matching the rhythmic swelling of her belly with each labored breath. "I'm...five...pieces...away..."

It looks like she's swallowed a goddamn truck tire! Reagan thought, filled with mixed feelings. Phoebe's stomach had expanded further than breakfast, somewhat pink, and each jostle Phoebe made to sit more comfortably on her massive rump caused the chairs to creak. As they were identical twins, it was an eerie look into the mirror how far Reagan might have gone had she continued her pursuit of having the largest ass, for how introspective this experience had been for her. And Phoebe was eating this much, seemingly, only for fun it brought her!

"Come on, Phoebe, I know you can do it," Ixchel said with quiet excitement. Reagan looked sideways at their cousin from where she sat with her own digesting payload. How come this arrangement, of all things, had made mousey Chel the most excited Reagan had ever seen her short of a video game?

"So good..." Phoebe said, stuffing her mouth with one of the dwindling slices.

Phoebe powered through the remaining slices. Three left. Two lift.

When there was only half a bite of each flavor left, Phoebe did one last surge of consumption to eat them together, sandwich style, to get everything swallowed. "The..." she hiccuped, "double-large-ex, promo, pizza combo, spinach and pineapple, challenge," she was beyond rational speech at this point. "Complete."

"That was damn amazing girl," Ixchel said, standing for an overhead profile of Phoebe's piggish accomplishment, gingerly poking some of Phoebe's stomach as the younger Durant twin leaned back, chairs giving another creak.

"Thanks for watching," Phoebe blew a kiss to the camera, before a telltale Durant twin food coma lapsed her to unconscious.

"Holy shit," Reagan said for the second time that day.

Ixchel sat back down, shutting off the camera. "You laugh, but Phoebe's bound to get a ton of hits on this video. That's some juicy cash. Even if Phoebe didn't complete the discount the online revenue will more than pay for this bill."

Reagan watched her twin snore. "Alright, guess I understand. But how the fuck are we going to get her home now?"

Ixchel paused. "Um, I guess we wait until she wakes up?"

"Fantastic," Reagan groaned, although she didn't feel like getting to her feet just yet either. "Although if we're here much longer I'm going to order the terimissu."
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: Part 2: Sister with the Moral(?) Support

choices: The rest of the house have an intervention for Phoebe...rather hypocritically
Through the rabbit hole, Phoebe indulges with other models
With Phoebe piling on the pounds, Audrey has to come clean about her absences
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
Reagan had managed to find peace with her weight and the situation revolving around it.
Sure, she was considerably larger than she imagined but she found a certain allure to her bulk, not to mention the freedom to indulge whenever she saw fit, as well as a new found connection with her twin born from their...odd...circumstances.

*****

“Sweet fucking Jesus” grinned Reagan in the bathroom with her reflection grinning back at her between the soap splatters adorning the mirror.

Heavily stepping off the bathroom scales, the mechanism releasing a metallic groan, Reagan couldn’t help but run the numbers in her mind in a constant loop as it dawned on her...
She’d lost 2lbs.

As inconsequential as the number may be, especially considering most of Reagan’s meals weighed in higher than that, the redhead was still knocked back by the fact that she had - somehow - managed to drop some weight for the first time since Phoebe had glutted herself senseless on ice cream after losing her job.

As on the nose as it was as her ass still shook under its own momentum from stepping off the scales, Reagan was beyond pleased with herself as she turned to embrace her day.

Even if that day held nothing for her that would likely continue her current weight loss.

*****

With lethargic, lumbering steps, Reagan made her way downstairs with her grin still firmly in place as she made her way to the townhouse living room to enjoy a day of relaxation and unadulterated Reagan time.

No boys, no chores, no Audrey to nag her because she was nowhere to be seen which seemed to happen more and more lately...

‘Today was Reagan’s day’ thought the redhead as she hip checked the door with a sizeable thrust, granting entry to the still draped room as she semi strode/waddled towards the couch imagining what she would do with her day.

*rustle rustle*

“What the fuck!?” outburst Reagan as she was wrenched from her own head at the sound coming from the larger of the two sofas.

“Urgh, what the?...” groaned a familiarly pathetic voice as more packaging was disturbed and a mess of red hair emerged from beneath a blanket.

‘What the fuck?’ questioned Reagan again, to herself this time, as she took in the absolute carnage surrounding her and consuming the living room in a surprisingly thick layer of discarded wrappers and boxes from more take outs than she cared to count.

“Urgh Reagan, is that you?” groaned Phoebe, groggily rising from her rudimentary nest.

“Course its me dummy” snapped the eldest twin as she sighed in disbelief at the mess before her “what the hell happened here?”

“Shhhhhhhh” hissed Phoebe with a vague attempt to hold a finger to her lips “I did a donation drive last night, let people buy me food and I live streamed eating it all”
As she finished a raw belch ballooned out of Phoebe’s mouth and blew a tuft of hair away from her face.

“A what now?” asked Reagan still bemused and fuming at the state of her crash pad for the day “you know what, I don’t wanna know, just clean it up ok?”

“Yeah sure” groaned Phoebe as she awkwardly sat up, yawning in the process.

As the youngster shuffled to escape her sleeping arrangement for the night, Reagan caught quite the eyeful of her twin.

Clearly still bloated from her obvious binge Phoebe was near spherical around her middle which, given she was the twin with the double belly, was a mighty indicator of just how much she’d stuffed into her mouth the night before.

Her Durant chest was fully fledged and then some as her suffering bra barely kept her decent, never mind fully contained by any stretch of the imagination and Reagan could only hope that her junior was wearing some kind of pants as they were far from visible between rolls of flab and their shared monumental rear.

“Oh shoot” cussed Phoebe as she glanced at her phone “I’m late for work”

“What?” spat Reagan, a little peeved as she foresaw where this was going.

“I’ve gotta go, Audrey will be so mad if I’m late” insisted Phoebe as she almost energetically brought herself to her feet with a great wobble through her entire body.

Before she could say anything, Reagan was left on her own as Phoebe heaved her bloated self out of the room and awkwardly up the stairs with the sound of panting accompanying each heavy foot step.

“Well that’s just perfect” sighed Reagan as she rolled her eyes before scooping an arms worth of empty food containers towards where Phoebe had been sat moments before “she can tidy this mess later then”

*****

“I’m telling you Um’s, she’s losing it” grunted Reagan through a mouthful of pizza sub.

“I mean, you did play quite the part in the insanity at one point Red” shot back Uma with a wry grin as a darting tongue licked her lips clean of marinara sauce.

“Fair point, but I’m a changed woman now, I’m down 2lbs today!”

“Oh totally, you’re practically wasting away” teased Uma as she swiped up another sub before biting hungrily into the cut end, causing melted cheese to billow out between the two pieces of bread.

Reagan could only throw Uma the middle finger as she was too busy with her own sandwich but the point was taken.
Uma shouldn’t have brought so many sandwiches home from work if THAT was how she felt.
Besides, the former athlete could hardly critique anybody’s weight these days whilst she lugged around her ‘six pack turned keg’ belly whilst holding the reputable title of most ill fitted member of staff at the sandwich shop she worked at.

*bang*

“Who’s that?” quizzed Reagan as she glanced into the hallway.

“Dunno” returned Uma with a shrug “Chel?!”

“Nope, me!” cheered Phoebe as she stood in the doorway looking a little flushed as she spoke.

“Oh hi Pheebs, thought you had work?” asked Uma whilst Reagan deliberately avoided the conversation.

“I did but I finished early” smiled Phoebe, a slightly laboured huff accompanying the sentence.

“You alright?” asked Uma with a fish hooked brow, well aware SOMETHING wasn’t right.

“Erm...well I’ve been off work for a couple hours so I went by the all you can eat Chinese buffet next to work and well...”

At that point Reagan looked at her twin and couldn’t help but groan at what she saw.

Phoebe’s rather rushed attempt at getting ready that morning had been rife with problems, amongst which was a lack of suitably fitting clothes so, in the spirit of improvisation, she had cobbled together a button up shirt which would not button, a plain white T-shirt underneath to maintain her decency that was compromised by her non-buttoning shirt and a black pleated skirt with an elasticated waist that just managed to stretch around her belly.

Now though, her poor skirt was trapped under her rounded belly, still pulled plenty tight by the immense shelf of ass behind her, whilst her shirt was gradually rising with each heavy breath the redhead drew.

“Oh Phoebe...” groaned Uma having actually put her sandwich down at this point.

“Hold that thought” interrupted Phoebe as she hurriedly fished her phone out of her bag and swiped away an unseen notification, her eyes glistening after reading it as she took to chewing her lips “I’m just gonna...get something to eat, cya!”

As Uma and Reagan looked dumb struck at each other the sound of Phoebe rifling through cupboards could be heard in the kitchen.

“She’s crazy man” Uma finally announced as she turned back into the room to see an exasperated Reagan.

Reagan meanwhile, had fished out her own phone and was scrolling to something, finding it a moment later and then passing the phone to Uma.

“What am I looking at here?” asked Uma, confusion written on her face as she looked over a kitchen that looked vaguely familiar.

“You’ll see” retorted Reagan as she wiggles back into her seat.

Almost on cue a very familiar shirt and skirt combo appeared next to the counter top the filming phone was sat on with trails of flaming red hair cascading past the shoulders.

“This isn’t...” started Uma.

“Yep” responded Reagan.

“But she’s...”

“Yep”

Bemused, Uma looked back at the live stream as she watched Phoebe’s face briefly appear in shot as she blew her signature kiss to her viewers before clumsily reaching into the overhead cupboards as her belly rolled onto the surface in front of her, free of her clothing as it pooled out on the cool surface like flesh coloured lava.

Phoebe playfully giggled as she loaded herself up with as many snacks as she could carry in the form of cookies and chips before grabbing her phone and taking it to the kitchen table.

“Ooph, I might have to do another food drive tonight coz I don’t think this is going to cut it” purred Phoebe, pawing at her belly as she set her latest binge down “we’ll just see though, I am a little pi...argh!”

With almost comedic execution, Phoebe disappeared out of shot completely with just the top of her head still visible.

“Jesus Christ” muttered Reagan as she watched the stream like a car crash as her twin vocalised her thoughts.

“Oops, guess my butt is just too big for these tiny kitchen chairs now” cooed Phoebe as she held her phone over her head, displaying not only her rolls layered up in her seated position but also the shattered pieces of broken chair protruding from under her ass.

Uma and Reagan could only stare at each other in disbelief at what they had seen.
How much carnage was Phoebe going to cause?!
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: We interrupt this home to bring you this broadcast

choices: Audrey hypocritically makes the household diet while not minding her own.
Reagan and Uma try going back to the gym to disastrous results.
Although her housemates watch Phoebe's weight, she has enablers across the city.
One of the ladies has her dark secret exposed to the rest.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
"You ok in there, Pheebs?" Uma asked, genuinely concerned and bewildered at being shown Phoebe's streaming habits. Grunting with some effort after a shared pizza & sub meal with Reagan, she rose to her feet.

"Oops, gotta sign off now," Phoebe said from the kitchen, echoed from Reagan's phone as the sounds of Uma's steps marked her crossing between the rooms of the narrow townhouse.

"Daym girl!" Uma exclaimed after seeing the site of Phoebe's destruction directly. The fatter of the twins was splayed on her back, broken pieces of the chair under her and the last tension in her clothes having given up the ghost. Having barely crammed herself into the clothes for work and having chinese buffet before hand, the last of her snacking and subsequent collapse had effectively destroyed them. The waistband of her skirt had snapped and buttons had cascaded off of her professional shirt.

"Hee hee," Phoebe laughed with a huff, far too mirthful over the situation. She brushed some of her red hair out of her face. "Could you lend me a hand, Uma?"

"Uh, sure," Uma obliged, stooping to offer an arm. The process of trying to lift the mammoth Durant twin to her feet strained muscles Uma hadn't worked in some time, the must heavy lifting she had done recently being mayo jars at the sandwich shop. "Dang frick!" Uma hollered. "Work...wit' me...Pheebs!"

Reagan, of course, hadn't bothered getting up to lend a finger to her twin's plight. She heard the minutes-long struggle of Uma trying to help Phoebe to an upright position through the lens of schedfrude. It was pathetic how her sister hadn't learned her limits by now.

As the two waddled into sight, Uma in her mildly distorted sandwich shop uniform strained to keep Phoebe moving. The 'baby' of the bunch was dressed in tatters now, her button-missing shirt swaying free from her crumb covered, sweat soaked white undershirt. The snapped skirt had been left in the kitchenette. Phoebe's oozing fatness from her hips, doubled belly and ginormous ass was clearly seen in her underwear also beginning to fray.

"Yeesh!" Reagan quipped through gritted teeth. Sure, they were all women here, and Phoebe was her biological twin, but for once Phoebe was pictured as to not be carrying her weight sexily.

"Let's get you clothed," Uma suggested, "and try to clean up before Audrey discovers this carnage," she added, leveraging a strong hint towards Reagan.

"Alright, fine," Reagan huffed, wiggling her own fatness to build the momentum to climb to her feet. That was when the doorbell rang.

"Can someone get that?" Reagan roared.

"What's going on?" Ixchel made an appearance at the top of the landing, quite late to the situation.

"Glad you can join us," Reagan snarked, still a bit suspect on Chel's enabling of Phoebe's renewed modeling career. "How about answering the door?" she asked over a repeat of the jingle.

"The way looks blocked," Ixchel said, not about to attempt to maneuver around Uma and Phoebe on the stairs even if she was smaller than both.

"Fine!" Another doorbell ring. "I'm coming!" Reagan grunted loudly, marching her way towards the front door as her hips and rear waddled aggressively.

Two strange young men were on the doorstep, visible through the thin window. Reagan opened the door with a gruff "Waddya want?"

The two lads were somewhere between high school and college age, younger than the twins. One was white and blond with a bit of a schlubby look and the other had light brown skin and curly dark hair. They both stared wide eyed at Reagan.

"Are you, Phoebe?" asked the blond guy.

"Dude," the dark-haired guy said. "She's not as big as Phoebe was last night. I think that's her twin."

"What are you fuckers on about?!" Reagan demanded, although she could put enough of the context clues together to tell these were fans of Phoebe.

"We're, um, Putz57 and X-Drango," the blond began before he was nudged by his buddy. "I'm Duncan, he's Marcus," Duncan corrected, "and we sent food on Phoebe's stream so we knew the address, so, could we...meet her?"

Reagan, who had never given up on seeing herself as dead to rights hot, could tell from the stuttering and weak-wiled delivery of the two that these were boys without the confidence to talk to a hot girl. Normally she'd be taking advantage of the situation for some screwing around, although both looked too young for her tastes. However, catching fanboy seconds from Phoebe's modeling didn't appeal to her in the slightest.

"Phoebe can't come to the door, so you can get out and catch her on the web."

"Dude!" Marcus said, looking up from his phone. "She was just live-streaming for like two minutes."

Duncan, still taken by the almost equally zaftig size of Phoebe's twin, asked "Are you on Gourmand-Size too, miss?"

Reagan slammed the door in both of their faces, not deeming them worthy of response and not needing to see Phoebe's antics again minutes after they happened.

"What's with the mess?" came the concerned and angered tones of the eldest Durant sister.

"Shit!" Reagan mouthed. Turning about-face (and her rear keep turning) she attempted to head off Audrey before she caught sight of the kitchenette. Audrey was coming up from the garage home from work with two bulky bags of takeout for dinner. Reagan had completely forgot to make Phoebe clean up her own mess from that morning's wrappers.

"Totally Phoebe's fault," Reagan said, before realizing the extent of wrappers everywhere. "That's my lunch, I only admit to this much," she hastily picked up her pizza leftovers.

"Phoebe was in sorry shape at work, it was so embarrassing!" Audrey said, "I swear we need to do something about that girl--WHO BROKE THE CHAIR??!"


To add insult to injury, after Audrey had discovered the destruction in the kitchen, Phoebe had to be rescued from her closet. The townhouse bedrooms had shallow closets owing to space limitations. Phoebe, having outgrown the upper echelons of +Size's higher clothing ranges, was searching for remaining suitable clothes she might have to wear. However, her meaty circumference from mighty ass, wide hips and bloated belly meant she had no good approachable angle to cross the small closet door. Trying to reach a hanger on the far side had left her wedged within, a single-woman stockage compared to when the twins had gotten caught in the bathroom door.

Thus, a hasty house meeting was assembled in Phoebe's room after the efforts it took to extract her from her closet. Each of the Fordham women barely had space to themselves to stand as Phoebe weighted down one side of her mattress.

"Phoebe, sweetheart," Audrey began after chewing. "You've been getting far too obsessed with food and its not healthy for work or home. I had to find excuses to stave off Ms. Parkins at work for your lateness and state of dress."

"I'm sorry, I was just up late and lost track of time." Phoebe said.

"Doing what?" Audrey asked.

"Um," Ixchel hastily slurped down some noodles. "She's been up late with me. Studying." She wasn't prepared to explain to Audrey just what kind of modeling Phoebe was doing online and why she was helping. Her cousin couldn't think of Phoebe as anything other than the baby of the bunch sometimes.

"Well, Phoebe, your ass was too fat to lift girl," Uma said between munching. "You're too fat for your britches that crushing chairs will be the least of your problems if you don't curb your eatin'."

"Yeah, jeez sis," Reagan snickered, loving the times Phoebe got in trouble, as she had found her twin's Snickers stash left out on a dresser.

Phoebe pouted, wearing only an ill-fitting teddy as she hadn't gotten some proper clothing. "What's wrong with being fat?" The way Phoebe saw it, her ass was as luscious as ever and she still had lots of friends and followers. And the eating was dang good!

"Nothing, honey, that's not what we're saying," Audrey said, "I'm happy you find yourself beautiful at a larger size but really, there is a thing as getting too fat."

"You're nearly as wide as your mattress!" Uma stated. "Seriously girl, lay off the food!"

Indeed, as Phoebe nursed the sore red welt on her chunky hip from where she had gotten stuck in her closet, said spread of her largest ASSet brought her flab dangerously close to the width of her bed. "That's not very fair," Phoebe pouted, "I'm not the only fat one here and you aren't letting me have any of the takeout!"

Those words brought a fallout of some self-realization among the other residents, who had been sharing Audrey's takeout during this impromptu intervention.

"Well, I didn't want it to get cold," Audrey explained.

"I mean, cousin," Chel said, "the twins may be big but you've been catching up behind them. Ever since you all went clubbing."

"Speak for yourself I'm down two pounds," Reagan bragged.

"Well, that's..." Audrey had her own secrets to hide, being experimental in her relationship with Natalie and coming to terms with her own desires of eating and gaining. She kept some restraint and decorum compared to Phoebe.

"You're one to talk, Chel," Uma started, "you're not much of a skinny minnie either."

"And you're not as fit," Chel replied factually.

"Maybe I have a couple too many subs after work," Uma muttered darkly.

"Point being," Audrey said, "maybe we all have some points to work on, or things around here will be tighter than ever." Especially as they had to enter Phoebe's room in single file.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: Tight Fits & Misfits

choices: Suspicious Reagan keep tabs on Audrey as she keeps getting softer
Phoebe backslides HARD
Darryl plays temptation to Reagan and Uma
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
“Ok, first things first” announced Audrey as she dumped a large cardboard box onto the kitchen table “contraband”

“I don’t want to go see a band Aud” moaned Phoebe with a sulk on her full face whilst she twirled a strand of hair between her fingers.

“No Phoebe” sighed Audrey “we’re all going to get rid of our stashes”

“What?!” cried Reagan in disgust “Phoebe breaks a chair and I have to get rid of all my food?!”

“We’ve all gotta do it Red” grunted Uma “if you haven’t noticed you’re hardly light weight these days”

Reagan recoiled slightly with an instinctive hand to her belly.
“I’ve lost 2lbs” muttered the smaller twin.

“Anyway” insisted Audrey with a hint of motherly tone in her voice “we’re all in this together and we’re all going to lose some weight together”

An awkward silence befell the group.
‘Weight loss’ had become something of an unspoken thing whilst needles on scales had gradually crept higher and, if nothing else, the exhibition of exposed pudginess and curves hardly screamed ‘healthy young women’.

*****

“This SUCKS!” grunted Reagan as she returned to the kitchen with her arms loaded with all manner of sweet and salty snacks.

“Yep” Uma grunted back “maybe you can lose another pound though”

“Oh shut up” spat Reagan as she watched Uma’s pendulous belly swing from one hip to the other with each heavy step “let me know when you can waddle more than 50 yards”

“Ha ha ha, point taken” smirked Uma as she deposited her stash of protein bars and ironic health snacks.

Reagan followed close behind and clumsily dumped her own food into the box.
“Hey, maybe we should get back into the gym if we’re taking this seriously?” suggested Reagan trying to ignore the warm flush colouring her cheeks and hint of sweat.

“In the nicest way Red, I don’t think you’ll fit on a treadmill at the moment” Uma stated.

Reagan laughed “yeah, you’re probably right”.
Feeling uncomfortable, the redhead rolled her shorts down allowing her belly to escape in a heavy downward bulge.
“You’d love these hips though” teased Reagan as she forcefully swung her engorged girth into Uma’s own side, knocking the former athlete off balance.

“Oh yeah, totally” mused Uma with an eye roll.

As the two girls chatted and teased each other, Ixchel silently slid in and placed half a dozen bottles of energy drinks into the contraband box.

“No food Chel?” asked Uma, folding her arms awkwardly over her spherical stomach.

“Nope” mused the resident nerd with a finger nudge to the glasses.

Reagan and Uma simply shrugged at each other as Chel buried herself in her phone, hoping this awkward situation would pass sooner rather than later.

As simmering chatter floated around the kitchen, laboured breathing began to grow louder in the hallway behind the gathered townhouse girls.

“Phew...I’m he...here” groaned Phoebe sounding fit to pass out as she waddled into the kitchen.

“You got everything?” asked Uma, opting to play mum in Audrey’s temporary absence.

“Yeah...” huffed Phoebe looking redder than her twin with arms so full she could barely see past the pile of food.

“And how much did you eat on the way down?” asked Uma again, a small smile spreading on her lips as she asked.

“Loads” admitted Phoebe as she poured her stockpile into the box, most of which fell onto the counter as it overflowed the container.

As she stepped away from the box and rested her gargantuan arse against a cupboard, Phoebe looked every pound of her vast bulk.
‘Jeez, that could have been me’ thought Reagan as she looked over her twins thick belly rolls and bulging rear.

“Ok ladies, hope you’re all done” cooed Audrey as she appeared with her own modest collection of sweet pastries collected from her car.

A chorus of agreement responded with hints of reluctance mixed in as Audrey piled her contraband up.

“This is a really good start, good job guys” enthused Audrey with a beaming smile as she looked over her fattened housemates “now just have to avoid temptation and no more food in bedrooms”

As Audrey stopped talking the sound of a doughnut bag rustling cut through the quiet kitchen causing everybody to look at Phoebe.

“Phoebe?!” shouted all but Audrey as the redhead began loading the jam filled pastries into her mouth.

“Wah?” grunted the twin through a full mouth.

“Come on sweetie, we’re in this together” smiled Audrey as she tried to take the bag from her youngest sister.

“I’m just so hungry” complained Phoebe as she clutched her belly, chubby fingers sinking into her pale flab.

“I know, I know” sympathised Audrey as a thought came to mind ”I’ve got to go somewhere, have a healthy dinner!”

As the blonde turned tail towards the garage with the contraband box in her arms, the remaining girls glanced at each other confused.
“We’re all thinking it, what the hell is a ‘healthy’ dinner right?” announced Reagan.

*****

“Urgh thanks for letting me come over” sighed Audrey as she strolled into Nat’s apartment, confiscated food still in her arms.

“Don’t mention it” replied Nat, a look of confusion washing over her face as she closed the door behind the blonde.

“Oh, we’re having a clear out of all the junk to try and shift a bit of collective weight at home” said Audrey in acknowledgment of the look Nat was giving her “Phoebe’s weight is getting out of control”

Nat knew all too well how Phoebe’s weight was going, that stream was everywhere she went these days.

“Anyway, I hoped I could dump this stuff here for you to get rid of”

“Oh yeah, I’m totally the shady ‘disposal girl’” smirked Nat, adjusting the strap of her vest top.

“I don’t mean it like that, just thought you might have a use for some of this stuff” smiled Audrey as she placed it on Nat’s marble breakfast bar.

“Oh really?” quizzed Nat with a warm spark bubbling inside her as she almost delicately trotted up behind Audrey and pinned her against the breakfast bar between her arms.
“I didn’t realise this was a pleasure trip too” cooed the confident woman as she bit her lip allowing her belly to gently grind against Audrey.

“No it’s not, I mean...” Audrey faltered as she turned between Nat’s arms to face her.

“Shhhh blondie, momma’s gonna take care of your little snack problem” cooed Nat as she reached around Audrey, producing a muffin to devour.

*****

“Ooph, no wonder Phoebe has been piling on the pounds” groaned Nat from her reclined position.

“I know...buurp” belched Audrey “I’m supposed to be on a diet you know”

Nat giggled, rolling onto her side.
“Well what they don’t know won’t hurt them” teased Nat with fingers delicately resting on her full belly “besides, I didn’t hear you complaining”

‘She’s not wrong...’ thought Audrey.

*****

“So how’s the townhouse diet going sugar?” asked Nat.

“Oh it’s going great, everybody has settled in to it nicely” smiled Audrey, delicately slicing a section of juicy steak from her dinner.

“I’m glad” smiled Nat “you girls have to stay healthy”

Audrey nodded as she chewed the delicate meat, mentally moaning in ecstasy at the flavour.
Nat was such an amazing cook and her stuff tasted even better since she’d started dieting with her house mates.

“You sure you aren’t just enjoying me being round most nights?” coyly probed Audrey between bites as she watched Nat enjoying her own meal.

“Well that is always a perk” smirked Nat, catching a stray juice line with her tongue.

Audrey blushed as she emptied her plate, placing hands on her sides.

“I hope you’re not too full hun” mused Nat as she stood up to collect Audrey’s plate with her own, bending to whisper in the blondes ear “there’s dessert tonight.

‘No wonder my shirt won’t button fully’ thought Audrey as she pawed at her partly exposed belly.

*****

“Y’know, this healthy eating isn’t so bad” smirked Reagan as she loaded her fork with an assortment of greens and grilled chicken.

“Told you it wouldn’t be so bad” smirked Uma as she nibbled at her own salad.

“Speak for yourself” complained Phoebe as she grumpily scratched at her now empty plate with her fork.

As the girls continued to chat the front door clicked open.

“That you Aud?” shouted Reagan.

“Yep! You had dinner yet?” the blonde called back.

“On it now” replied Uma as Reagan had resumed eating.

“Good coz I’ve got to go out tonight so I don’t want you guys waiting on me” purred Audrey as she came into the kitchen with a bounce in her step.

“Cool” murmured Phoebe, still sulking.

“Right, sorry to dash but I’ve got to go again, see you later!” chirped Audrey as she turned to leave again.

As the blonde disappeared down the hallway, Reagan followed her down with her eyes and the redhead couldn’t help but notice her sisters love handles escaping her shirt.

‘Hmmmm’ thought the redhead with a narrowed stare.

Come to think of it, Audrey was packing more junk in the trunk since this whole diet thing started too...

choices: Phoebe & Audrey's increased sizes don't go unnoticed.
