Chairs and buttons aren't the only things breaking at 8422 Fordham Ave.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
For a scant few weeks, it looked like the Fordham ladies had seen the error of their ways in terms of the weight piled on by their unbridled gluttony. Audrey had kept a stern eye on the household, confiscating any and all treats that weren't on the diet plan. Ixchel had been instructed to crunch the numbers along with her kale chips given her med-tech expertise. Uma had gotten some of her zeal for working out back and together with Reagan they were making baby steps in working out at home. The older Durant twin, glad to have not gotten to Phoebe's size, was looking to shed a bit of her gut while keeping her killer, inflated ass.

It was safe to say that just about everyone had lost a handful of pounds, barely perceptible size changes present among the household. Well, except for two that weren't losing weight.

Much as Audrey was running a tight ship, she spent just as much time as she spent at home out, often with Ixchel or Uma taking point of the diet efforts. Somehow she hadn't lost any weight yet, as she seemed to be getting bigger...

But as for the youngest resident, Phoebe was resistant to such changes in a bad sort of way.


"Chel! Chel! Please let me in," came a soft whimper at the door to Ixchel's office space.

The multiracial nerd sighed, her youngest cousin's pleadings over the last few days starting to wear her thin. Her patience, that is.

"Phoebe, go away. I can't make any exceptions for you."

"Chel, I'm so hungry, please! Even one of your kombucha drinks might stave off how famished I am."

Reluctantly, Ixchel opened the door. The problem with these forced diets was that Phoebe, the Durant sister under the most scrutiny, hadn't looked to have lost even a pound yet. Dressed in what passed for her loosest clothing (a generous term), the redhead looked bleary and her hair unkempt as she filled out some grey sweats. She hobbled inside, the spare space of Ixchel's office vanishing.

"Fine, I'll give you another bag of carrot sticks," Ixchel gave in, getting a second snack portion for her cousin who was poised to outgrow the two-seater Ixchel had as the other office furniture.

The food and drink were gone in a minute. "Is there any more, Chel?" Phoebe asked eagerly.

"You know we can't, Phoebe," Ixchel said conspiratorially. "Your weight gain, unchecked, brought Audrey that close to realizing what we were doing on the Gormand-Size site. I'm lucky I've managed to buy off Reagan's silence."

"This is horrible!" Phoebe moaned. "It's so mean, not letting me eat!" Her metabolism had long been broken to her caloric shift in lifestyle over the past year. All these healthy meals and restrictive snacks did nothing to quell Phoebe's appetite. Too obese for even simple exercise, despite Uma's best efforts, the pear-shaped twin hadn't lost as much as an ounce. Her ass and hips were as wide as ever, taxing the waistband of her clothes, and her stomach constantly rumbled.

Phoebe was a mess, becoming a skulking recluse ever since the diet plans were enacted. Under an equally tight eye at work, Phoebe had withdrawn from both her BBW modeling and her social media feeds, having practically dropped off the face of the earth when it came to her online life. For the bubbly Phoebe, who had tied her social worth to her gluttonous ways, she felt all alone.

Chel was torn. Much like Audrey's original intentions, she was concerned for her cousin's health and how the whole household had been tipping the scales to outrageous weights. Still, that time she had been helping set up Phoebe's Gormand-Size presence had been both lucrative and exciting. Days of being in a thankless programming job and now having to help enforce a shift in the roommates' lifestyle made her miss out on the risqué activity she had helped engage with Phoebe. But they had to remain quiet or else Audrey would find out.

Although seeing Phoebe sitting there depressed, staring off into space and massaging her saggy, empty belly tugged at Ixchel's heartstrings, as she wasn't as emotionless nor as prim-minded as the others of the household took her for.

"Alright," Ixchel said, digging out her keys. "If anyone asks where you've been, I've registered you for a weight loss trial with my company."

"Chel, how could you!" Phoebe gasped, feeling betrayed.

Gawd, Phoebe could be such a ditz. "That's what you're supposed to say, Phoebe, if anyone asks, because what I'm actually going to do is drive you to the studio because I know you've missed it so much."

Ixchel nearly found herself squashed by the tremendous poundage of her baby cousin pouncing on her for a bear hug.


The gorge began at the Gormand-Size studio in the city.

Utilizing space from an old factory building converted to commercial space, the pop-up BBW studio used the third floor for its shoots. Nothing elaborate, mainly against curtains or simple backdrops, although having access to an industrial shipping grade elevator and remodeled kitchen space was a plus.

Currently, a lot of burger deliveries were being accepted on the ground floor and run up to the third.

To be sat along a table as cameras were focused on the return of their recent starlet. Who had barely gotten a word in edgewise to thank her fans as she made up for lost time from her failed dieting with a massive burger binge.

"What a hell of a girl," the director said, as Phoebe's eating overtook double digit in patties. "How did you know her again?"

"We both went to college together," said Ryan, one of the assistants. A member of Phoebe's college clique along with Tiana, the two hadn't seen much of Phoebe in the direct aftermath of her embarrassment about losing her acting gig. And by strange serendipity the three were now involved with the fetish model site. Tiana, a voluptuous Latina hourglass, did makeup and had appeared in a few shoots of her own, yet Phoebe had eclipsed her in size. "I hadn't realized she would be into this stuff."

"Well, we can't loose out on her again, even if it'll break the food budget."


The gorge continued at a downtown dinner, much like sisterly work lunches that had once occurred but a different restaurant.

"I haven't been to one of these places in what feels like forever, thank you so much!"

Sitting opposite the gorging redhead were Duncan and Marcus, also known as Putz57 and X-Drango, two fans on hers who had kept track of her "well-being" as they put it since Reagan had slammed the door in their face. By chance, catching sight of Phoebe leaving the Gormand-Size studio had led to this impromptu diner meal.

"Really," said Duncan, overwhelmed at being this close to the enormity of his crush. He and Marcus felt like they had suddenly made it. If making it required trying to scramble enough hands-on cash to pay for Phoebe's bill and having to schooch the table closer to their side to make room for Phoebe's bulk on the other side of the booth.

"Ooh, are those banana chocolate chip pancakes?" Phoebe noticed on the menu. Duncan flagged down their server for an order.

"Dude," Marcus said, with the subtextual gestures of how strapped for cash they currently were.

"Come one, she's a hottie," Duncan protested.

"Mega hottie, yeah, but we have to call it quits."

"You both think I'm hot?" Phoebe asked, as the two sat straight at attention, "Aw, you're so sweet!"


And the gorge continued at a private residence.

"Mmmmmm, oooh," Phoebe yawned, mildly delirious. "That tasted so good. Reagan doesn't know what she's missing."

"I think she does," said Darryl, another enabler to the twins. "Not everyone goes for the salted carmel or blackberry cheesecakes but I think they add more flavor."

Having endorsed Reagan during her own sided rivalry and then catching them in post-clubbing escapades, Darryl had missed seeing the Durant twins in particular. Regan had her machinations for letting Darryl pamper her and abuse his pocketbook but Phoebe was genuinely thankful. It was funny how acerbic and abrasive Reagan was to how sweet and carefree Phoebe could be. Short of being identical, you'd never think they were twins. Well, identical didn't match up on their physiques nowadays...

Darryl thanked his good fortune for getting an unintended call from Phoebe's phone. Could you call it "butt dialing" if was made from a a roll of fat? Knowingly, Phoebe would pulverize her phone if she had sat on it.

Topped off with luxurious dessert, Phoebe was a totem of sheer gluttony at this point. Tight clothing discarded, her gelatinous ass and flared hips oozed out of her stretchy panties, dwarfed by a bloated, tremendous stomach that looked a tinge pink after all she had eaten that day. It nearly looked like she had gained ten pounds that day alone after weeks of fruitless dieting. Well, fruit had been on the accepted meal plan. With labored breathing the dome of Phoebe's engorged gut raised and lowered softly.

"Do yah think," Phoebe mused, nodding off towards sleep, "we could wake up to all that bacon like we used to...?"

"Sure thing, princess," Darryl got her a blanket. The best reason to cut out of work early he'd ever have.


Meanwhile, a different gorge continued.

"Waddya say we make a pizza fort out of all these spent boxes?" Nat said teasingly, holding a slice of sausage and cheese above Audrey's lips.

Pleasurable consumption was the only reply.

"I'd say I should get some more ordered," Nat cooed, rubbing Audrey's broad belly. The club owner looked chunkier these days but the majority of vittles during their trysts had gone to Audrey's increased poundage. "Four more and I get the freebee from the punchcard, how about that?"

A stifled belch.

"How could I say no to you?"

1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
“Wakey wakey sleepy head”

“Mhmph, not yet...” grunted Audrey as she awkwardly turned away from her increasingly less casual fling, burrowing her face into the pillows behind her.

Nat bit her lip as she checked out Audrey’s figure casting quite the silhouette through the bed sheets from the curvaceous Durant hip sticking up to the plush slope of growing belly bulging towards the edge of the bed.

“But darling” crooned Nat as she sidled herself behind Audrey into a spooning position “it’s breakfast time”

Audrey’s eyes flicked open at that.
The diet she’d imposed on herself, siblings and housemates was taking its toll on the poor blonde and she relished the thought of enjoying Nat’s scrumptious cooking away from prying eyes.
That said, the blonde Durant would probably have more standing to be pining for greasy breakfast foods if she was sticking to the diet she was forcing everyone else on.

Although Phoebe had been the prime instigator in the start of the house wide dieting, it was no mystery that all the girls were packing on the pounds.
Unlike the rest of her housemates though, Audrey’s reliance on escaping to Nat’s and her girlfriend/not girlfriend’s sympathetic doting was doing nothing for the blondes waistline.
Truthfully, Audrey was gaining weight hand over fist almost obliviously as she treated herself constantly whilst lost in her infatuation for Nat.

“Oh fine” relented Audrey with a casual scratch of her belly beneath the sheets “but it is my cheat day so you better make it worthwhile”

Nat practically leapt out of bed with a display of naked wobbly curves as she strutted towards the door where her silk dressing gown hung.
“Don’t I always?” teased Nat as she covered her tattooed shoulders with a wink.

*****

“How’s that darling?” cooed Nat over a mug of coffee, legs crossed beneath the dark wood table as she watched over Audrey who was savagely tearing into a mountain of breakfast food.

“This is amazing” managed the blonde between mouthfuls of bacon and sausage drenched in as much syrup as her pancakes.

“That’s my girl” purred Nat as she put down her mug and delicately sliced a segment from her own plate of pancakes before hungrily chewing.

Audrey blushed as she ate, Nat was a charmer with words as much as her food and it was exhilarating for the Durant senior.
She’d had boyfriends before who were sweet enough but Nat was a whole different level...

“Buuurp, ooph, pardon me” chuckled Audrey with a wry smile.

“Oh dear, you getting full sweetheart?” asked Nat with an upwards glance.

“Seems so but then...buurp...I have eaten a lot” groaned Audrey as she rubbed her full belly, it’s natural softness reduced from the sheer quantity of food crammed in.

“That’s a shame, you didn’t even get to try my muffins” sighed Nat with an all too practiced faux drama that always hooked Audrey back in no matter how full she was.
Once upon a time Nat had used such a move to push her food on unsuspecting individuals but with Audrey it bore no ill intention.

“You made muffins?” asked Audrey, interest piqued despite her fullness.

“Of course, you said it was your cheat day after all” purred Nat as she rose from her chair and tottered to the kitchen “can’t let me girl go without being spoiled now”

“You’re the best Nat, you know that?” fawned Audrey, watching as Nat came towards her with a plateful of still warm muffins.

“Well I do try” smiled Nat as she stood behind the blonde, peeling the wrapper from a chocolate muffin before reaching forward and wiped the fist sized cake in the syrup left on Audrey’s plate.

Audrey lent back in her chair which creaked slightly, resting her head against Nat’s stomach before instinctively open her mouth as the soaked muffin came towards her.

Audrey moaned as she tore a mouthful of warm cake away, her lips taking a coating of syrup in the process.

“Really?” smirked Nat as she stood ready to dutifully feed the growing girl before her “but I thought you were full?”

Audrey only closed her eyes as she inhaled another bite, tipping her head slightly further back against her lover’s body.

“Well, as long as you’re sure” smiled Nat as the first muffin was taken from her fingers allowing her to grab a second.

The moment of feeding which was not uncommon these days or necessarily exclusive to Nat feeding Audrey continued for several muffins before a sharp phone ring cut through the moment.

“Aww shit, I’ve got to get this” cussed Nat as she dumped the plate of muffins in front of Audrey who looked on hungrily if not reluctantly before taking off after her phone.

“What do you mean the order hasn’t arrived yet? We’ve got to...uh huh...but we’ve got...uh huh...oh fine, see you in 10”
As soon as the phone went down Nat came back with a gentle waddle in her hip swinging step.
“I’m really sorry hun but I’m gonna have to go to the club, stock’s gone out of whack and they’re having a meltdown without me” sighed Nat, this time more frustrated than anything “you gonna be ok until I get back?”

“Yeah yeah, I’ll be fine” smiled Audrey weakly as tiredness rolled over her.

“Good girl” smiled Nat, leaning in for a syrupy kiss “behave yourself”

*****

After Nat had taken off to handle the latest business crisis Audrey had admittedly taken a nap.
Not a long one but a much needed one after the great feast that had been breakfast.

Feeling much more ready for the day though, Audrey squeezed herself into a pair of jeggings and a baggy hoodie before depositing herself onto the sofa.

As she casually flicked through the tv channels it crossed her mind just how good things were with her and Nat and, despite being casual, they were going strong and feelings were very much involved.
Although nothing official had been said Audrey certainly felt like things were progressing and she felt compelled to do something to show Nat she was ready.
Then inspiration struck.

*****

This certainly was not Audrey’s kind of shop.
Packed away in a quiet corner of the mall was Knicker Knackers.
Darkly lit with a curtained door, Audrey had always avoided the place, in no small part due to the stories the twins had regaled in the past about its contents.
Audrey was on a mission though and it certainly did not involve any of the things dangling from the ceiling.

“Hey there sugar, what can we do for you today?” asked a skinny guy behind the counter with no name tag and an air of cockiness about him.

“I’m just looking for erm, something to wear tonight for my girlfriend to help spice things up a little” declared Audrey with surprising confidence.

“Awesome” nodded the skinny guy “lingerie is on the right there and plus size is towards the back”

“Excuse me?” shot Audrey with a motherly glare.

“Just trying to help coz the stuff at the front ain’t gonna fit you” retorted the clerk, clearly not his first time directing larger women to the right shelf.

The colours and shapes were mind boggling. Audrey had always been a simple girl in that respect but she really wanted to do something special for Nat.
After some time flicking through the various items one jumped out at Audrey.
Although the light was dim the ‘garment’ appeared to be purple and it was labelled as a babydoll which, by Audrey’s limited understanding, would suit her full middle figure with the flowing base and some matching panties.
It was even in her size.

Triumphantly Audrey quickly turned tail to the till and sat her items down to pay.

“Nice choice” remarked the clerk as he rang it through.
Audrey gave him a small smile.
“Not that it’s any of my business but try this as well”
As he spoke, the skinny guy scrawled a website on the bottom of Audrey’s receipt before handing it to her.

Audrey looked at it briefly before putting it in her purse and heading for the door.

“Thanks, I think”

The clerk simply smiled as Audrey walked away, the website Gourmand-Size now flashing through her mind.

*****

“I am so sorry babe” cried out Nat as she slammed her apartment door shut “but I’m here now and we can still make something of the...did you order pizza without me?”

The smell was strong and Nat hypnotically wandered after it into the living room where Audrey was lay surrounded by fresh pizza boxes wearing her new outfit.

“Well this is a surprise” purred Nat, lingering on the blonde’s belly bulging in her lap and against the sheer purple material.

“You like it?” smiled Audrey with a little shoulder shimmy.

“Oh I do” grinned Nat as she slid up alongside Audrey, placing a hand on the blonde’s thigh as she lent in for a kiss.

“Good” purred Audrey as she turned into Nat, blindly pressing play on the tv to start the video she had preloaded from the website she had been given.

“Wow, a little background entertainment too?” asked Nat between kisses.

“Just some atmosphere” returned Audrey as she gently caressed Nat’s neck as the sound began to kick in.

“You are quite the minx Audrey Durant” cooed Nat “I hope you have a plan”
But before Audrey could explain a VERY familiar voice cut her off.

“What the?” questioned Audrey as she looked to the tv where the voice had come from and found herself mortified as she was met with the sight of her youngest sister bursting out of a school girl uniform, gorging on cake with her belly resting on a worktop.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: If you can’t handle the heat...

choices: Phoebe and Chel just manage to hide what they were up to downstairs.

1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
"...and it's not a birthday for the birthday girl without presents..." came the coy, playful tones of Phoebe on Nat's smart TV between mouthfuls of cake. Phoebe's 'character' in this video complained about having to go school on her special day and having all the other students make fun of her for being so fat. A thin veneer of narrative to explain the balloons and party decor behind Phoebe as she moved onto opening her first present, demolished cake left to her side. Yet not enough to explain why this party was occurring 'at' a school setting, with Phoebe crammed into a folding desk.

"...a whole case of tropical pudding pops! My favorite~!" Phoebe licked her lips as she massaged the belly bursting out over the taxed schoolgirl skirt. She opened a cup of lemon-orange zest and dug in with her messy cake fingers, bringing more food to her lips.

"That, she, uhhh..." Nat was at a lost for words. She was no stranger to following Phoebe's rise to stardom on the BBW model site, a part of her kept a soft spot for her original 'manager's favorite' before getting physically intimate with Audrey. But having your lover's kid sister's fetish video on in the background was a definite mood killer for obvious reasons. Especially one that had not known prior to that exact moment what her sister had been up to, as Nat could tell splitting her eyes between Phoebe's video performance and Audrey's gobsmacked, frozen look of absolute mortification.

From Audrey's perspective, she was unable to process what exactly she was seeing. She could recall the events of the day, becoming more embolden during her time with Nat, wanting a way to heighten that spice in the bedroom. She couldn't remember the last time she had ventured into a store for sexy lingerie, certainly not when she was this big. Before Nat's arrival back to her flat Audrey had taken a cursory examination of the Gorman-Size site the Knicker Knackers clerk had given her. Previously, Audrey would have been confused and unsure about such an niche adult site, although the layout did have an air of class about it. Most candids of the models were tasteful, less provocatively clothed, with videos adorned with title cards with only the descriptions to suggest the contents. Minutes ago, browsing the free videos page, Audrey had thought nothing of the innocuously titled 'Party Gal' with a picture of a cupcake. It being one of the highest rated videos seemed like a plus.

Now, she was horrified.

"Phoebe! She...how...why??" Audrey could not put words together either. That was her little sister! The youngest of the twins, the one Audrey always considered to be too naive and precious for her own good. She knew the twins' were scantily driven given their attention grabbing booties and maybe, in some strange yet no less mollifying way should could have accepted Reagan staring in such a video, but not PHOEBE!! Did she even know what she was doing? Who in full honestly could have supported her on this?! She's was supposed to be on a diet and she sure as well wasn't! That Phoebe was just smaller than she currently was told Audrey this was a recently shot video and the release date confirmed it.

"Has she been doing this THIS WHOLE time?!" Audrey cried. "Is that what they do when I'm not there?"

"Now, let's not judge too hastily," Nat suggested, biting her tongue. Gosh, she had never imagined trying to talk Audrey down about this subject. Audrey being forward with loading a Gormand-Size video was a pleasant surprise when she got home, but she had failed to remember the big conflict of interest that would arise form Audrey discovering the site.

"I have to go," Audrey quickly stood to get her things. The leaden weight in her stomach was not from food binge foreplay this time, her mind flooded with confused emotions.

"Um, Aud, you might want to cover up..." Be its very definition, the babydoll lingerie left far too much skin on display. Audrey hastily clothed herself, her stomach bulge still not fully covered by the time she went out the door with a heavy slam.

"Hooooooooo..." Nat sighed, not wanting to be there for that confrontation.


"The coast is clear," Ixchel said. She and Phoebe had the townhouse to themselves. Audrey had been spending plenty of time away from home and both Uma and Reagan had gotten into a habit of going to the gym again. Or so they claimed, although the evidence pointed to yes with them returning sweaty and collapsing in the living room the moment they stepped in the door twice this last week. Now, the schedules had overlapped leaving a window where the two remaining residents were free.

"Thanks again Chel, this is going to be amazing!" Phoebe was not as much of a ditz as she let on. Okay, only by so much, but she was aware of what Gormand-Size was really about. Sex sells, after all, and some of the models got up to pretty risqué material in their videos. Phoebe had mainly done eating video content and pics up until her forced hiatus but now that she was working for the sight on the down low again, she really wanted to give her fans a show.

The pair were set up in a corner of the den, Ixchel on camera work and Phoebe lounging on the sofa in her pyjammas. An older set, having shown signs of strain, with the obvious indications under the material that Phoebe wasn't wearing any kind of underwear.

"Hey guys," Phoebe blew a kiss, having teased her hair and gone for sultry look with her eyeshadow. She took a drink of the milkshake Ixchel had gotten her from a fast food joint around the corner, a fast food bag part of the other items needed for the video on the side table. "This video is going to be different from my usual content. I wanted to give you all the opportunity to know me even more. Which is why I'm not at the studio, this is more like my everyday life."

A quick pan across the squat basement. "People ask me if I mind being fat. I don't mind but there's some obvious challenges. Space gets kinda tight here. And I can't go long before nothing fits anymore..." She inhaled deeply, her top constricting around her breasts as the camera took an overhead view, catching the width of Phoebe's body as her great stomach stuck out under her chest atop her flared, flabby hips filling out couch space.

"I never had much of a chest before," Phoebe said, trying to work her buttons but needing to look down to catch each fastener on her top. "But now I don't know what to do with these new girls."

Phoebe's full, flabby breasts plopped down over her stomach. She breathed a sigh of relief at airing them out, working her bare arms out of the shirt. "All that food, all those stuffing challenges," she rubbed across her chest, "so much of me is filling out. And most of it goes down here."

She grunted, working up momentum to stand. The camera panned back as Phoebe stood, fingers slipping to the taunt waist of her jammie pants. She turned, pulling down the pants in a tantalizing fashion, her meaty, gigantic ass filling out the frame. It's a good thing Ixchel had moved the coffee table or she would have tripped needing to back up enough to keep Phoebe's lower half in the lens.

Phoebe twisted a little bit, letting her great big ass wobble, fat flopping too and fro rhythmically.

"*whew*" she sighed, lowering herself back onto the couch with a plop. Another long sip of her milkshake followed by a bite of her roast beef sandwich. "I don't go up or down stairs that fast anymore. And I got stuck in my closet once, can you believe that?" Her hand strayed around the drive-thru bags on the stand. "It's kinda getting hard to find pleasure time for myself..." A toy borrowed from Reagan. A click. A strong, pulsating buzz.

Before the redhead had chance to respond the front door flew open again with the familiar laboured pants of Reagan and Uma crawling into the townhouse.
“Jeez it’s...quiet in here...” grunted Reagan audibly upstairs.

“Well at least I’m not having sex with Nat!” hurled Phoebe with an unexpected load of venom from the townhouse ditz.

Audrey froze.
How did Phoebe know she’d been sneaking off to Nat’s and the more intimate details that went with those sneakings.

“No Phoebe, you’re not stupid...” whispered Audrey, her anger completely diffused at the unexpected reveal into her personal life.

“Shit, go go go!” came the panicked hush tones of Reagan from upstairs with pounding footsteps running from the kitchen and ending as the front door slammed again.
A muffled complaint from Uma was also heard from upstairs but no more footfalls.

“She...what?” exclaimed Audrey now completely lost and confused with her own emotions.

“You’ve been sleeping with Nat” repeated Phoebe.

Audrey sighed seeing no use in denying it any longer.
“Yes, me and Nat have been seeing each other for a while now”

“Ha, so I’m not that bad” crooned Phoebe.

“Pheebs, don’t...” tried Ixchel, but the damage was already done.

“Excuse me? Me having a girlfriend is NOT as bad as you filming porn videos in OUR HOUSE” shouted Audrey.

“It’s not porn!”

“Well it sure looked like it with your skimpy school girl outfit and all that went with that” urged Audrey, arms flailing at this point.

“Wait, you...watched my videos?” asked Phoebe, looking a little thrown.

“No, just...well one accidentally when me and...” Audrey faltered as she played the situation back in her mind but Phoebe was already ahead of her.

“That’s just weird Audrey...I’ve got to go”
As the youngest Durant pushed past her sister to escape the basement, Audrey looked exasperated at Ixchel.

“She is being safe you know?” insisted the plump multiracial cousin.

“Just don’t, we will be talking later” sighed Audrey as she trudged up the stairs.

*****

Phoebe was upset.
She had enjoyed her time flaunting her growing body and growing her body for that matter but knowing that Audrey had actually watched some of her videos and with Nat made the junior twin feel very uncomfortable.
Not uncomfortable enough to not drown her feelings in fan-bought cheesecake she had hidden in the concealed fridge in her room but uncomfortable all the same.

*knock knock knock*

“Who is it?” called out Phoebe after a heavy swallow

A brief pause followed but an answer hesitantly came shortly after.
“It’s...Audrey”

“Go away Audrey” grunted Phoebe as she continued to shovel cheesecake into her mouth.

“Please Phoebe, I just want to talk”

Phoebe fell silent this time, partly from eating, caught on whether to talk to her sister or not.
The choice was taken from her though as Audrey tentatively cracked the door open and slid into the redhead’s room.

“I said go away” grunted Phoebe again, awkwardly turning her great hips away from her sister and placing the relative remains of cheesecake down so she could aggressively stab into it from her reclined side.

“I’m...sorry Phoebe”

“I don’t...wait what?”

“I’m sorry for going off at you like that especially when I’ve been keeping secrets from you all too” sighed Audrey, taking a seat on the corner of Phoebe’s bed.
Phoebe looked a little dumbfounded at this revelation.
Audrey had never apologised to her over something like that before and it was strange to see her older sister be so humble.

“Sometimes it’s difficult remember that you’re not my little little sister anymore and, honestly, I was angry out of concern for you” continued Audrey as a tear rolled down her chubby cheek.

“I am staying safe Audrey” replied Phoebe, opting to sit up against the headboard.

“I know, Ixchel mentioned that after you left” sighed Audrey, scooching a little further onto the bed.

“Yeah, me too” admitted Phoebe as she waved her phone in the air indicating Ixchel had texted her.

The sisters sat in silence, Phoebe occasionally chipping away at her cheesecake before finally breaking the silence.

“Soo you and Nat are, like, a couple now?” asked Phoebe, curiosity getting the better of her.

“Well we’re working things out, it’s all a little complicated” answered Audrey honestly.
‘Even more complicated now...’ thought the blonde.

Phoebe nodded understandingly as she polished off her dessert.
“You want something to eat?” offered the redhead.

That caught Audrey off guard, was Phoebe really taking this so well after storming off and refusing to talk at first?
“Sure, haven’t eaten for hours”

Phoebe wiggles herself to the edge of the bed and opened a low level cupboard, revealing her own personal stash of food as well as vast thighs and the full expanse of her trademark rear been thrust into the air.

‘Makes sense why Phoebe is still piling on the pounds at least’ thought Audrey, trying not to stare at her sisters cellulite dappled thighs wobbling with each minor movement whilst conveniently glossing over her own accumulated extra poundage.

“Doughnuts work for you?” asked Phoebe with a glance over a strap bitten shoulder.

“Sure” mused Audrey.

Phoebe grabbed a dozen doughnuts she had stashed away and laboriously crawled over the bed and heavily dumped her ass next to Audrey, offering the first pastry to her sister.

“Thanks” replied Audrey with a feint smile

Phoebe returned the smile before biting into her own doughnut, coating her lips and cheeks in sugar.
An uneasy quiet settled over the sisters as they snacked on doughnuts neither was meant to have whilst silent contemplation over the past few hours sunk in for both girls.

“Come on, sit down, I don’t bite” smirked Phoebe feeling a little fame rush herself.

“What really?”

“For sure, just tell me your name”

“Rose” announced the girl with an excitable squeal as she almost threw herself into the seat opposite.
Phoebe meanwhile, called over a waitress and placed herself another order.

*****

“I don’t know what it was but you just...unlocked something in me and well, here we are” said Rose after a lengthy conversation exchange between herself and Phoebe who was decidedly less committed as she made her way through her second breakfast that morning.

“Well it’s always nice to meet a fan” replied Phoebe between mouthfuls of food, gluttonous as ever even with company.

“I’m so sorry about earlier too...so embarrassing...I just get excited at the best of times and well, this was a surprise” admitted Rose with a namesake blush.

“Trust me, I’ve had worse” confessed Phoebe thinking back to the shockingly large number of individuals who had approached her in a far less dignified way than Rose before her, absently rubbing her belly with one hand with the food coming thick and fast with the other.

“Oh I bet” responded Rose, distracted again by the show “I think you’ll win by the way”

“Huh?” grunted Phoebe rather unladylike.

“You and Tiana’s weight gain challenge, I think you’ll win” Rose reiterated.

“Oh thanks, me too” responded Phoebe plainly.

“Like you always eat way more in your videos at least, there is no way she can stay ahead” continued Rose, seeming to get a little dreamy as the sentence emerged “if you want any help I’d totally be up for that, I can bake if that’d be cool with you”

Before Phoebe could respond, her phone pinged.
Darryl.
‘You still coming tonight?’
Phoebe had completely forgotten about their meet up tonight.
‘Defo, looking forward to it xxx’
She barely had chance to put the phone down before getting a response,
‘Me too, eat well’
Phoebe smiled to herself as Rose looked on.

“Anything interesting?” asked the multicoloured admirer.

“Oh just a thing tonight” replied Phoebe “hey, you wanna come?”

“Really? Yes please!”

*****

‘Tonight’ was 8 hours later so naturally, with Rose happily in tow, Phoebe spent that time wisely binging as hard as she could.
No surprises of course when exiting the taxi she and Rose had taken to Darryl’s was quite the chore.
Nevertheless, the redhead managed to escape and waddle her merry way to the door and awaited Darryl to let them in.

“Wow, you know someone who lives here?” asked Rose in awe as she looked over the vast frontage of Darryl’s house.

“Oh yeah, he’s so sweet and always gets me food” purred Phoebe.

The phrasing certainly had Rose imagining a VERY different kind of person than what opened the door.

“Evening Miss Durant, you look positively famished” welcomed Darryl without breaking his facial expression once.

“Oh yes, staaaarving” Phoebe played along with less composure.

“You best come in then and the beautiful girl behind you” Darryl announced as he ushered the pair in, giving a small bow to Rose and a wink.

“Rose” blushed Rose as she passed Darryl, following Phoebe’s bulging figure through the house.

“You remember what we said for tonight Pheebs?” asked Darryl as he strode past the pair, taking the lead in a different direction from Phoebe’s usual.

“Something about a funnel?” asked Phoebe, not entirely sure on what that had to do with food whilst Rose nearly collapsed having done much more internet searching than Phoebe clearly had.

“That’s the one, easiest calories you’ll ever eat girl”

“So where are we going?” asked Phoebe

“To get comfortable” replied Darryl as he pushed open a door into a plain room with the most inviting arm chair Phoebe had ever seen.
Darryl simply nodded as Phoebe took steps towards the chair and placed herself in the chair which she now noticed was wider than any she had sat in before.
Novel for a chair with arms, her hips didn’t even touch the sides.

“Now this is really simple Phoebe, you just have to open your mouth and stick this pipe between your lips” explained Darryl as he sauntered over with said pipe, a funnel attached to the other side.

“Ok” said Phoebe hesitantly as she opened her mouth to receive the pipe.

“And now with this” he said, producing a pitcher of sweet smelling thick liquid “you will consume about 10,000 calories in 10 minutes or so”

Phoebe’s eyes grew wide as a smile curled around the pipe.

“Ready?” asked Darryl, pitcher at the ready.

Phoebe nodded, anticipation making her grip the arms of her chair as Darryl began to pour with Rose looking on in awe.

*****

As promised, 10 minutes passed and Phoebe had chugged the whole pitcher.
Although used to alcoholic drinks in such quantities this stuff was completely different in thickness and how much it filled her.
Before all eyes in the room Phoebe’s belly had swelled outwards to its now comically round state and she was gulping for air between dense sugary burps.

“Keep drinking like that and you’ll be outweighing Tiana in no time” cooed Darryl as he gently rubbed Phoebe’s taut belly, causing the redhead to moan and belch at the same time.
“Although, you might be worth suggesting the two of you do this together some time” winked Darryl as he backed off, leaving Phoebe to her calorie addled state.

Rose meanwhile could barely pull her eyes away as she looked over her favourite model stuffed to the gills.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: Solo adventures of a fat girl

choices: Phoebe gets herself stuck in the tub.
It isn't long before stairs are soon out of the question.
Being too fat to go out makes Phoebe's social scene just as awkward.
With all five collectively beyond a ton, it's not just Phoebe finding issues.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
The redheaded twin's expansive appetite surged even further as Phoebe was encouraged to gain weight for the Gormand-Size challenge with Tiana. She was already becoming a mindless eating machine before the fallout with the thrice embarrassing method Audrey had discovered her BBW modeling and being off her diet, so restrictions from home had dried up as the other Fordham 8422 residents largely gave up on trying to mind Phoebe's weight.

Over the next few months Phoebe was getting various sponsorships from her local fans. Nat gave her a free pass at the club the days Phoebe had the energy to stay out late, although the manager didn't make too many appearances given the conflict of being intimate with Audrey. Combined with serious gaining regimens at Darryl's, ramshackle bids from her online subs such as Putz57 and X-Drango, and Rose fawning over Phoebe's needs whenever she was out, the weight was piling on.

Although the social restrictions at home had shriveled up, the physical restrictions remained unchanged. Halfway through the challenge, solidly into autumn at the end of September, Phoebe was on the wrong end of the 360s. Having a weight on par with a calendar year of days, Phoebe was a mammoth of gluttony with her rounded poundage. Her legs were two large pillars of fat, widening to her broad hips and ginormous backside, rolls upon rolls of flabby cellulite that covered her private parts. Added to her huge, stretch mark covered stomach and flabby breasts, Phoebe's girth was an unbelievable sight. Although her half nakedness in the privacy of the townhouse was becoming too frequent of an occurrence to her family's liking. For the girl whose weight had skyrocketed past the typical wardrobe concerns to brushing up against the confines of the house, there was of course little that could cover her full, jiggly rump as it shimmied as Phoebe grunted her way around the townhouse.

"Oh geez, Phebes!" Uma, having turned from the back storage after being pressed into a grocery run, had to turn back because there would be no chance in trying to pass Phoebe in the hall. Be it hip or belly first, the pear-shaped redhead had far too much radius in her circumference to allow anybody to pass. Well, especially for her weighty housemates, as while a subtle shift in weights had occurred in the intervening time everyone else was still undeniably fat.

"Ooh, are those cheesy puffs?" Phoebe's eyes lit up, noticing the bulk snack jar Uma had hoped to save for herself.

"Sure, have at Phoebe," Uma sighed, knowing it was the quickest way to have the youngest housemate vacate the premisses so she could pass. Having her sandwich shop job and semi-regular workouts with Reagan had kept both of them closer to the high 200s, now possibly the "lightweights" of the group as Ixchel's increased proximity to Phoebe's eating habits had her catching up towards Audrey and Phoebe in the post-300 club.

Uma watched with mild concern as Phoebe almost wedged herself in the storeroom door to receive the cheesy puffs. With only a pink shirt keeping her upper third covered, Phoebe was a doughy ball of lard where it was difficult to determine if she was wearing bottoms depending on her profile.

"Nope, nope, not today," Uma quickly averted her gaze as Phoebe turned, backside crack on full display as it was revealed that she had no underpants or even leggings. Phoebe's apathy at keeping clothed at home was the more troubling aspect for Uma, second only to her enormity that threatened to plug up the house.


"Oh, you've got to be freaking kidding me sis!" Reagan huffed with her hands on substantial hips. Starting to thin out some in the middle, Reagan had lost some but overall not that much weight given the breadth of her juicy, flabby butt and fleshy body. There was now a significant difference in her and Phoebe's girths, as her junior twin was several tens of pounds her senior, having apparently outgrown the shower.

"Just give me...erggh, a push Reagan. Pretty please." Phoebe was stuck fast into the sliding glass door of the shower, incompatible with the set opening allowed to enter the shower cavity.

Gawd, Phoebe had soured hanging out with Darryl and now Ragan couldn't escape her at home! After some serious soul searching a few months back, Reagan had curbed her tendency to gain weight so as to not become as pathetic as Phoebe. And she was glad she had. The largest ass in the world was not worth being unable to enter a standing shower! A slave to fighting her hunger and staving off immobility, Reagan was extra cranky in matters to how her fat twin was a dark reflection of where she might have ended up.

"Ya know," Reagan sighed, in disbelief over being the more rational twin, "even if we squeeze you in there, how are you going to get out?"

"Won't I be all sudsy and slick after a wash?" Phoebe replied.

"Hard pass," Reagan said, figuring Phoebe would barely be able to turn around in the shower let alone properly bathe. It was bad enough most of her mornings were spent fishing Phoebe's limited clothing options out of her narrow closet, as she had since swelled from the threshold of being unable to fit in her closet. Similarly Phoebe had outgrown her bed, the queen sized twin having serious overhang on what had been an undersized Queen bed.

And don't even start Reagan on the results of the twins' birthday; long before their chunky years the two brats had been adamant on having their own cakes apiece. With each of them past a quarter-ton, that affair now morphed into full sheet Baskin Robbins ice cream cakes. And yeah, Reagan had gorged on half of hers in one sitting, once she bothered to share with friends, but Phoebe had gone full human vacuum and face-dived into her cake until not a crumb, cream, or lick of frosting was left from the nearly 6lb calorie bombshell.

Shuddering from the thought, as a similar mess today had brought Phoebe to need an urgent shower, Reagan backed up out of the bathroom despite her sister's cries. "Wait, don't leave me like this!" Phoebe pleaded to her heartless twin. "Reagan!"


"She seriously makes that much?" Audrey asked, amazed when Ixchel told her the amount.

The two cousins had taken the lion's share of an asian takeout order to the den in continued talks in what could humorlessly be described as the "Durant Civil War Accords" as uneasy peace was soon reached in the household.

Audrey, bloated from an extended weekend at Nat's, was quite outsized in the chest and huge belly from fashionable clothes she just managed to still squeeze into. That didn't stop her from putting away most of the savory lo mein dish as Chel informed her of the monetized perks of Phoebe's alternative modeling.

"And there's lucrative financial gains from this stint," Chel said, the brown skinned, moon-faced counterpart to Audrey's own girth as her body had been plumping from increased calories as well. Entering the middle of the runnings, Ixchel was nearing Audrey's size in terms of chest and stomach, although she tended to carry more weight in her arms and extremities. Having her figure balloon slightly from her involvement in recent events, Ixchel had been encouraged to try the other side of the camera but she didn't have the personality or confidence to want to attempt. It was bad enough holding down her main job and trying to mend fences about the townhouse. Frequent dinnertime talks with Audrey had led to this poundage, given the avoidance that now took place between Audrey and Phoebe.

It had gotten to the point where the two most responsible flatmates had reached common ground. Extending to and including sharing of clothes such as the hand-me-down business dress Chel had inherited from Audrey, as their physiques were becoming more similar then the disparity of the blonde and her twin younger sisters.

"I guess if it supports her," Audrey said, trying to be accommodating but still singed from the method of discovering how her sister had been involved as an online cam girl and fetish artist. The past year and some months had brought a lot of changes, such as her relationship with Nat and the extent of what was going on behind the prior twin rivalry. Audrey supposed she had to be supportive, although the thought of it still left her overfed stomach in metaphorical knots.

And then the stairs made the telltale creak of a elephantine woman making her way down the steps. "Ooh, is there any kung pao chicken left?"

Audrey grimaced. At least Phoebe had gotten herself cleaned and dressed today, better than other days. Some overtaxed, yellow and blue swirl leggings just managed to fit over Phoebe's gigantic thighs, although that left plenty of belly roll on display. Changed into a teal shirt, Phoebe looked ready to explode out of her clothes given the added weight she had been pilling on.

Weight had become a taboo subject around Audrey and Phoebe when both were together, even as both continued to tip the scales, given the shame of how it tied to the exposure of their secret lives. At Ixchel's signal Audrey tried to put on an encouraging smile. "Sure! Good to see you dressed, hon. Got anything special planned today?"

Phoebe took laborious steps, backside quaking as she lined up her position to get some food. Oblivious to the question, Phoebe piled high her plate and made her way towards the sofa, given that Audrey and Chel filled the other chairs.

Ixchel realized the danger before it was too late. "Phoebe, maybe don't sit on the old couch-" THUMP! Having pushed the limits of how much the old sofa could take for the past few weeks, the furniture imploded under Phoebe's mass as she sat down hard. Startled, Phoebe found herself trapped in the pit of a worn frame and broken springs, pinned by her bulk.

Audrey kept her smile plastered, trying to tell herself things were still okay. That didn't stop the next inevitable obstacle from happening...
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: 3 Months In: Quaking Homewrecker

choices: Getting too big for the townhouse, Phoebe moves in with a friend
Audrey IS mad but finds solace in Nat
Reagan allows herself some treats now her diet is working out
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.content:
The townhouse was silent in what was now considered the early hours for its residents.
8am and not a single Durant girl or friend of Durant could be seen until...
*CREEEAK*

Reagan’s room door slowly opened allowing a crack of light into the hallway, soon to be blocked out by Reagan herself.
Lumbering as it was, Reagan made her way from her room across the hallway and quietly opened the bathroom door so as not to alert the rest of the house as she had done in multiple occasions before now.

It had become a strange tradition for the eldest twin but one she conducted all the same and, as she silently dragged out the house scales and placed them in front of the sink, the redhead took a deep breath.
Firmly stamping on the glass and waiting patiently for the beeps of liveliness, Reagan took a familiar step forward with the momentary shock of both feet standing on the cold glass.

“Here goes Reagan, let’s see what the damage is” Reagan whispered to herself as the scales processed, her fists clenching from nerves before finally...
“Yes!...” hissed Reagan under her breath as she got that, what felt like, long awaited answer.

269.8lbs

“Finally back under 270” chirped Reagan to herself with a big smile to herself.
Sure, 270 was hardly lightweight and still nearly twice her starting weight but the main thing for Reagan was it was going down again.
Taking a moment to look herself over in the mirror Reagan did have to admit she liked what she saw as an albeit thick but once again noticeable waist had made its appearance on her figure.
Said waist was buried between love handles rivalling her ass and her still enjoyably large Durant chest but she could live with the curves, especially with the responses she still got from enough guys.

Finished with her sneaky bathroom visit, Reagan returned the scales and made her escape with an almost skip in her step which caused a sizeable jiggle through her still zaftig figure.
Softly padding down the hallway intending on returning to her room for some more sleep, Reagan suddenly felt hungry.
On one hand it seemed slightly counterintuitive given her weight related victory BUUUUT...
“Fuck it, momma needs some scran” decided Reagan with a wicked smile, turning round with a wobble and made for the top of the stairs.

If only the stairs were usable even at this early hour.

“Phoebe?!” screeched Reagan seeing her twin at the bottom of the stairs, her great expanded hips wedged in the narrow stairway of the townhouse.

“Oh hey Reagan” smiled Phoebe, obnoxiously calling to her sister as if she wasn’t stuck in a compromising position that was drastically irregular if not borderline predictable for the townhouse as of late.

Whilst Reagan was slowly losing weight Phoebe was the complete opposite and, with 100lbs dividing the twins now, they were becoming less and less similar.

“Phoebe, why are you...how are you stuck on the stairs?!” hissed Reagan, still trying to remain quiet whilst the rest of the house slept assuming there were no other relatives trapped by their own girth in compromising places.

“Oh yeah, funny story!” beamed Phoebe “I’ve been SOOO hungry on a night so I’ve been setting an alarm for some midnight snacking and well...”
The redhead shrugged innocently causing her vast round belly to lift slightly, her love handles managing to squeeze over the banisters just a little more in the process.

“And well what?” pried Reagan as she slowly walked part way down the stairs, her belly rolls jiggling with each step as she drew closer to her twin.

“Well some of my sponsors have noticed from my live streams so it got to like 1am and pizza arrived at the door” Phoebe announced “it was so good Rae! We should go to this place together some time”

“Uh huh” grunted Reagan as she looked over the situation.

“Anyway, the food just kept coming and, well, I’m kinda full now” laughed Phoebe as she rubbed her stuffed belly.

Reagan was dumbstruck now, how on earth could he sister have got THAT fat.
So fat that her pyjama shirt was so stretched it barely functioned as a bra and it was impossible to see if she was wearing pants AGAIN.

“That’s all well and good Pheebs but how are you going to get out” asked Reagan starting to feel hangry now.

“I guess I’ll just work through all this food and then just slide up as normal?” suggested Phoebe.

“That could be hours, people need to get downstairs” said Reagan, folding her arms which pushed her bloated boobs up.

“Erm well...”

“What’s going on Red?” came Uma’s voice from the hallway above.

“Aww shit” grunted Reagan “Phoebe’s got her ass stuck on the stairs and I can’t get down”

“No way!” shouted Uma seeming excited at the prospect of seeing the youngest house member trapped by her own fat.
Before long the former athlete was stood behind Reagan trying hard not to laugh at the situation before her.

“Yeah that’s real helpful Uma” spat Reagan, looking over her shoulder.

“I mean it’s not that bad...” added Phoebe, still really not seeing the problem as she futilely wiggles her enormous hips which only produced a concerning groan from the banister and no forward movement for the red headed glutton.

“Ok ok, I’ve got some baby oil in my room so just hold up” offered Uma, still trying not to laugh as she turned to her room again.

“Hey Reagan, could you take a picture?” asked Phoebe, fishing in her bra for her phone.

“You’ve got to be kidding Phoebe” scowled Reagan as her twin offered her phone up.

“Aww please, I’ve never been this full and I do owe them for all he food” pleaded Phoebe

“Oh for gods sake...give it here” relented Reagan, snatching the phone and taking some snaps as Phoebe helplessly posed, rubbing her belly, cupping her boobs and throwing in some mock panting, all whilst her girth held her tight.

“Alright Pheebs, get your bathing suit coz you’re gonna go slip and sliding” announced Uma, heavily stomping down the stairs with baby oil in tow.

“Ohh sounds fun but I’m still stuck Uma” frowned Phoebe, the metaphors lost on her as Uma chuckled to herself.

“Ok this might be a little cold but it should get you moving” said Uma as she upended the bottle over Phoebe’s back and let the clear liquid run over her hips and down her sides.

“Ohh, that is cold” groaned Phoebe “but it does feel good, take a picture Reagan!”

“Why are we helping her film a porno Uma?” complained Reagan, really not wanting to promote Phoebe’s online activity as Uma lubed her up to escape the stairs.

“It’s fine” said Uma as she rolled her eyes, shoving her hand down Phoebe’s hip so as to spread the oil around “hey, good job on wearing pants Pheebs!”

“Thanks!” purred Phoebe, moaning under her breath “oh yeah, just like that”

“Hey missy, you do THAT on your own time” preached Uma “this is business, now get wiggling”

Phoebe groaned as she dropped down onto her hands and started to sway her hips, her belly rubbing against the steps as she did.

“It’s not...working” panted Phoebe as she partook in more physical activity than she had in months.

“Yeah it is, just pull” urged Uma, taking one of Phoebe’s chubby hands in hers.

“I am so stuck!” groaned Phoebe as she kept wiggling, her hips slipping fractionally past the banister.

“You moved Pheebs, keep going!” shouted Uma as she tried to pull Phoebe up with her.

“I’m...trying...” Phoebe managed to huff, face going red as she gripped on the stairs.

“A little more, keep coming!”

“I can’t...too full...”

CREEEEAK

“Woah woah, what was that?” asked Uma with concern.

“Doesn’t matter, she’s nearly out” admitted Reagan from the top of the stairs.

CRAASNAP

“Arrrrgh!”

CRAAASH!

“Shit Phoebe, you broke the banister” shrieked Reagan, looking over the wreckage of wood and angry red marks running over her twins huge belly.

“Oh man, Audrey is gonna be mad” said Uma, hiding her snicker.

“Oh god...I’m free...feels so good” moaned Phoebe, rubbing her gut suddenly realising the tension she had felt from being trapped.

“Yep now get upstairs and get clean, Audrey REALLY is gonna be mad so...” began Uma

CRUNCH

“What was THAT?!” asked Reagan in shock.

“Ouchie...”
Phoebe’s foot had gone straight through the weak step and was now stuck up to the thick calf.

“We are so fucked...” announced Reagan and Uma at the same time.
1333312411221223442222114121223241135242.title: Fat girls can't climb

choices: The gaff proves disastrous for the Durants' jobs at the office.
Phoebe and Audrey save their jobs, but with considerable changes.
Reagan and Uma have their own embarrassing incidents.
Life at the townhouse complicates with how big everyone is getting.
1333312411221223442222114124.content:
Business at Parkins & Lobelle had certainly changed the Durant sisters. Phoebe's vivacious and bubbly personality was a natural fit for answering the phones and arranging meetings with clients.

It became a cush job of answering phones, making arrangements, and the like. Work had been a boon for Phoebe. It gave her a newfound purpose, since the accident of her climbing weight had cost her modeling and the frequently partying had stymied her relationships with her twin, Reagan, and Uma. This job was actually the best thing to happen to her! Having integrated herself to the staff, she become their little sister; in terms of age, not size.

It wasn't as if the law office was against obesity but it was clear who among the staff were the weightiest. The Durant sisters were becoming quite fat. Audrey, forever a plus size, had been getting very rounded in the breasts and stomach, while Phoebe continued to redefine the term of bottom heavy genes when the weight of their massive home meals settled in her rear. The sisters proportions were salvaged by an impeccable fashion sense, with Phoebe's eye for style and Audrey's sensibilities outfitting the businesswomen with the best office attire +Size had to offer with their combined paychecks.

Suffice it to say, while they were growing at the company they were also growing, which soon led to some new problems for the Durant sisters.

* * * *


"Smarties and Starbursts again?!"

The outburst was from Ms. Parkins, senior lawyer of the agency, aghast at the selection in the lobby candy bowl. Parkins & Lobelle was not the largest office by any means, the lobby was only a few chairs by the reception desk, yet is was a highly successful office that wanted to showcase an air of classiness and plenty of comforts for both its personnel and clientele.

"What's the trouble, boss?" Phoebe Durant piped up from the receptionist's desk, sporting a purple pair of designer glasses with accentuating lavender and grey blouse/skirt outfit.

"Cheap fruit chews and chalky tablets! Who keeps buying these low quality candies?"

"Gee, I saw Denise fill the bowl last." Phoebe replied.

Ms. Parkins frowned. "Our quality of edibles has taken a nosedive." There had been a lack of variety in the company vittles over the last few weeks, from sorry looking doughnuts to untouched cans of that flavor of juice nobody liked. Even the fruit bowl in the break room only amounted to bananas these days.

"Should Audrey and I bring some new candy tomorrow?" Phoebe earnestly asked.

"If you could, although don't go overboard with it; we just need some higher quality sweets." Ms. Parkins kept a long look at the firm's newest hire with a hint of suspicion. While pretty with cherubic features, Phoebe Durant was very overweight and seemingly getting bigger week by week. It was Ms. Parkins' business as a lawyer to be inquisitive yet not without the proper evidence. Nothing yet proved that the Durant sisters were getting fat on the company dime, although their frequently discussion of what to have for dinner once they were home was a mite distracting.

"Also, did you want your lunch meeting rescheduled for the 8th?" Phoebe asked, oblivious to her boss's suspicions.

"Yes, thank you Phoebe," Ms. Parkins said, returning her thoughts to the present. "And do let me know when my 2 o'clock has arrived. There's a lucrative deal to be had taking this construction firm as a new client."

"Yes ma'am!"

"And dispose of this tosh," Ms. Parkins left the inferior candy bowl at Phoebe's desk.

Phoebe watched her boss leave. Given her base appetites, her method of disposing the remaining treats was not the way Ms. Parkins had intended. What could a few treats more hurt? What with Phoebe having already cleaned out the candy bowl of the better sweets earlier, spent wrappers hidden in her shredding bin.

Much like her sister before her, Phoebe picked up on keeping her snacking at work hidden. With two voracious Durant appetites at the office anything tasty rarely lasted for long.

* * * *


"I want this file for the indictment in triplicate," Ms. Lobelle, the junior law partner, instructed to her chief paralegals in a midday meeting. "Judge Conroy is a stickler for documentation."

Stewart, the sole male of the office, was chief paralegal and had helped Audrey Durant learn everything she needed to know. They were two of the best assistants in the office, although the case load taken on by Parkins & Lobelle was considerable. Typically, this wouldn't be that much of a problem even with the small staff, although there had been unexpected snags occurring over the last few weeks.

"In that case, shouldn't I update the indexing of our associated files?" Stewart asked.

"Yes, that would be smart for the proceedings," Ms. Lobelle replied. "I had Denise prepare the files already. Sorry this had to delay lunch. But we should be able to work quickly."

Such pow-wows were common in the course of a day at Parkins & Lobelle. As the junior partner worked on her legal preparations her paralegals were there to assist her and handle minutia in the bureaucratic cogs of the legal system. Ms. Lobelle was generous, providing a sandwich tray for the impromptu business lunch, as the trio of Ms. Lobelle, Stewart and Audrey sat down to work.

For Audrey, while the roast beef subs, chips, and pickle spears were tasty for lunch, her rate of consumption of late made the offerings a paltry drop in the bucket. Today the blonde sported a light pink blouse with a pencil skirt, although 'pencil' no longer applied to her body shape.

Working on autopilot, Audrey was fantasizing on what she might have ordered for lunch. While pasta may not have been appropriate, there was an excellent Italian place not far from the office. Which was two doors from the Thai place. Or the fanstastic food truck that would park nearby with the best fish and chips Although if she had to keep to to sandwiches, she would have upgraded to a party platter...

"What on earth?!"

Stewart's sudden outburst changed the tone of the meeting considerably, rousing Ms. Lobelle and Audrey to attention. "What's wrong?" asked their boss.

"These pages are stuck together! This is a critical file." Mysteriously, most of the document was stuck together with amber stains.

Ms. Lobelle blanched. "Can't we salvage any of it?"

The tearing paper was absolute.

This was a setback that would put them days behind and further increase the workload. As Ms. Lobelle and Stewart tried to determine what had caused this issue, Audrey stayed mum as she recalled having prepared that file days ago when she and Phoebe had taken breakfast at their favorite dinner before getting into work. And they had been too liberal with the syrup on their pancakes...

And that's when the crash from the front of the office occurred.

* * * *


If only popping smarties in your mouth actually made you smarter.

The redheaded Durant twin had the thought as she finished of the last packet of smarties. Sure, she could easily pass for the look of an intellectual, and was overall making more mature decisions, but her prospects at the law office wouldn't be ones of advancement. Having gotten a handle on reception work, Phoebe couldn't hold a candle to what the paralegals had to do. Some of the notation and legalese of the documents her sister and the others processed was mind-numbing to Phoebe. Like when Audrey had to prep a document when they had last had pancakes at the dinner.


"Excuse me, I'm here for a two o'clock appointment."

Roused from her munching, Phoebe looked up to greet the man to enter the office. And have her mouth left agape.

When Ms. Parkins had said she was expecting a new client from a construction firm, Phoebe wasn't sure what type of person that would be. So many people coming to Parkins & Lobelle wore suits. She had not expected a man dressed so casually in plaid and denim. Or such a hunk!

Who Phoebe was looking at was Matthew Robbero, headliner of a budding construction firm making quite the waves as a new business. Matthew had quite the business acumen but also worked the construction himself with the rest of the crew. Making him well tanned and muscled, with the slight unshaven scruff, and Phoebe was ogling every fiber of his being. He was so young too! He couldn't be that much older than her or her sisters.

"Ahh, yes!" Phoebe found her composure. "Ms. Parkins' new client, let me just get her." Phoebe rose from her seat.

Only to find that she couldn't.

Flummoxed, Phoebe tried to lift herself again. There's was more weight than she was used to lifting. And the pinching of her bum lead to a horrifying realization. Phoebe had been oblivious to how snug her office chair was getting the last several days. Her butt was so expansive, soaking up most of the calories she ate, that it continued to be her most prominent feature. It was less a butt and more a behemoth and now Phoebe was stuck fast in her chair.

"Um, do you need help?" Matthew asked, watching Phoebe struggle to extract herself by pressing down on the armrests of the seat.

"No, I've got it," Phoebe said, horrified that she was ruining her first impression with such a hunk. Finally she got to her feet! With the chair still iron locked to her massive buttcheeks!

"Whoa!" Losing her balance trying to exit the desk, Phoebe collapsed the the floor, taking a flower vase off a side table with her.

The crash attracted the rest of the office, both lawyers and Audrey, who immediately rushed to help her sister. "Phoebe!" The huge blonde bent to help her sister with her predicament. And for the second time that day heard an unfortunate rip. Audrey's own backside had been pilling on the pounds, and she had neglected how tight her skirt was getting.
1333312411221223442222114124.title: The Perks Outweigh The Benefits

choices: Ixchel gets pestered by another housemate.
She’s trying a new spin on an old family recipe but doesn’t like the results.
When forced to take charge in crisis Ixchel buckles under the pressure.
Retreating into her gaming, Ixchel becomes more sedentary.
The multiracial nerd is gearing up for her favorite convention!
14.content:
Ixchel Park needed to get away.

From her family, that is. When Nancine Durant, anthropologist, had married Che Park, community event organizer, they had had gifted children. Ixchel was one of them and had been encouraged all her life to embrace her heritage. Her mother delighted not only by educating the youngest generation of Parks about her background but also the intertwining lineages of Che’s family, Mexican plantation owners and Korean royal chefs, if you traced the lines back far enough.

For young Ixchel it had been overwhelming. It wasn’t that she hated her heritage but the lessons her family taught were not ones that were easy to describe to the other kids at school. Ones that bombarded her with endless questions, poked fun at her skin, name or physique and the other myriad ways kids could be cruel. While her cultural heritage was rich indeed Ixchel was unlucky enough to be the worst off compared to the branches of her family in the genetic department. A predisposition to obesity thanks to a Mexican market oversaturated with processed foods for generations and her rounded Korean phenotype had left her struggling with her weight ever since she was a kid.

Ixchel marshaled through family events as best she could. She was always a studious child and when left to her own devices she took an interest in math, science, and fantasy literature. She blended her loves the way her own bloodlines had been blended, becoming a full on nerd as she matured.

She didn’t dislike large crowds; after all, there where numerous Parks and the family’s offshoots and distant connections before you even got to the integrating families that home life was never quiet. Ixchel much preferred the company of other people who could understand her.

Maybe that’s why, years later, Ixchel found herself living with her favorite cousins. Unlike the rest of Ixchel’s relations the Durant daughters of her mother’s brother had never judged her harshly. Audrey, Reagan and Phoebe were the closest to Ixchel in age compared to the first, second and third cousins Ixchel had to remember names for during family gatherings. The four of them had a lot more fun together as kids than Ixchel could honestly say about those who were more closely related to her by blood.

Whether it was her parents conscious decision or not, Ixchel did not carry the same sensibilities being of the modern generation. She appreciated Audrey defending her whenever she got too shy, for the twins providing the right amount of friendship and naughtiness to broaden Ixchel’s horizons in a new direction. She looked forward to their visits the most.

Come college, Ixchel had fast-tracked herself into computer programming. She also had an interest in the medical field, graduating early and landing a well paid position with a medical technologies company. She was set up with everything but the right living situation, so when she heard that her cousins were looking to share the rent on a townhouse in a major city Ixchel moved in with them.

The townhouse soon became cramped with the addition of a fifth roommate, Audrey’s college friend Uma Ferro, but that was nothing new to Ixchel. Being one of five occupants was much more of a breeze compared to life back home. She had converted one of the rooms into her programming den/office, being able to work remotely from home for 97% of her work schedule.

Today, Ixchel was taking a break from some long hours preparing the new heart monitor matrix update for the company’s newest medical app. For someone as loosely connected to the medical field as Ixchel was she had been trying to keep her propensity towards being overweight under control.

She could stand with losing twenty pounds but she ate healthy. While she hadn’t originally liked her inherited culinary education from her household she had to admit that knowing how to cook helped her as an adult. She had almost put thought into setting up a culinary app but she thought the market was already flooded with the software. The other residents of 8422 Fordham Ave liked it when she cooked.

Ixchel leaned back in her ergonomic chair. Her hair was a deep dark brown and rather long. Her skin was a rich umber and she tended to tan easily. She was wearing a purple dress and a black long sleeved top. Her excess weight left her rather pudgy looking. Her hours and hobbies kept her from really optimizing her diet. When she wasn’t coding or bookkeeping Ixchel liked to play video games, watch anime or listen to her favorite K-pop bands.

She kept a hot thermos of spiced horchata by her desk when she was craving something sweet. Given the traditions of her two cultural cuisines Ixchel liked spicy food. Few ever took to spicy chocolate but that was one of Ixchel’s favorites.

At the very least, she had acceptance from others her own age at the townhouse along with their emotional support, while still having the freedom to breathe unlike the obligation that had almost smothered her as a child. Living at the townhouse was great.

Well, almost always.

Things at 8422 Fordham Ave never tended to stay quiet for long and Ixchel could never escape it.
14.title: Ixchel Park

choices: A power outage affects the whole block.
Ixchel is forced to complete chores and groceries on the spur of the moment.
The medical-tech firm needs her to work long hours on a secretive project.
Her most anticipated film gets canceled and Ixchel takes the bad news hard.
143.content:
Ixchel had grown used to a certain pattern to her day at 8422 Fordham Ave. She was one of the rare early risers, having a quick check of the morning’s data compiling, stock reports and some morning news while she tried to keep a healthy breakfast. Most of her work was broken into multi-hour segments over the course of the day. She gave herself the time to cook something or walk down to the dining district for lunch before logging back on in the afternoon. Unless she was on call for troubleshooting, which anchored her to the house the whole day.

She had Saturdays and Sunday mornings off, with another flexible half day of time off she could use any point of the week she needed to, except for being on call. It gave her a brief bit of time to hang out with the other girls or finish some IRL chores before she was back to coding and software maintainence.

Ixchel made Tuesdays her movie night and she often did streams on Thursday and Saturday nights. The squat little office in the townhouse wasn’t soundproof, as the sounds of her other roommates going about could distract her from work, although in those instances Ixchel would blast her K-Pop on full tilt.

Most of her life was dedicated to work or gaming. It was a convienant, straightforward schedule that gave her all she wanted for socializing and being out in the world. It was a sustainable routine.

This complacency, however, spelled Ixchel’s downfall whenever she was thrust outside her comfort zone. Such as a major break to her routine that fell in her thick lap out of the blue in the middle of the week.
143.title: Calm Before the Storm

choices: The freezer offers plenty more soon-to-melt treats.
By the time the power is back on most of the fridge has been eaten.
The others arrive and the blackout stymies any cooking from home.
The break in her routine finds Ixchel feeling more stressed later in the week.
1431.content:
It was Thursday night streaming and Ixchel had gone back to something of an oldie but one of her favorites: Skyrim. She had started a new play through for the stream a few weeks back because it was something familiar enough to use to fill content, as her work life was getting hectic and her roommates were being especially loud. Ixchel had easily sunk hundreds of hours into the game over the course of her life so it was easier to have commentary over it and enjoy something to unwind with after a long week.

Tonight was primed to be perfect. Ixchel had cleared out her workload and most of the townhouse was empty as Audrey, Phoebe and Uma had gone off to catch a basketball game. Plenty of open time to relax with a favorite game and her stream crowd.

Ixchel had made herself a new Khajiit character, a fantasy feline race, and had made steady progress through her past streams on a mixed faction run. Pure vanilla, which was something of a rarity in streams of Skyrim, as most people showed off ridiculous mods but Ixchel's classic approach had found a dedicated, if small niche.

Ixchel had cobbled together an impressive array of tech for her budget, after accounting for rent, but she had an eye for quality with her electronics. Her mic had cost her a pretty penny but it was worth the improved audio quality.

"Back at the College," Ixchel narrated, as she returned to Winterhold, the location of a school of magic, wanting to inform new viewers, "there is a glitch that can be pulled off using the black market, it's really hard to pull off but if I had set it up, I could have gotten --"

CLICK!!

After a hard click and the dying fizzle of electronics, realization hit Ixchel as she found herself in the dark. "No. No! NO NO NO NO NO!!!" Her frantic key strokes did nothing. Her rig, the fan, the lights, everything was without power.

THUMP!

"OW!" Ixchel swore, losing all composure as she lost her bearings and slammed her knee trying to get out from her computer desk. She fumbled over to the wall switch, which provided only further proof of the power outage. How could this have happened? She was on her favorite quest line! She hadn't saved in forty minutes!

"Hey Chel, you up there?" A muffled call came from outside the door. Ixchel patted around for the doorknob. When she opened it the beam of a flashlight assaulted her in the face.

"Damnit Reagan!"

"Sorry," the rambunctious twin lowered the light. "Although don't go blaming me for this. I checked outside too, the whole damn block is dark."

"Great. Just great," Ixchel seethed. There would be no recovering her stream now.

"Did you have your equipment fry, in the middle of your fantasy quest?" Reagan teased.

"Shut it," Ixchel snarled, in a rare bad mood given how her stream had been interrupted by the power outage. "Why don't you be useful and come help me with the fuse box."

Making their way down to the utility closet in the basement, the two roommates spent several fruitless minutes with the fusebox. "Told you," Reagan shook her head. "Whole damn street. The only power we've got is our phones."

Ixchel sighed. "The others won't like to hear about this when they get back. Did it effect their game?"

Reagan looked up from her phone. "Doesn't look like it, the grid's only out in our neighborhood." The tone of her voice turned from frustration to mock horror. "Shit, the jello!"

"Wha-?" And then Ixchel remembered. Win or lose, the rest were going to come back that night and celebrate with a team colored jello mold Audrey had set up before the game.

Making their way back up to the the ground floor in the dark, Reagan shone her flashlight into the dead fridge. Ixchel picked up the bowl and curiously peered into its contents.

Reagan whistled. "Well, that didn't finish setting up." The colors had blurred together as the gelatin remained a mostly liquid slurry. She turned the light back to the fridge. "Most of this stuff is going to go bad if the power outage keeps up. Imma going to find some candles, Audrey has those flowery ones in the towel cabinet." The scented bath candles disgusted Reagan but they were the only available light sources in the townhouse at the moment.

"People are going to be so pissed with the landlady," Reagan said as she came back with lowlight wicks on juniper candles, only to find Ixchell seated at the breakfast nook with a gravy ladle into the jello. "What happened to waiting for everybody else?"

"You saw it, the jello was already ruined," Ixchel said darkly. Healthy lifestyles be damned, she was so crushed on how the power outage had ruined her stream that she needed to find solace, and the only source of that was the inoperable fridge.

"None of this will last anyways," Reagan shrugged, deciding to join Ixchel for a bite as she poked at a box of leftover stirfry.
1431.title: Lights Out, So's the Fridge

choices: A few weeks—not enough to cause much concern, but enough for Chel to stress-eat
A few months—Chel needs American food, and she needs it now!
A year—and Chel has had enough of Mexico by the end of it!
1433.content:
"What do you mean you're going away?"
